title: Tinder
description:
With 30 billion matches to date, Tinder¬Æ is the world‚Äôs most popular app for meeting new people. Think of us as your most dependable wingmate‚Äîwherever you go, we‚Äôll be there. If you‚Äôre here to meet new people, expand your social network, meet locals when you‚Äôre traveling, or just live in the now, you‚Äôve come to the right place. We‚Äôre called ‚Äúthe world‚Äôs hottest app‚Äù for a reason: we spark more than 26 million matches per day. How many dating apps can match that?

Find friends, dates to everything in between. From casual dates to serious relationships - Tinder has it all!

Match. Chat. Date. Tinder is easy and fun‚Äîuse the Swipe Right‚Ñ¢ feature to Like someone, use the Swipe Left‚Ñ¢ feature to pass. If someone likes you back, It‚Äôs a Match! We invented the double opt-in so that two people will only get matched when there‚Äôs a mutual interest. No stress. No rejection. Just tap through the profiles you‚Äôre interested in, chat online with your matches, then step away from your phone, meet up in the real world and spark something new.

Find singles near me - Set up your location settings and find local singles in your area. Whether you‚Äôre looking to meet new people in Boston, go dating in Miami or find love in New York - Tinder is the app for you!

Now, let‚Äôs get started. And remember, when in doubt, give a Swipe Right‚Ñ¢. Trust us, the more options you have, the better-looking life becomes. 

Tinder is more than a dating app‚Äîthe largest, hottest community of singles in the world. Don‚Äôt be shy, come on over.

MORE FEATURES? THAT‚ÄôS A PLUS

Upgrade to Tinder Plus¬Æ for premium features, including: Unlimited Likes so you can use the Swipe Right feature to match with more people. Passport to match & chat with singles anywhere around the world, Rewind to give someone a second chance, one free Boost per month to be the top profile in your area for 30 minutes, and additional Super Likes to stand out from the crowd & get matched.

GET THE GOLD TREATMENT

Upgrade to Tinder Gold‚Ñ¢ for a first-class dating app experience: Passport, Rewind, Unlimited Likes, five Super Likes per day, one Boost per month, and more profile controls. But wait, it gets better. Save time and aimless searching with our Likes You feature, which lets you see who likes you. Think of it as your personal Tinder concierge‚Äîavailable 24/7‚Äîbringing all of your pending matches to you. Now you can sit back, enjoy a fine cocktail, and browse through profiles at your leisure. Goodbye search fatigue. Hello #GoldLife

-----------------------------------

If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus or Tinder Gold, payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the Play Store after purchase. Current Tinder Plus subscription price starts at $9.99 USD/month, and one-month, 6-month and 12-month packages are available. Current Tinder Gold subscription price starts at $14.99 USD/month, and one-month, 6-month and 12-month packages are available. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don‚Äôt choose to purchase Tinder Plus or Tinder Gold, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

All photos are of models and used for illustrative purposes only.

Privacy: https://www.gotinder.com/privacy
Terms: https://www.gotinder.com/terms

summary: Match, Chat & Meet New People - Near you & around the world!
developerAddress:
Tinder
8833 W. Sunset Blvd.
West Hollywood, CA 90069
recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements
comments: Evidently Tinder has its own scoring system for profiles which may make it more difficult to get matches. For instance the more you swipe right, the less likely you are to be matched. What's the point, Tinder? Are you going to go into our profiles and decide which information is arbitrarily appropriate for a match as well? How about the number of times we swipe right? What's the criteria for determining all of this? Let users judge for themselves if they want to match with someone or not.

Good profiles but the app is full of bugs, the most annoying being: - from time to time, the app needs to be restarted because new messages are not displayed or the profiles' pictures are endlessly loading; - messages are not sent; - with the "Golden profile", if you chose "Control who sees you - Only People I've Liked", I get no single match, because my likes are not shown to those people; please fix this bug because the option "Only People I've Liked" is now useless;

Got shadow banned. Twice. When I first started on my second account I was regularly getting matches and messages. After about 3 weeks it stopped working almost entirely. It seems impossible to get matches unless they're bots. Tinder is a good concept but when its shadowbanned me and numerous others for unclear reasons I cant help but dislike it. If you guys (tinder) could figure out how to resolve this issue youd earn my support, use, and possibly money. Until then it's a no.

Terribly moderated and no $ = no profile views. Half of the matches I've gotten have been prostitutes, a quarter of the people I see in the app are bots or catfishes or "looking for a plug." What's more is I've noticed that the only times that I get likes or matches is when I JUST SO HAPPEN to PAY for a boost, which are $8 a pop. Day 1 they reel you in by giving your profile top priority. I got 10 likes the first day, but since then, only when I pay. Its predatory.

The app is great honestly. Meeting new people is always so peculiar and exciting. Sometimes people dont answer back immediately and that's okay. It cycles people over again sometimes but not as much as you'd think. Most often than not there are plenty of faces and so many exceptional opportunities if you just allow yourself to be a good human being instead of a creeper. If you are having a hard time matching with someone, dont fall to critical! Just be sincere, that's what people like.

title: Twitch: Livestream Multiplayer Games & Esports
description:
Watch livestream gaming videos, Esports and any IRL broadcast on your Android device! Stream your favorite MMO RPG, strategy and FPS games for PS4, PC, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch. Twitch gives you live streaming and gamer chat in the palm of your hand.

Live chat as you watch gamers play everything from Overwatch to League of Legends. Watch PUBG showdowns, Minecraft sessions, Hearthstone matchups and stunning FIFA 18 goals. Multiplayer games not your thing? Livestream any IRL content you can think of, from art demos to animal videos!

Twitch Live Streaming and Gamer Chat: TOP 3 FEATURES
1. Watch gamers play Minecraft, Fortnite, PUBG, FIFA 18, League of Legends and much more. Stream content from the biggest MMO RPG, MOBA, strategy and FPS games out there, or settle in for nail-biting Esports tournaments.
2. Live chat during any gaming, Esports and IRL broadcast. Talk Hearthstone strategy with fellow gamers or content yourself with live streaming art demos in silence.
3. Broadcast your very own gaming content! Livestream your Overwatch killstreak on Xbox One, build Minecraft monoliths on Nintendo Switch, take down your Fortnite enemies on PS4, or show off your Hearthstone cards on PC!

Twitch lets you watch gamers play any single or multiplayer games under the sun. With PUBG, FIFA 18, League of Legends, Overwatch and Fortnite videos on demand, you can really let your gaming flag fly. Join live chat to connect with your MOBA or MMO RPG community! 
+ Stream interactive live news videos with exclusive content for PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and PC.
+ Watch unique programming: livestream anything from art demos, to Esports events, to music festivals!
+ Discover new multiplayer games and IRL videos with ease thanks to simple and intuitive navigation.
+ Switch to Dark Mode for those late night viewing and gamer chat sessions.

Join the millions of hardcore and casual gamers who have found a place to connect over the MOBA or FPS games they love. Take your passion to the next level with Twitch!

------

For feedback and assistance, please visit our Support Center: https://help.twitch.tv

Please note: This app features Nielsen‚Äôs proprietary measurement software which contributes to market research, like Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings. Please see http://priv-policy.imrworldwide.com/priv/mobile/us/en/optout.html for more information

developerAddress:
350 Bush St Suite 200
San Francisco, CA 94104
recentChanges: Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
comments: Good quality and a pretty decent interface, but the ads are ridiculous. Most streams force you to watch a 30 seconds ad before you can actually start viewing what your use the app for. From there, it just gets worse. I've frequently been subjected to SEVEN straight ads of 15 to 30 seconds in duration. That means a few full minutes of interruption, which always come at the worst time of the steam and they aren't skippable in any way. Oh, and you'll see the same handful of ads over and over.

Was good starting out. But now I can't see certain people for whatever reason. I can go to other streamers and see them just fine, but for one group which I also follow on YouTube as well as Twitch, I can hear them, but not see them. This is really irritating because I used to be able to see them, but after an update it leaves me with a black window. The streamers belive its because they're using iPhones and I'm using a Samsung, but that seems like a really stupid reason. Please fix.

Great behind the scenes and you can multitask with a background window, which many will love. Also extra points go to this app cause this can livestream certain games others can't. The only reason that it doesnt have five stars is that it has a certain delay and its missing some features other apps have but if does i will be glad to fix this rating to five stars

So the content is great. App works okay, if you sit your phone up, don't touch it, and preferably stream only audio. If you go into pop up, it will lag and sometimes just stop. It will lag and stutter all the time, no matter the stream. It loses your place in VODs for channels you're subscribed to while you're watching then if *anything* else happens on your phone, and now, it's been playing BLARING ads over top of streams I'm subscribed to. I'd love to list more issues but I'm out of space.

Update on Feb 24 (recent) killed audio only and background audio play on my s8. It was working fine for months/years until the update yesterday. Hopefully some bug they can fix quik. Already tried reinstalling the app and nothing. Other than that it's been working fine. Will update when fixed. And yes background audio is enabled.

title: HBO NOW: Stream TV & Movies
description:
With HBO NOW you can watch big premieres as they air‚Äîplus every episode of HBO‚Äôs addictive series such as Game of Thrones, Westworld, Watchmen, and so much more.

In addition to getting new movies every week, you also get news, comedy specials, smart talk shows, thought-provoking documentaries, and the special events everyone‚Äôs talking about.

Getting started is easy. Just download the app to sign up for your free trial (afterward just $14.99/month. Free trial is for new customers only.). Watch on your favorite screen‚Äîphone, tablet, connected TV or gaming device‚Äîand on your computer at HBONOW.com. Cancel anytime. 

HBO NOW¬Æ is only accessible in the U.S. and certain U.S. territories. Some restrictions apply. 

We updated our data features to better protect your data and give you more control over how we use your data‚Äîsee Do Not Sell My Personal Information in Settings. We also updated our Privacy Policy.

For help, please visit help.hbonow.com.

comments: No videos i select apparently have sound files with them. My internet connection is famtastic and all my other apps and devices are woking fine. Even your in videos advertisements are working phenomonally, but when it gets to the part i paid for the soundbyte goes out and its starting to make me angry. Im considering cancelling my subscription.

The HBO app constantly kicks me out of the video saying they can't play the video, forces me to go back to then relaunch the video. I watched a movie where I had to do this about 50 times no joke, this is the most annoying Thing of this app. It would be one thing if it didn't happen on every show but it happens every single program I've ever watched and HBO since the moment I installed this app. I hope HBO has a fix for this because I can't believe I'm the only one that this is happening to

Worst streaming service. Every interaction is frustrating. Too bad your burying good content with terrible ux. Rewind is frustrating. Navigating is frustrating. Getting kicked out is frustrating. Video quality is really bad. Loads forever. None of my other streaming apps do this I have solid fiber connection.

I'm paying $25 a month so that ten minutes into a movie the app can stop working. Permanently. Turn the console off, uninstall the app, switch to a computer, it doesn't matter, the playback ends and won't go past the marker it first buffered at. And yes, it's across all my devices. I can watch Netflix, Hulu and Prime all in 4K but HBO, the most expensive one, crashes constantly. According to the help line, my internet download/upload and latency is more than DOUBLE what HBO requires to playback HD video. Their solution? To email me later when the "app developers" think of something. So answer me something. Why am I paying a monthly rate that is bonkers expensive compared to other streaming services for an app that quite actually has more buffering than a movie streaming site that will show me this title for FREE? The only thing this app has going for it is the original content which, while great, you can find anywhere else online with less buffering. And that doesn't cost you $25 a month.

Frustrating interface that is not intuitive. No movie information page is available, it just immediately plays the movie with any touch, useless. Category organization is not employed unless an alphabetical only listing of every movie is the only category. Chromecast functionality appears to work.

title: Facebook
description:
Keeping up with friends is faster and easier than ever. Share updates and photos, engage with friends and Pages, and stay connected to communities important to you. 

Features on the Facebook app include:

* Connect with friends and family and meet new people on your social media network
* Set status updates & use Facebook emoji to help relay what‚Äôs going on in your world
* Share photos, videos, and your favorite memories.
* Get notifications when friends like and comment on your posts
* Find local social events, and make plans to meet up with friends
* Play games with any of your Facebook friends
* Backup photos by saving them in albums
* Follow your favorite artists, websites, and companies to get their latest news
* Look up local businesses to see reviews, operation hours, and pictures
* Buy and sell locally on Facebook Marketplace
* Watch live videos on the go


The Facebook app does more than help you stay connected with your friends and interests. It's also your personal organizer for storing, saving and sharing photos. It's easy to share photos straight from your Android camera, and you have full control over your photos and privacy settings. You can choose when to keep individual photos private or even set up a secret photo album to control who sees it.

Facebook also helps you keep up with the latest news and current events around the world. Subscribe to your favorite celebrities, brands, news sources, artists, or sports teams to follow their newsfeeds, watch live streaming videos and be caught up on the latest happenings no matter where you are!

The most important desktop features of Facebook are also available on the app, such as writing on timelines, liking photos, browsing for people, and editing your profile and groups. 

Now you can get early access to the next version of Facebook for Android by becoming a beta tester. Learn how to sign up, give feedback and leave the program in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/133NwuP 

Sign up directly here: 
http://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.facebook.katana

Problems downloading or installing the app? See http://bit.ly/GPDownload1
Still need help? Please tell us more about the issue. http://bit.ly/invalidpackage

Facebook is only available for users age 13 and over.
Terms of Service: http://m.facebook.com/terms.php.

comments: This app only delivers an OK experience. It gets the job done. But there are many shortcomings. First of all, the UI takes pretty much space. Secondly, there is no night mode. In addition to these, this app lacks customization options. It constantly asks you to install Messenger. The story bar is huge. It stays open on background even if you force stop it.

Once in a blue moon this app works properly, it's great when it works... But when you get an update for it, you always seem to have problems with it. Tech support seem to take ages to fix any problems on the app and they hardly ever answer back on your problem reports. I have just updated my phone with the new update and I wish I hadn't done it. It's been over a week now and still no fix on my problem and no replies or confirmation regarding my reports. Still waiting üò†

Do remember to login at least one time within three months. If you forget to do, your account will be lock and unable to login anymore even you have correct ID and password. Although you can request for account recovery, but there will be no reply to your registered email inbox of whether your application is successful or fail. You can submit multiple time as you like, but you will never recover your account simply because customer service is not available.

Last month I closed a page I had on FB in favor of my personal page. When switching, I was given only 2 ways to confirm my identity, one of which was unfeasible as it looks like a scam, the other was uploading my ID. Fast forward a month, still no help or response- it is impossible to get any help or customer service. I'm locked out of Facebook, locked out of Messenger, and there's no way to contact them for help when you're locked out! What an absolute garbage platform.

Like the new features. Hate some things though. Well mostly one. Losing your messages or writing when connection is lost. It happened so much. It is not managed well. Offline work and caching and management should be well done. And no data should be lost. You are Facebook before anything. And Big five. I hope I.m gonna see that. Love too the Facebook react team hhh

title: BIGO LIVE‚ÄìLive Stream, Video Chat, Make Friends
description:
Bigo Live allows you to live-stream your favorite moments, and make friends from all around the world. We enable people to showcase their talent, discover, and stay connected in a positive, healthy, and creative way. 

We have over 200 million users around the world. Say no to FOMO, share your life, gain fans, receive gifts, make money and live in the moment. Bigo Live is a new way to experience life. 

Why Bigo Live?

GO LIVE

Sing? Dance? Have any hidden talents?- Show off your talents.
Get followers, gain fans, receive gifts, make money and become an idol to many.

WATCH LIVE-STREAMS

 We have an active community, and millions of talented broadcasters, dancers, singers, foodies, comedians, and more. Your favorite moment is here.

LIVE VIDEO CHAT & VIDEO CALL

- Invite a friend to start a 1:1 video chat.
- Create a group video chat or video call with up to 9 people in our Multi-guest Room.
- No more loneliness. Want to meet new people, make friends or meet new people? Bigo Live can match you with locals around you or with people from all around the globe. 
- We bring the fun. Check out our video filters and our unique stickers! We have tons of cool filters to choose from. Level it up!

VOICE CHAT ROOM

- Talk in real time with people nearby or from all over the world
- Make use of our live voice chat with interactive voice emojis to have fun.
- Talk about life, sing along, or simply chat in different languages with people from all around the globe.

LIVE PK (LOL)

Remember PK? Same. It‚Äôs time to dare your friends on BIGO LIVE! - Broadcasters with the most points will win, and losers will be punished. Dare or not? ;) 

VLOG (Video Blog)

Share your life, show off your talents, and become a popular vlog star in BIGO LIVE.

GAMING? YES, WE DO.

Connect, stream or watch other‚Äôs live-streaming popular games, such as PUBG, World of Warcraft, Minecraft, GTA, Fortnite, Dota 2, Hearthstone, Rules of Survival and more.


SAY HELLO:

Instagram: @bigoliveapp / @bigolive.usa
Facebook: @bigoliveapp
Twitter: @bigoliveapp
Instagram: @bigoliveapp
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/bigoliveofficial

Your feedback helps us improve BIGO LIVE. 
Any questions? Please contact us at feedback@bigo.tv

title: Bumble - Dating, Friends & Business
description:
Over 80 million people have signed up for Bumble to start building valuable relationships, finding friends, and making empowered connections.

Creating new connections has never been easier. Bumble is working to lift the stigma of online dating by employing unprecedented standards for respectful behavior. Because of this relentless dedication, millions of people are using Bumble to build valuable relationships every single day.

DATE, MEET FRIENDS, NETWORK

Bumble is at the forefront of matchmaking technology by providing an app that allows users to foster more than just romantic connections. The industry-leading app empowers users to swipe through potential connections across different modes: 

Bumble Date: On Bumble Date, women make the first move. We‚Äôve changed the archaic rules of the dating game so that you can form meaningful relationships in a respectful way.
Bumble BFF: Life is better with friends. Whether you‚Äôre new to a city or looking to expand your circle, Bumble BFF is the easiest way to make new friends.
Bumble Bizz: Now we‚Äôre in business. Use Bumble Bizz to network, find mentors, and create new career opportunities.

Bumble is the first app of its kind to bring dating, friend-finding, and career-building into a single social networking platform. 

CHANGING THE RULES OF THE GAME

At Bumble, women make the first move. In heterosexual matches, the woman has 24 hours to make the first move and the man has 24 hours to respond. In same-sex matches, either person has 24 hours to make the first move, while the other individual has 24 hours to respond, or else, the connection expires. By prompting our users to make the first move we‚Äôve seen over 3 billion messages sent to date. 

THE BUZZ IS REAL

---
Bumble is free to download and use. However, we also offer an optional subscription package (Bumble Boost) and non-subscription, single and multi-use paid features (BumbleCoins).

https://bumble.com/en/privacy
https://bumble.com/en/terms

comments: There is some critical bug (or by design) which withholds the matches in the match queue. Have been using the app for weeks, not a single match in the queue. Then all of a sudden I wake up to 50+ matches in the queue overnight? How long have these been there? This wouldn't happen overnight. Something is broken here. Then after a few hours, the 50+ vanishes? Also, superswipe doesn't seem to make any difference, especially if they show inactive profiles. Spend your romantic efforts elsewhere.

You subscribe for a month you get 6 months. Probably the worst thing in our immediate imagination and yes we've imagined hell before, bumble is no different. It's like if God went to hell. This app is everything it's not a Useless good-for-nothing app. I wouldn't download it again if it was the last thing on Earth. I'll take my chances on my own to prevent scums like these from taking advantage (exploiting) of the people it's supposed to bring together.

Notification alerts on this app are really buggy. Every few hours I'll get a notification telling me that Mrs. X sent me a message, but when I open up the app it's an old message. And then again in a couple hours I'll get another notification for the same stupid old message. I think the developers are doing that just so people will be constantly engaging with the app but it's so annoying I'm about ready to uninstall it.

Great premise, just rarely get matches. I love the idea of girls messaging first but I can't tell you how many times I've had a match expire even after extending it. Whether it was someone who doesn't check the app much or if they just decided they weren't into me is unknown but it still feels like kind of a waste of space in my phone. I prefer tinder still. As a huge plus there arent any bots on this app though.

Terrible app. I started an account, went premium because the blurred prospective matches was frustrating. I would get notis constantly for the same thing. So I deleted my account to try to fix it on my own (since customer service is no help) and then I find out I can't even restore my purchase. So now they essentially stole my money. Great app if you just want to exercise your thumb from side to side.

title: TurboTax Tax Return App ‚Äì Max Refund Guaranteed
description:
Snap. Tap. Done. Snap a photo of your W-2 or 1099-MISC, answer simple questions about your life, and e-file securely from your mobile device. Free to start, pay only when you file. TurboTax coaches you every step of the way and automatically double-checks as you go, so you can be confident your taxes are done right. Join the millions who file taxes with the TurboTax mobile app ‚Äì free to file for simple tax returns1. 

KEY FEATURES
‚Ä¢ $0 Fed. $0 State. $0 to File your simple tax returns. 
‚Ä¢ Start for free - pay only when you file your tax return or pay for TurboTax using your federal tax refund. Fees apply.2
‚Ä¢ Connect online with Real CPAs or EAs for unlimited tax advice and even a line-by-line review, so you can be 100% confident it's done right.
‚Ä¢ Maximum Refund Guaranteed - On Average $3,284
‚Ä¢ Get your taxes done right anytime from anywhere. Seamlessly switch between any device and securely pick up right where you left off when it's convenient for you.
‚Ä¢ Snap. Tap. Done. Driver‚Äôs License or State ID scan + W-2 Snap and Autofill + 1099-MISC
‚Ä¢ Up to a 50% head start on your taxes with year-over-year data transfer of your prior TurboTax return
‚Ä¢ CompleteCheck‚Ñ¢ ‚Äì Get the green light to file. Before you file, CompleteCheck‚Ñ¢ will run an in-depth scan of your return and guide you through any final changes so you don‚Äôt miss a thing with accuracy guaranteed.
‚Ä¢ Push notifications - We'll make it easy to stay informed about your e-file return status with notifications sent straight to your phone or tablet
‚Ä¢ Face ID, Touch ID and Passcode - Get secure access on your mobile device using the latest technology.

See full disclosure and disclaimers here: https://turbotax.intuit.com/corp/mobile-apps/turbotax-disclosures/

comments: I used Turbo tax for the very first time i done my taxes by myself. It was a little harder that i expected but i got it done. Having to wait now because i didnt print them off right away ( i used my cellphone to file instead of computer) , it said it needed some kind of attached voucher when i printed it off. I ended up calling DOR and they gave me a number to put in the memo. Still waiting for my return and that means still waiting to purchase diff vehicle.... :((

Worked fine last year, not this year. I filed my taxes on the 16th of February and received my confirmation. More than a month later, I still haven't received my tax return. I call the IRS they show no status. I call TurboTax they show the same. Long story short, I found out today that I was lied to, had to pay $150 for a deluxe(even though it said upgrade for $50)I didn't need last year. I will never use TurboTax again. Edit: Don't have social media. App keeps closing for live help.

The app cost $150 for what I can get everywhere else for less than $20. Plus the app has become cumbersome and deceptive, with adds after every section. I used TurboTax for years but no more. The response I got was a form response and doesn't remove any fees. In fact it only highlighted their deceptive fee practices. I want to be clear that the service I required that took my bill to $150 was the form for my student loan repayment. I used another service and it was free.

I would gladly recommend TurboTax, but not the app. This year I used the app instead of filing on a computer like I normally do. I was not happy with the app. It made the experience much more stressful by randomly saving and forcing you to go back to the beginning of a section and only to click through everything all over again and to add insult to injury, it repeatedly throws an upgrade for some Max service each time it makes you restart. I'll keep using TurboTax, but just not the app.

The real free version is hidden! If you make less then like 60k, you qualify for a truly free version. The app will ask you pay (and not show the IRS free file option) if you have one of the many pretty common tax situations. The IRS free file version through tubo tax is through there web interface ONLY and it's far inferior to the app. You can, however, start on the app and when it tells you to pay, you can convert using the web version and continue with the info you already entered.

Needs work, some functions are temporarily not working, I would like to not to see the profiles of people that I had already toss and I want to meet people who wants to make friends but the only way to know people from outside your country is matches function, the locals function seems to doesn't even take your parameters for doing the search. I have been a member since 2007 and I was logged on today and all of a sudden it force logs me out. It asked me to change my password and I did but it still keeps saying invalid login info. I usually like this app, but I'm been asked to establish my username a couple of times. But now I was kicked out and I can't use my password even though it was the exact one I use for my email. I sent requests for the password renewal confirmation code to my email but I haven't been receiving it. I seriously dont know why I was booted from the app but I just wanna know

title: Google Drive
description:
Google Drive is a safe place for all your files and puts them within reach from any smartphone, tablet, or computer. Files in Drive ‚Äì like your videos, photos, and documents ‚Äì are backed up safely so you can‚Äôt lose them. Once there, you can easily invite others to view, edit, or leave comments on any of your files or folders.

With Drive, you can:

- Safely store your files and access them from anywhere.
- Search for files by name and content.
- Easily share files and folders with others.
- Quickly view your content.
- Set access levels for who can view, comment, or edit.
- Quickly access recent files.
- See file details and activity.
- Enable viewing of files offline.
- Use your device camera to scan in paper documents.
- Access pictures and videos from Google Photos.

comments: Last few days, I've had issues uploading to my folders. As an artist, I save references all the time, and Drive was my go-to. But whenever I've tried to upload to my folders, it's stuck with "Waiting to upload." Then it appears to upload, then goes back to "Waiting to upload" again. I've tried to clear the cache, I've tried reaching out on Twitter a couple of time, and sent quite a few feedback reports, and nothing has been fixed, nor have I heard back from anyone. I just want my Drive fixed.

I cannot access the files that I made available offline easily. They can't be managed by other apps. Folders cannot be downloaded to be used by other apps (files can be). Audio player tries not to be an audio player. Has no advantage over the other suite apps like Sheets. In other words I need to play audio files in order, but it doesn't do it well and doesn't let other apps do it. I don't want to download everything just because I might need them. So yeah, this app is a joke that is not funny

I loved the app, until the problem appeared. I lost the comments on the pdf files. I think those were saved offline on my phone, and when they synchronized with the drive instead of sending comments to drive it seemed that they were overwritten by a file with no comments in it. So now comments are lost. Also, I couldn't add screenshots of the problem in the feedback tool, as you have only the option to add screenshot of the place from where you opened the feedback tool (a bit strange)

Really love Google Drive. Keeps photos in touch whenever I accidentally delete them in my actual Gallery. I always take screenshots so it's really nice that I have separate folders for separate years because it's very organized just the way I like it. This isn't the only app I use to keep photos but it does get the job done and it makes me happy. It's not difficult to share or download whatever is in my drive unless you aren't a geeky kind of gal like me then I don't know how others use this.üòÖ

I think it's a good app it's pretty simple to use but I am having issues. I try to get rid of photos and folders and so i put them in the trash then i delete the trash; but when i find more things to get rid of and go to the trash all of my stuff is still there and now theres so much i have to buy storage even though i continuously try to get rid of the trash. Please help.

title: Dropbox: Cloud Storage to Backup, Sync, File Share
description:
Dropbox lets anyone upload and transfer files to the cloud, and share them with anyone. Back up photos, videos, docs, and other files to cloud storage, and access files synced with any of your computers or mobile devices‚Äîfrom anywhere. And with advanced sharing features, it‚Äôs easy to send files‚Äîlarge or small‚Äîto friends, family, and co-workers.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Automatically upload the photos and videos in your camera roll to cloud storage‚Äîall in the background.
‚Ä¢ Access any file in your account‚Äîeven offline‚Äîand preview over 175 file types, no special software required.
‚Ä¢ Easily send large files by copying and pasting a link you can give to anyone, even if they don‚Äôt have a Dropbox account.
‚Ä¢ Scan documents to cloud photo storage using your camera, and turn receipts, documents, whiteboards, and notes into PDFs.

Sign up now for your free Dropbox Plus trial. You‚Äôll get 2 TB (2,000 GB) of storage‚Äîthat‚Äôs enough room to save files from all your linked devices. And Dropbox Smart Sync technology can move out-of-date files off your hard drive and to the cloud. You‚Äôll also be able to roll back unwanted changes to any folder, or your entire Dropbox, up to 30 days.

Or, existing Plus customers can upgrade to Dropbox Professional. With 3 TB (3,000GB), you can store all your stuff‚Äîfrom work projects to personal photos‚Äîand have space to spare. You and your clients can comment on most file types without leaving Dropbox. And you can protect your work with a watermark, add shared link controls, or rewind your account up to 180 days.

Before completing payment, you‚Äôll see the plan price. This amount will be charged to your Google Play account and will vary by plan and country. Dropbox subscriptions purchased in app renew monthly or yearly, depending on your plan. To avoid auto-renewal, turn it off in at least 24 hours before your subscription renews. You can turn off auto-renewal anytime time from your Google Play account settings.

We‚Äôd love to hear from you! Join the Dropbox community: https://www.dropboxforum.com
Terms of Service: https://www.dropbox.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.dropbox.com/privacy

comments: I use it mostly for backing up photos from my phone. I have a samsung and the automatic backup only saves the camera roll, not downloaded pics, or whatsapp pics/videos. So you have to manually upload those to dropbox. And then they don't integrate smoothly. They don't show up in the main photos tab, and when you find your photos, they appear out of order. Using the app is fine, moving to folders is fine, but the backup feature isn't great

54% increase without confirmation, really this is another case of tech companies screwing Australians over! In a global crisis btw. I never once gave consent for such a massive price hike for such a stupid amount of data that I don't need and definitely don't want. Yes this is probably hidden within pages of small print that you know nobody reads, but to actually hike your prices up over 50% in one hit is below the belt to say the least. And customers in other countries only received 20% more.??

The website streams videos wonderfully. I can skip around a video without issue. But I had to get the app because you can't watch longer than an hour on the site. The app is horrible. On either wifi or 5g, it lags regularly, and if you try to skip to a different point in the video it will stop and buffer for 20-25 minutes. Website has no buffer and plays instantly. Fix your app. Edit: (2 months later, no better. Streaming a video is still abysmal even on version fios high speed net)

Would have given zero stars if possible. Purchased the Dropbox Plus 30-day free trial but found it to be not useful. So cancelled the Plus subscription on the Dropbox app. However, the subscription continued because I did not cancel it via the Play Store. Only realized this after receiving credit card statement. However, both Google Play support and Dropbox support refused to process my refund. Both parties pushed the responsibility to refund to each other. Google Play claims to just be a store front and cannot process "third-party" refund. Dropbox claims that they do not have access to Google Play payment platforms and all purchases made via the Play store cannot be refunded via Dropbox itself. USELESS and beware when you get the free trial.

I have been a PAYING 10TB customer for years and I'm done!!! this app and it's latest updates (updates over the last year) are horrendously GARBAGE! None of my pics that I take will ever sync up to my DB account unless I go in and manually push them there. The PC application once installed freshly is fine until the first time I connect my phone to it and then i get the infamous error "smart sync is experiencing an issue" and will never go away from there. If I uninstall the PC app, uninstall it off my phone, reinstall it all, it's fine UNTIL i connect my phone back to the account at which point same ignorant error message appears. Until about 6 months ago I NEVER had an issue with my phone synching to my dropbox account, now it's nothing more than a piece of junk! I WILL NOT RENEW MY ACCOUNT AGAIN..

title: iHeartRadio: Radio, Podcasts & Music On Demand
description:
Your Music, Your Stations, And #1 For Podcasts. All Free.

Stream unlimited music, thousands of live radio stations, podcasts and playlists for any mood or activity, all in one app. The iHeartRadio app for Android Phone and Tablet is easy to use and best of all, it's FREE.
 
Download the iHeartRadio Android app today and start listening to your favorite live radio stations, podcasts and music playlists!


The Best Live & Local Radio Stations
‚Ä¢ Discover thousands of local AM and FM radio stations live near you and from cities across the globe.
‚Ä¢ Our Radio App allows you to tune in to top radio stations, music, breaking news, sports, talk and comedy radio shows.
‚Ä¢ Hear sports radio stations like ESPN Radio, Fox Sports Radio, FNTSY Sports Radio, and more.
‚Ä¢ Listen to top sports personalities discuss the latest news around the NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, NCAA, Soccer, Golf, and Tennis.

The iHeartRadio Podcast App - now #1 for Podcasts
‚Ä¢ Our Podcast App features the most popular podcasts from NPR, Gimlet, How Stuff Works, ESPN Podcasts, Big Money Players Network, TED, Wondery, and from popular personalities like The Ron Burgundy Podcast, Anna Faris Is Unqualified Podcast, The Herd with Colin Cowherd Podcast, The Joe Rogan Podcast, Ben Shapiro Podcast, Bobby Bones Podcast, Armchair Expert with Dax Shepard, Chelsea Handler Podcast, and more.
‚Ä¢ Follow your favorite podcasts and download podcast episodes to your Android device to listen offline, without the need for WiFi.
‚Ä¢ Explore popular and trending shows with our iHeartRadio Podcast App charts. The Top 100 Chart refreshes every Monday.
‚Ä¢ Our podcast app and podcast player allow you to experience podcast playback at your desired speed of 0.5x, 1x, 1.25x, 1.5x, and 2x.


Free Music Playlists - perfect for any moment
‚Ä¢ Listen to thousands of hand curated song playlists on the free iHeartRadio Playlist App. Organized by mood, activity, decade and genre to make it easy to find something that‚Äôs the perfect soundtrack for any moment.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy the sound of 'Your Weekly Mixtape' - music discovery made easy. A weekly playlist of songs we‚Äôve curated based on the music you love and the music you‚Äôre listening to right now. We‚Äôll refresh your mixtape every Monday with a new batch of tracks we know you‚Äôll vibe to throughout your week.
‚Ä¢ Explore our Cloud based audio options directly from your phone.

Play Free Artist Radio Stations
‚Ä¢ Use our library of millions of songs to create personalized music stations based on your favorite artists and  genres like Country, Top 40, Pop, Hip Hop, R&B, EDM, Rock, Alternative, Classical, Indie, Folk, Gospel, Christian, Dance, and more.


The Ultimate Station Made Just for You
‚Ä¢ 'My Favorites Radio' collects all of the songs you love in one free personalized station.

Premium Features
Listen absolutely free with ads, or take control of your listening experience with iHeartRadio Plus‚Ñ¢ and iHeartRadio All Access‚Ñ¢.
‚Ä¢ Search and play any song, album and playlist with our library of millions of songs on demand
‚Ä¢ Save and replay any song with our music app from the radio
‚Ä¢ Enjoy unlimited skips
‚Ä¢ Download music to your Android Phone or Tablet to listen offline from Google Play
‚Ä¢ Create unlimited music hits playlists

Join our community!
‚Ä¢ Facebook: http://on.fb.me/1F1TcFX
‚Ä¢ Instagram: http://bit.ly/1e1AOUS
‚Ä¢ Twitter: http://bit.ly/1HZk5KQ
‚Ä¢ Blog: http://bit.ly/1GiT59D

For Feedback and Help
Tell us how we can improve by sharing your thoughts at https://help.iheart.com


iheart.com/terms
iheart.com/privacy

¬© 2019 iHeartMedia, Inc.

comments: I've been using iheart for a little over a year with all access and it's great if you want to listen to an album from almost any band or musician, I like to create custom playlists too. the reason for the 2 stars: say I start listening to a custom radio station, I give some songs a thumb up and some a thumb down. They will continue to play the same songs, on top of that they will play songs that I gave a thumbs down to. When you do give a thumbs down they will continue to play the song.

I have a very good experiance with this app. I love how you can can choose from different geners of music. There is not much ads eithier. You can also have this app open and play a game and the music will still play. You can also play different radio stations. There are in app purchases than Can be made but its not nesaccary. Over all this is a GREAT app and i love soo much. Listen to your favorite music today and dowload this :) :)

Why does it want to play from the newest pod cast to the oldest. Always having to manually choose the next cast. Also. I dislike when you are listen to a cast and you want to close all apps and the cast stops. This doesn't happen with other radio apps. They still play and you can access the controls from the pull down menu. I have enjoyed many pod cast. But wish there was a way to make a play list.

App really sucks. I listen to Rover's Morning Glory and there are nothing but CONSTANT problems loading the pod cast. I am a few days behind listening to the main show so trying to catch up with the pod cast is damn near impossible. My most recent problems include the sloooow motion talk (although the commercial you play, plays flawless) and it doesn't save your place when it just closes itself out. I have a galaxy s9 if that matters. You guys really need to fix this

Nice app but it does have the usual ads, however, if there has to be ads, I wish they would at least be in a language I understand. That is pretty annoying though the ads aren't all that often. The search feature works for searching for a specific station or podcast as long at you know the name but doesn't seem to search descriptions so it's not all that helpful. Otherwise this is a good app. Low data usage considering the nature of the app which is great for someone living in rural Canada.

title: Calorie Counter - MyFitnessPal
description:
Whether you want to lose weight, tone up, get healthy, change your habits, or start a new diet MyFitnessPal has you covered. Our members have lost over 200 million pounds and 88% of people who track for at least 7 days on MyFitnessPal lose weight. Sign up for FREE and start living a happier and healthier life today!

See for yourself why MyFitnessPal is the world‚Äôs most popular health and fitness app.

‚ñåTRACKING FOOD IS FAST AND EASY 
‚ñ† Biggest Food Database -- 11+ million foods in our database including global items and cuisines. 
‚ñ† Barcode Scanner -- Simply scan barcodes to log foods. 4+ million barcodes recognized. 
‚ñ† Recipe Importer -- Easily import the nutrition information for the recipes you cook.
‚ñ† Restaurant Logging -- Quickly log menu items from your favorite restaurants.
‚ñ† Food Insights -- Learn how to make healthier choices about the foods you eat. 
‚ñ† Personalized Experience -- Create your own foods, recipes, and meals and save favorites. 
‚ñ† Calorie Counter -- We automatically calculate the calories in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Macro Tracker -- We automatically calculate the macros (carbs, fat, protein) in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Track All Nutrients -- Calories, macros (carbs, fat, protein), sugar, fiber, cholesterol, vitamins, and more.
‚ñ† Customize Your Diary -- Log breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks or create your own meals. 
‚ñ† Water Tracking -- Log water in cups, ounces or ml. We save your recently logged amounts.

‚ñåREACH YOUR GOALS
‚ñ† Choose A Goal -- We support weight loss, weight gain, and weight maintenance goals.  
‚ñ† Goal Setting -- Create your own goals or let us create personalized goals for you, including calorie and macros goals.
‚ñ† Change Habits -- It's almost like having a nutrition coach right inside your pocket.

‚ñåLOG YOUR EXERCISE AND STEPS 
‚ñ† Connect 50+ Apps & Devices -- Syncing your workouts is easy and automatic.
‚ñ† Choose From 350+ Exercises -- Or create your own exercises and workouts. 
‚ñ† Log Cardio Exercises -- Including running, walking, biking, swimming, yoga, pilates and more. 
‚ñ† Log Strength Exercises -- Including sets, reps, and weight per set. 
‚ñ† Track Steps -- Set a daily step goal and see a graph of your step history. 
‚ñ† We connect with all your favorite apps and devices -- Including Fitbit, Jawbone UP, Garmin, MapMyFitness, Runkeeper, Strava, Runtastic, Misfit, Withings, HealthKit, UA Record and many more!

‚ñåGET SUPPORT AND MOTIVATION 
‚ñ† Add Friends -- Connect with friends for an extra layer of support and accountability.
‚ñ† Join Our Community -- Find motivation, support, tips, and advice in our active forums. 
‚ñ† Newsfeed Updates -- Share your accomplishments and see friend‚Äôs progress in the newsfeed.

‚ñåCELEBRATE YOUR SUCCESS 
‚ñ† Chart Your Progress -- Stay motivated with a graph of how you‚Äôre improving over time.
‚ñ† Progress Photos -- Add photos to your weight entries to see and celebrate your progress. 
‚ñ† Nutrition Reports -- View a history of your calories, macros, and nutrient intake. 
‚ñ† Share Your Progress -- Help inspire friends and family members on their own health journey.

Download MyFitnessPal and start living a happier and healthier life today!

For our full terms and conditions and our privacy policy, please visit: https://account.underarmour.com/privacy?locale=en

recentChanges:
Whether you want to log your lowest weight in years, your first run in weeks, or your heart healthy afternoon snack, we know you count on MyFitnessPal to be working smoothly.

Want to try new features before everyone else? Join our beta program: http://undrarmr.co/2o6qBid

We hope you enjoy and happy tracking!
comments: I can't change my photo, it still shows me 169 days streak and it's always crashing and freezing. I reinstalled the app - didn't help, so I deleted my account and created new one and I am still experiencing the same issues. In the past it didn't take so much data, but now it takes about 700MB monthly just because of some useless features. This app has been ruined down in the present. The simplier was the app the better it was. Please, give us back our old good MyFitnessPal. (1 year experience)

So, I'm confused about how the diary is supposed to work? I click diary complete and then it shows the projection, but then I can only X out, which brings me back to the diary and I am still able to "complete diary" and/or add food/water/exercise to the day. How does that work? The UI is really odd. Otherwise it seems to be working fine.

This app has been great for me. It finds a lot of foods that aren't exactly the norm and has a scanner. For some reason though, it doesn't seem to recognize when I've entered info and it will send me reminders to input meals during the day that are already in the program. Overall.... Highly recommend. I'm on day 10 and am down 4 lbs.

I am just using the free version but still very helpful in keeping track of what I eat and how much cals i have left. There is a search capability you can just input the name of the food (even name of the dish) and you will be provided several choices where you choose the quantity and the corresponding calories for that. May I suggest that maybe you can incorporate letting us change the daily calorie goal in the free version. Thank you.

Really good to keep track of everything. I wish I could give it 4.5 stars, the only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars is the stuff hidden behind paywall. But I understand that I guess. Love how you can track your macros and other nutrients in the app. I also wish it was a bit easier to see multiple days at a glance but it's not too hard. Overall great and I use it every day.

comments: Platform is malfunctioning purchased a subscription and when I'm on the app it goes back to me not having a subscription recognized on platform. I have to close the app and reopen it. It does not always work though. I am unhappy because this platform has been unstable for a couple years. I have had the app on different phones and still it malfunctions

The app is absolutely worthless unless you pay for their (rather expensive) monthly premium. You cannot see who is interested in you, who has liked your profile, etc...Basically the only thing that this app lets you do is play its incomprehensible mini game included with it. Waste of time and phone storage, darling. Maybe you'll be worth something someday though, hm?

I like this app but is problem is my keyboard wont open when I want to make now text post on my phone i don't understand why you ask for tickets when people explain a problem when you can actually ask yourself why is it happening? I have to constantly tap where the keyboard should appear and I've only experienced this issue here I can tap for a very long time before the keyboard appears and that's a hit and miss because it doesn't always work

This is the best app out there if you're looking to get spammed with nothing but bots. I'm not sure I've seen 1 legitimate human so far. Within the first 24 hours I have 88 bots, and a constant stream of spam/scam messages keeping me up well into the night. The app is more like a game vs an actual serious dating app. Don't consider this app if you're actually trying to be serious with your life.

When you pay for premium account, they still show you ads when they specifically advertise that you won't see any. . they are double dipping by charging people for premium and also getting the money by showing these premium users ads. ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüòî Update :I contacted support a few times they just generic responses thanks for feedback type response and close the ticket. Deleting.

recentChanges:
We are constantly updating our app for better reliability and performance.
We are always happy to hear from you. If you have any issues with the app, please send us your feedback.
comments: On 3/17 I paid for a 3 month introductory offer for 4.99 a month. To this point I have been unable to get on Stars and watch a single show of the only reason I signed up. Every time I try to sign in it gives me a message stating there is already an account under that name. I was on the phone on hold (supposed to be 20 minutes) for over an hour no never receive any answer or assistance. They took my money out for payment. Why can't I log in on my tablet or o my android. It's downloaded ants the problem? Barbara Tamburo

So irritated! I have the app on my phone and smart TV. When I try to play app on my TV it doesn't load completely and when i can finally get to the show I'm looking for it won't load to play now. Been working okay fir a while but now i can't watch anything! So frustrating that I give up! Oh and no closed captioning?! Not cool at all! Please help!

App immediately takes me to create account screen where I'm stuck in a loop. I put in my email and password and of course it says an account already exists with that email. When I try to back out it gives me a message saying I've already paid but if I want to access content I have to input my information. There are no other options on this screen.

The app certainly gets the job done, however it's far from the smoothest experience. It can be difficult to find new things of interest to watch, particularly without proper genre browsing and no recommendations. As well, streaming to a Chromecast is finicky. There's no option to skip intros or recaps and there's no autoplay for watching episodes back to back. Episodes also occasionally start in the wrong language. Hopefully these things will get fixed in the future.

I wish they would give an option to disable autoplay...this is a common feature on streaming apps! At least play videos from my playlist! There's a lot of older content too. I probably won't renew at the end of my subscription period. The app also uses over a gigabyte of storage...why? Netflix uses 212mb. Disney+ uses 345mb, and prime uses 627mb...smh

recentChanges: - Minor bug fixes
comments: in my experience of using this app, it was great. their stories and content were great and it's easy to use. but my problem is the coins. can you try use a different methods to get some free coins like watching an advertisement to get some free coins, play a mini game to get some prize, and etc. sorry if this is too much but this is my opinion. if you exceed my expectations, i'll give you 5 stars. hope you understand.

If you're a fan of web comics this is a must have. Webtoon has a massive collection of high quality comics that update regularly. It's kind of refreshing to be able to stumble across a comic and not find out the artist went on a permanent hiatus a month ago. While I have a lot of praise there is also a number of issues with this app. The app is buggy and the coin system (whether you agree in a paying system or not) is not designed well. Let's say you pay for the next 4 episodes now you either have to continue paying every week to receive the most recent episode or you're going to have to wait four weeks for you the next episode to become free. To me that sounds more like a trap then a purchasable service. Finally my biggest issue and the reason I'm writing this in the first place is the lack of communication between the app and the website. If I've been reading a comic using the website on my computer and the go catch a train or something I cant just bring up the app and go from where I left off I have to spend half my time working out my most recently read page because the app only remembers from the last time I was on my phone. This app has a lot of potential I hope these issues get fixed in the future.

I really liked all these content that had been created and that I get to read them, but I would like my "read" status for each episode to maybe sync to cloud like the rest of the data? Like subscriptions. It is kinda annoying to have to scan through some of the episodes to find out what I have and haven't read. It would have been a 5 star if that was a feature

I absolutely love the app, tons of amazing stories and easy to operate, but I have a Samsung and when I read a comic sometimes the page gets stuck then glitches back to the main screen and it can happen over and over again on the same EPISODE, I thought it was just my old phone, but now I have a new one I know it's not the phone it's the app, I really hope you can get it fixed so I can read and enjoy all of the amazing stories y'all publish!

Love the comics (glad they are translated). I'm so impatient, so I do cave to purchase the coins once I binge read the comic. However, if you don't want to purchase coins you have to wait a certain amount of time to pass before able to view. However, all the creators out there works hard on their stories. Some great stories. Sub Zero, Drawn to you, True Beauty, Freaking Romance, Let's Play, Magical Forest, Midnight Poppy Land, Dangerous Session and many more amazing reads!! There are some bugs.

title: CBS - Full Episodes & Live TV
description:
Stream full episodes of your favorite shows the day after they air for FREE! Plus, unlock more than 10,000 episodes, exclusive original series and live TV, including sporting events like the NFL on CBS, when you subscribe to CBS All Access.

Free CBS app users can: 
‚Ä¢ Stream the latest episodes FREE. Catch up on the latest primetime, daytime and late-night episodes in HD. 
‚Ä¢ Watch your local CBS station live using your TV provider credentials.

CBS All Access subscribers can: 
‚Ä¢ Stream 4 channels of live TV: your local CBS station (including the NFL on CBS), 24/7 news coverage on CBSN, live scores + highlights on CBS Sports HQ and 24/7 entertainment news on ET Live.
‚Ä¢ Obsess over originals. Watch subscriber-only original series like The Twilight Zone, Star Trek: Discovery, The Good Fight and Why Women Kill.
‚Ä¢ Download and watch offline with a Commercial Free plan. 
‚Ä¢ Watch thousands of episodes, live and on demand, like hit series SEAL Team and Survivor.  
‚Ä¢ Binge a classic. Catch up on ad-free classic series like the original Twilight Zone, Star Trek, Beverly Hills 90210, I Love Lucy and more.


Try CBS All Access FREE now! After your trial, it‚Äôs only $5.99/month for the Limited Commercials plan or $9.99/month for the Commercial Free plan.
(Live TV includes commercials and select shows have promotional interruptions. Downloaded content is accessible for earlier of 30 days from date of download or 48 hours from start of playback. Downloaded content is not playable outside the U.S.) 

Download the app now to get started!


Payment will be charged at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at $5.99 per month for the Limited Commercials plan and $9.99 for the Commercial Free plan. You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal by going to your device Account Settings after purchase. If subscription is canceled, cancellation will be effective at end of then-current subscription period. No refunds. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription to CBS All Access Commercial Free.

Show and episode availability subject to change. Please note use of the CBS app is limited to United States. Video is accessible via 3G, 4G, LTE, and WiFi networks. Data charges may apply. Live TV subject to availability. Other restrictions apply.

Please note: This app features Nielsen‚Äôs proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings. Please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information. 

For additional information about this app‚Äôs video services, including your choices, please visit http://legalterms.cbsinteractive.com/video-services.

http://legalterms.cbsinteractive.com/eula

Terms of Use:
http://legalterms.cbsinteractive.com/terms-of-use

Privacy Policy:
http://legalterms.cbsinteractive.com/privacy

California Do Not Sell My Info:
https://ca.privacy.cbs/donotsell

California Privacy/Info We Collect:
https://ca.privacy.cbs

recentChanges: Bug Fixes and UI Improvements
comments: This CBS media streaming app does what it is supposed to: stream content, both free and subscription-based. I started using it on a Moto G7 and now on a Samsung A50, both running Android 9, and it works just fine. Do I wish there weren't any ads? Sure. Did I know what I was signing up for? Yes. Yes I did. So, unless something legitimately wrong or bad happens, I'm going to give it 5 stars.

I have to say that I really have enjoyed Star Trek Picard and Discovery, but I have an issue that needs attention please. We need a way to access the "Full screen" mode. Laptops are not like televisions, so the "widescreen" mode you have is reducing the Laptop screen size. We appreciate your assistance with this problem. Can we have an option please to exit "widescreen" and go to "Full screen" mode in the Future? A small request hopefully, as we do pay for the streaming service. Thank you!

This app is not the same as it was the first time I tried it.The first time there were not as many ads as there are now, and it played and casted better than it does now. The show I try to watch has problems casting, when it does work it disconnects then I start it again and instead of starting where it left off it starts at the beginning. By the time you get the program back to where you were it cuts off again. Very aggravating! Thinking about canceling this app just not worth the aggravation

The free access is bogus. I signed up for the free trial & I'm supposed to have limited commercials. I don't. I have constant commercials just like before. False advertising to lure people in. If I could give less than 1 star I would. Cancelling trial since no sense in having it when everything is the same as the free app. Just when I think this app can't get any worse it did. Trying to watch the young & the restless & for the past 45 min I've been watching nothing but commercials which I hate.

I just did your new update and its horrible. Cant even watch my soap. It keeps stopping for long periods! It was fine before, dont fix what isnt broken!!! Now its 3/19/2020 and its doing it again after doing your app update. All i get is a circle in the middle of the screen going around. No other apps have that problem!!! You need an update to fix the update!!! 3/20/2020, I still cant watch Y&R!!!! I get circle going around in middle of screen! It stops for a second, cant understand to 2 words.

title: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
description:
Be together whenever, with our free* all-in-one communication app, complete with unlimited text, voice, video calling and group video chat features. Easily sync your messages and contacts to your Android phone and connect with anyone, anywhere. 
 
FREE VIDEO CALLS TO STAY CONNECTED
Keep your friends and family close with unlimited live video chatting - like facetime, but works across devices (Android, iOS, etc.). Host group video calls with up to 8 people, with high-quality audio, high definition video, and interactive video features like face filters.  
 
UNLIMITED FREE TEXT & PHONE CALLS 
Skip exchanging phone numbers and simply send a message to your Facebook friends, even if they‚Äôre across the world.  Enjoy high-quality voice and text messaging on mobile, tablet, and desktop. 
 
RECORD AND SEND VOICE AND VIDEO MESSAGES
When text just won't cut it, just hit record and send. Say, sing, show, or shout it out loud.
 
TURN OFF THE LIGHTS IN DARK MODE 
Give your eyes some rest with a sleek new look that darkens the colors of the chat interface. 
 
EXPRESS YOURSELF WITH STICKERS, GIFS, AND EMOJIS 
Use custom stickers to show your creative side. You can even add effects and filters to video calls.
 
SEND FILES, PHOTOS, AND VIDEOS 
There‚Äôs no limit to the number of files you want to share with your friends.
 
SEND MONEY SECURELY AND EASILY (within US only)
Send and receive money from friends in the app by adding your debit card or PayPal account.
 
SHARE YOUR LOCATION
Suggest a meeting spot or tell friends where you are by sharing your location with just a few taps.
 
CHAT WITH BUSINESSES
Easily connect with your favorite businesses to make reservations, get customer support, find deals and more.
 
BRING SMS INTO MESSENGER
No need to open multiple apps to stay in touch. Use one app for SMS and Messenger. 

COMPATABLE ACROSS PLATFORMS 
Chat with friends across an array of devices, like desktop, Portal, and iOS.
 
Privacy Policy: https://www.facebook.com/about/privacy/ 
LEARN MORE about Messenger texting and group video chat at: http://messenger.com (http://messenger.com/)   

* Data rates apply

recentChanges: We update the app regularly so that we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Messenger features. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements. Thanks for using Messenger!
comments: Since a couple of weeks the direct share link on a Samsung Galaxy S10 does not work any more. It does not get you the option to choose which people to send to. It the application was opened, it basically takes you too it, but if not, absolutely nothing happens. Direct share works with other apps, though!

What's wrong whith this app?! Messages can't be sent on my screen, while others see my messages and it doesn't showing me that. My messages are sent but not delivered or seen. And my chat list isn't loading. It happens to me every day and resetting end reinstalling isn't working. Fix this Facebook. It's annoying. üôÑ It started 3-4 weeks ago.

Text works great. But when I call people it seems like the voice and video calls don't always work here in Cleburne TX. When I call people on the other side of the world it works fine but here in my town the calls don't always go through or get dropped or bad quality. Maybe the internet availability needs improvement in my town.

Messenger recent update is bugged and I have tested it already on all 3 devices of mine, both android and iOS. Whenever I am trying to share something through messenger (be it a YouTube video, a photo, or an audio clip I have recorded in my phone's internal app), it will only pull up the Messenger app as if I am not sharing anything!!

messenger sucks anymore.....have not been able to share and send articles to my friends as I did before, by clicking on share, then messenger and then name used to come up and I would click send next to their name, but will not and has not done for three going on four days today and do not know why! Is there something wrong with messenger? Can you please fix this problem and asap, thanks!

title: Duolingo: Learn Languages Free
description:
Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Hebrew, Welsh and English. 

Totally fun and free. New! Arabic, Latin.

Practice your speaking, reading, listening and writing skills! 
You'll improve your vocabulary and grammar skills by answering questions and completing lessons. Start with basic verbs, phrases, and sentences, and learn new words daily.

‚Ä¢ Google Play's Editor's Choice and "Best of the Best" of 2013 and 2014!

‚Ä¢ "Far and away the best language-learning app." ‚ÄîThe Wall Street Journal

‚Ä¢ "Duolingo may hold the secret to the future of education." ‚ÄîTIME Magazine

‚Ä¢ "Among apps for learning a language, you can't beat Duolingo." ‚ÄîPC Magazine.

‚Ä¢ "The most productive means of procrastination ever discovered. The short lesson blocks are painless and peppy, and reaching the next level (and then the level after that) becomes addictive." ‚ÄîSlate


Duolingo is changing the way people learn languages.

‚Ä¢ It's free, for real.

‚Ä¢ It's fun. Advance by completing bite-sized lessons, and track your progress with shiny achievements.

‚Ä¢ It's effective. 34 hours of Duolingo are equivalent to a semester of university-level education.


Send any feedback to android@duolingo.com

Use Duolingo on the Web at https://www.duolingo.com

recentChanges: Want to keep an eye on the competition in your Leaderboard? Now you can see who else is active, marked by a green dot in the corner of their avatar. We‚Äôre not saying this means they‚Äôre about to pass you ‚Äì but we‚Äôre not NOT saying that. ; ) This feature also appears on your Duolingo Friends list and profiles.
comments: At first, it seemed like a really fun, cool app with tons of free features. Then it began having issues. Half the time, my settings won't load and my profile won't refresh. The microphone randomly cut off and never came back on even after an hour of waiting. They're constantly bombarding you to pay for a pro version. Why would I do that when the app seems like it's still in beta with all the constant errors? I'll likely be uninstalling.

The app works great and at first I loved it. As it gets more difficult (which it should), the loss of hearts is irritating. Hearts are essentially the number of mistakes you are allowed. If you run out of hearts, you can't do anything with the app for hours. You can get more hearts with gems, but they run out too. The only way around this is to pay for the premium edition and poof..... the "free" app isn't free anymore.

Feels like a video game. It was great after I figured out how to turn off sound effects. The speaking exercises are pretty buggy. The app always thinks I'm done talking if you pause for more than half a second. The app will say that I got it wrong because I failed to say the rest of the words. I was getting to them! Can I breathe for half a second between words? I want to learn how to speak by sounding out the words slowly, but Duolingo won't let me do that :-(

There are plethora of languages to learn and the approach is natural, progress is easy. However, a few cons : not enough audio of sentences, and most are of poor quality. Example in Vietnamese when the woman speaks, sound is terrible. It would be better if on the tablet the text blocks were bigger. Also, the new heart system makes the app really useless for too long. It was better before. Those who cannot afford to pay will just end up losing interest.

Great app! I would love it if they would add a course for English speakers to learn Thai though. Also, once you complete a language it would be cool if you could re-activate the checkpoints so you could keep raising your levels, but without having to do each lesson individually. Finally, I would love to have the Groups/Clubs feature brought back. The social aspect of the app is really lacking. Overall though, it is my favorite language app so far.

title: ESPN
description:
Watch thousands of live events and shows from the ESPN networks plus get scores, on-demand news, highlights, and expert analysis. Subscribe to the ESPN+ streaming service for live sports, exclusive originals, premium articles, fantasy tools, and more.

Watch on ESPN:
‚Ä¢ NFL (Monday Night Football) ‚Ä¢ NBA ‚Ä¢ MLB ‚Ä¢ College Sports (football, basketball, baseball, softball, and more) ‚Ä¢ Golf (The Masters) ‚Ä¢ Soccer (UEFA Euro and MLS) ‚Ä¢ Tennis (Wimbledon, US Open, Australian Open) ‚Ä¢ eSports ‚Ä¢ ESPN Shows (SportsCenter, PTI, First Take, Sportsnation, NBA: The Jump, and more) ‚Ä¢

ESPN+ Subscribers:
Stream exclusive live sports and ESPN+ Originals without cable--all in HD.

Sign up for ESPN+ and get access to the streaming service that delivers live sports from the best leagues in the world plus premium articles and fantasy tools. Get live events from the UFC, MLS, NHL, international soccer, college sports, and more. Enjoy the complete 30 for 30 library and exclusive ESPN+ Original shows from the biggest names in sports including Peyton Manning, Dana White, Kevin Durant, Alex Morgan, and more all inside the ESPN app.

Highlights and scores from what you care about. From news about your favorite sports or team playing right now, the home tab has you covered. Fast access to scores for your favorite teams and leagues and the top games of the day in the scores tab. Also, subscribe to your favorite ESPN Podcasts or listen live to ESPN Radio.

ESPN, ESPN2, ESPN3, ESPNU, SECN, and more are all available to stream live in the ESPN App. Access to live video is determined by your TV provider and package and, in some instances, your Internet service provider.

Due to contractual limitations with certain content, especially play-by-play broadcasts, there are times when the schedule that's on-air won't match the schedule that's online. If you have specific schedule questions, please contact the station directly by visiting their website.

Terms of Use - https://disneytermsofuse.com/
Privacy Policy - http://www.disneyprivacycenter.com
ESPN+ Subscriber Agreement - https://es.pn/plus-terms

Your California Privacy Rights - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-california-privacy-rights/
Do Not Sell My Information - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/dnsmi

Before you download this app, please consider that it includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests. You may choose to control targeted advertising within mobile applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device's advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads).

Please note: This app features Nielsen's proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen's TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information. You may also visit Settings in the app to opt out of Nielsen measurement.
