comments: The "Watch" tab does not work. I am logged into my television subscription through the ESPN app. But I get the dreaded spinning wheel indefinitely. This used to work many months ago. I cannot find an answer as to what changed. The rest of the app works fine for regular sports news to read. But the video "Watch" tab is a big letdown.

Tech nightmare. Half the time, I click on videos and they never play. It's like I'm not even clicking on the video. You can still scroll though the categories and everything but when you click on a video it doesn't play, it stays on the main menu. The streaming is inconsistent even on wifi. Video plays for about 1 minute then buffers for 30 seconds then plays again. This happens about 1/3 of the time I try to watch or stream anything on the ESPN+ side.

I detested the idea of paying for cable and an additional sub to the content provider itself. Reluctantly, bit the bullet and subscribed. After a few docs there appeared to be a noticeable delay between the video/audio on mobile devices. Saw reviews that ESPN ignores issues/feedback reported. Sent them a message anyway. Of course the generic response back, 'Were aware of the issue and are working to resolve it as quickly as possible' ...any chance it gets fixed before I cancel?

Can use more upgrades and better features. Doesn't contain a dark mode and some links are suspect after you open it. Reduce the ad content, its overkill. And Autoplay videos can burn through your data like a wildfire. ESPN is a flagship sports network, how about doing the same for the app. ü§îü§îü§î

I don't know if it's just my phone or if the app sucks, but i have had problems with using this app over 2 phones. Extremely slow and laggy, don't expect to be able to scroll well at all. Also takes forever to open the app and notifications, and can't open videos that have a notifications. The only reason it gets 3 stars is because it does have good content and it's a great app when it works, but very buggy and poorly designed.

title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax
description:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep
* 7 and 21 day programs for both beginner and advanced users
* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts
* Breathing exercises to help you relax
* Exclusive music engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep
* Unguided timed meditation
* Open-ended meditation
* 30+ soothing nature sounds and scenes to use during meditation, yoga or to help you sleep

Track your progress with:

* Daily streaks
* Time spent meditating

Calm is loved by the press:

* ‚ÄúI‚Äôm generally wary of meditation apps because they sometimes weave in too much mystic talk for my taste. But Calm instead contains guidance like ‚ÄòConcentrate on your body‚Äô‚Äù - New York Times

* ‚ÄúIn the frenetic, crazy, digital world we live in, sometimes it's necessary to take a step back and smell the roses‚Äù - Mashable

* ‚ÄúEliminating distraction...ended up helping me relax and realize that all the stuff I was stressing about wasn't that big a deal‚Äù - Tech Republic

* ‚ÄúFound myself similarly refreshed afterwards‚Äù - TechCrunch

Calm is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

recentChanges: As always, you can expect an original Daily Calm every day, new music and Sleep Stories every week, and new Meditation programs every month.
comments: I love the app's content, but find certain aspects of the UI to be frustrating. Definitely needs a search function and I can't understand why this hasn't already been resolved. It is hard to find the things I know I've saved and they seem to disappear completely at times. This leads me to be more anxious and frustrated as I sometimes search for ages for a specific story, meditation, or class and then ultimately give up using the app or just pick something that I can't fully delve into.

This is one of the most well-done and educational apps I have come across, and I have been so helped by the guidance and the less guidance etc variety of selections they have. Do yourself a favor and get it. I want to give it a five; however, the user interface could be organized a bit better and there are sometimes (often enough to be stressful) glitches in audio cutting out. It would be great to not only have fav meditations but also be able to organize a "my library" of fav series w/ folders

The enormous selection of content (music, sleep stories, meditations, etc.) allow me to remain calm and comfortable throughout my daily routine. I suffer from social anxiety disorder and in my short time of using Calm, I have found the content to be extremely helpful. I was recently told that I will be the Master of Ceremonies for my friend's promotion to Technical Sergeant in the USAF. I am hoping that practicing the content here will apply to this situation and that I get through it.

Beautiful sounds and songs. However you're locked out of almost all meaningful guided meditations, or relaxing stories unless you pay a subscription. The music is beautiful and I used it frequently, I just feel there's plenty of apps I can get the same from, for free. If this offered more free options then I might change my opinion, and rating.

I am on the 7 day free trial of the app and have cancelled my subscription (although from reading previous reviews I suspect I will be charged for a year now anyway). I wouldn't recommend this app - there are stories, music, relaxing scenery and meditations but there's nothing that unique that I think it justifies any sort of charge. All of the things this app offers can be found elsewhere online for free.

comments: Suffering from the Google Play Services issue like so many others. Seems to be linked to using it in Private Space, as I can access it via my public login, but can't access my pics there. I emailed data ago, but still waiting for a response. Clearly the latest updates weren't tested extensively enough. UPDATE - response asking me to email is pointless if you don't respond to my 2 attempts to contact you that way...

This app overall works great. The only issue I'm having is ever since the new update, I cant login. It said it couldn't refresh, so I deleted the app and reinstalled and now I cant login at all. Has been going on for about a week now and it sucks because I have subscription I've paid for... but cant use. Would be nice to have this resolved and have some kind of compensation for it. It sucks paying for a subscription and not being able to use it.. hopefully this gets resolved soon

The app works great, I've made some amazing connections with people. Only problem is that after about a week and some good conversations, the app deleted all my messages. The setting to back up messages should be automatically enabled and the messages shouldn't delete. All in all great app and easy to use.

I'm experiencing a problem with Grindr with the notification "Unable to connect to Google Play Services". I noticed that there was an automatic update done 3 hours ago which may be the cause of it. So, I cannot login or refresh the app at all. Is anyone else experiencing this? It's a bit frustrating as I do not want to lose my chats and whatnot. Can Devs do something about this please?

Would have given 5 stars a few weeks ago, until it stopped working in Secure Folder after the update. Contacted support, and this seems to be a feature rather than a bug. I need to keep the app in secure folder, b/c all my pics are there. The discreet logo and pin are not secure enough. Grindr still shows up on list of apps. Cancelling subscription.

Thanks for staying with Hily. Remember, you are amazing!
comments: Very comfortable dating app. The swipe system is easy to use, and the application itself is not buggy, it works quickly. Excellent and high-quality filters - shows everything correctly. It‚Äôs also a positive point that Hily is absolutely free. I activated the subscription, and personally, I really like everything. I would recommend this application to all my friends.

You pay for things that are standard with all the other apps and its not as functional so I don't see why anyone would pay for it. It also keeps switching the distance parameters to max every couple minutes so my matches are on the other side of the country, not super helpful. Plus when i change it back, it doesn't seem to impact the results anyways.

Do not use this app! I installed it out of curiosity, and after seeing that there was no one in there, wanted out. However, they do not let you delete your account, let alone remove your data (photo). When talking to support, instead of showing me how to delete the account (spoiler alert: you can't), the agent banned me! Therefore I assume they still have my data and they'll using it to inflate their numbers, maybe for a fake profile? Is there any other way I can effectively report this?

This app encourages third party to sell your data! My account got banned, and this is my first time ever got banned in all of my dating profile on multiple platforms. I have no idea why so I contacted the support. They asked me if I was using the VPN. Of course, I was, and said yes. They reactivate my profile. And got banned again a few mins later. I contacted the support, and they blame me for using the VPN. Hily wants ISP and third parties to get your data. Don't care about customers at all!!

A well-developed dating app is Hily. A friend advised me of this application a week ago, and I decided to test it. Since I have personal experience as an application developer, I can say that the design and interface are lovely and professional. Also features, there are not so many of them, but they act and help a lot. I also like that there are very detailed filters - you can find exactly who you are looking for. Excellent!

title: Life360 - Family Locator, GPS Tracker
description:
Life360‚Äôs Family Locator simplifies life in the digital world by making it easy to stay connected to the people who matter most.

With Life360 you can: 
‚Ä¢ Create your own private groups, called ‚ÄúCircles,‚Äù of loved ones, teammates -- whoever matters most and chat with them in Family Locator for FREE.
‚Ä¢ View the real-time location of Circle Members on a private family map that‚Äôs only visible to your Circle. 
‚Ä¢ Receive real-time alerts when Circle Members arrive at or leave destinations (Eliminate disruptive ‚ÄúWhere are you?‚Äù texts)
‚Ä¢ See the location of stolen or lost phones 
‚Ä¢ Enjoy a more diverse array of features and benefits than those found on similar apps 
‚Ä¢ Works on both Android Phones and iPhones

Real-Time Location Sharing

Stay connected and in sync with your entire family and eliminate the multiple texts needed to coordinate your family events and daily life. Family Locator alerts you when your family members have checked in at a location and thanks to GPS sensors in your phone, family locator can also advise if someone is running late.

Finding Family

The Life360 app uses state-of-the-art GPS location technology to report the real-time whereabouts of those that have accepted your invitation to join your circle and share their location. Simply install the Life360 Family Locator app on your phone, and invite your family. Once registered, each member appears as a unique icon on the navigational map so you‚Äôll know exactly where they are. No need to send annoying ‚ÄúWhere are your?‚Äù or ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs your ETA?‚Äù texts, the Life360 Family Locator puts this information at your fingertips. And to make life super easy, we send you alerts the moment your family arrives at an appointed location!

In order for our app to work properly, we need a few permissions. Don't worry - when you create an account, we help you through this quick and easy process.

Location - Life360 locates you and your loved ones on a shared, private map. This setting allows us to show location accurately and quickly.

Phone permission - Life360 has a feature called Driver Care Support that, with a single push of a button, connects you to a live representative over the phone.  Our live representative knows who you are and where you are to assist in roadside situations such as tows, jumps, and lockouts.  We also offer an immediate emergency response in the case of a vehicular collision.  Phone permissions allow us to connect your phone to the live representative and authenticate that you are the one calling them.

Network - This connects you to the Internet and allows us to send and receive location information to and from family members on your private map.

developerAddress:
539 Bryant St
Suite 402
San Francisco, CA
94107
recentChanges:
Introducing automated crash detection, for free!
Crash detection, one of our most loved features is now available for free to all of our users. Here's how it works: if you are involved in a car crash (either as a driver or a passenger), Life360 will notify your entire Circle and your emergency contacts so you can get help faster. You can also upgrade to Driver Protect to get emergency dispatchers sent to your location. And it covers your entire Circle, so more safety for the entire family!
comments: Worked perfectly at first, now it glitches ALL THE TIME! It used to keep accurate location, trips, and trip speed. Now it's all over the place, the trip speed rarely works, and location is highly inaccurate. I've checked for updates, checked settings to be sure all permissions were allowed and it still doesn't work right for any of our circle members. I suspect because I have the free version and they want me to spend $7.99 a month for it to work the way it should.

It used to work good, but the last week or so its been crashing and freezing and also refusing to alert me when people leave their locations. Presently its showing me inaccurate locations for people. Shows people several feet away from where they are actually located moving, when they are not actually moving. I have even seen my own icon moving around when I know for a fact I'm sitting in my home in one spot with my phone in my hand. I've checked all settings for my phone and their phones, I've done steps listed in the FAQ's. Of course some robotic response will respond to this and tell me its on my end (always blame the user) but I believe this is an app glitch.

It's very good at telling me my movements but doesn't work very well with my son's older iphone. Has so far only correctly shown me where he is twice. I have to rely on old school text messaging. Found the problem under FAQs. Life360 needs to use mobile data, which my son barely has any of, rendering this app pointless. Uninstalling.

It used to work great when I first installed it. Now GPS is always offline when it isn't. How can you depend on this to track a family member? updated post: Well they fixed it temporarily after my post. However, a few days later and we're back to the same problem - asking you to send text msg to other person to turn on location permission when it's already on.

Ever since the new update a few weeks ago my Life360 app and my son's app don't work at all. It always says that we are arriving and coming home at random times throughout the day. And it also is not accurate with the location at all. I've tried deleting the app and reinstalling it. I've tried turning on the Wi-Fi and turning off the Wi-Fi and then turning it back on I've turned off the location and then turned it back on. Nothing seems to work. I'm getting really sick of it.

Watch Japan's most popular anime with Crunchyroll. developerAddress: Ellation LLC, 444 Bush Street, San Francisco, CA 94108
recentChanges: Minor behind-the-scene changes and bug fixing
comments: Its meh, it has about 10 ads per episode, but they are at the very beginning and at the end, 5 at the start 5 at the end, so it's not that bad. Where else are you gonna watch anime for free? But my worst complaint is the buffering, it buffers like once every 2 or 3 minutes, and it takes around 10 seconds in total to stop. And I have pretty good internet. But if it wasn't that frequent or didnt exist, then I would very easily rate it 4 or 5 stars.

I really like this streaming service, but on the phone app it is filled with issues. But my major problem is that it takes so damn long to load and still when it loads sometimes it stops in the middle of an episode, or the video stops and the audio goes back a few seconds and you have to wait for the audio to catch up. And in pc you have none of these problems, so I always keep thinking, why pay for this since you can just go on pc and use an adblocker. I am really frustrated with this app.

The app really has a problem. Whenever I click on any video, the app tells me that its stopped working and that I need to reload. I've uninstalled and installed the app multiple times and the problem still won't go away. I really want to watch anime when I'm not at home but can't because Crunchyroll has "stopped working". I'm not even going to try anymore. Maybe get that fixed, please. However, this is a great place to watch all of your favorites for free and you get new episodes really quick :)

I enjoy the app for the most part and I love the selection. Although I cannot go a single day without there being constant loading and buffering issues. There are apps like the Netflix one that I've never had an issue with, but does the same thing as this one... stream shows. It baffles me as to how this problem has yet to be fixed after reading so many others who also have this issue. I just want to be able to watch my shows without it constantly stopping and starting. First world problems aye.

Nice app...when you actually get to watch it. Ads in a free version are fine, when they work. A 25 sexond ad takes about 2 minutes as it buffers constantly. Some ads run fine. Some of them need me to restart the episode as they just don't play. It's not every ad by the way. The figurine site ad works fine, but the insurance one freezes at about the 6 second mark for example. Pretty sure it isn't my connection as well. Otherwise the app works as intended.

recentChanges: Minor Bug Fixes
comments: When I top up the credit the money was delayed and when I tried to press the button it actually move straight away resulting in one waste of chance. Too much lagging issue. Claw does not move and the price per game is too expensive. not recommended. Help page doesn't really do what it needs to. Free play ticket is pretty useless as most of the games cannot play, and the terms did not mention how to use it. Overall very bad experience.

EDITED When I first started this app it was really fun, and there was a nice balance between hard and easy machines. Now all the claws do is lightly nudge items. I'm giving this a one star rating, not because they've raised the difficulties on machines. But because I've had a charge issue, I've been emailing support for the last month and a half with no response to help me. All they did was set my account to -50,000tp so I can no longer play. But without any reason why, and not one email back.

This game is very difficult. The claws are super tricky to figure out and generally are very weak. Most of the prizes are hard to actually win and will take more than 2-3 tries to actually get. That being said, the game gives you tons of free plays which helps learn the cranes, and winning is possible. Patience is the key here, watch other players try, and learn where the claws have their strengths.

Overpriced gameplay. I can get play this outside for 1/3 of the price and have a confirmed official plushie if I spend 50 or more in the arcade. (Singapore) Also rigged gameplay. I witnessed and watched someone who pushed the prize to the edge which only require 1 more try to drop it down then SUDDENLY that particular claw machine is up for maintenance. Also they are using transparent hard plastic around the drop zone to make the drop harder making the prize bounce back. (looking carefully)

While I enjoy challenges, the way these are set up are so difficult it's nearly impossible to ever win anything, making it become less and less enjoyable to play until now after having this only a few months I look at it and think why bother? There are better ways to waste your money than this.

title: Fitbit
description:
Live a healthier, more active life with Fitbit, the world‚Äôs leading app for tracking all-day activity, workouts, sleep and more. Use the app on its own to track basic activity and runs on your phone, or connect with one of Fitbit‚Äôs many activity trackers and the Aria Scale to get a complete picture of your health‚Äîincluding steps, distance, calories burned, sleep, weight, and more.

TRACK ACTIVITY: Accurately record your steps and distance with MobileTrack when you carry your phone. For all-day tracking of stats like calories burned, active minutes, and sleep, pair the app with a Fitbit tracker.

RUN SMARTER: Enhance runs, walks and hikes by using MobileRun to track your pace, time and distance. You can also control your music, get voice cues and use your phone‚Äôs GPS to map your routes. (Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.) 

RECORD WORKOUTS: Use your Fitbit tracker to track your exercise, then check the app to see your stats, their impact on your day, and how your performance is improving. 

MONITOR HEART RATE: Use a Fitbit tracker with PurePulse‚Ñ¢ to analyze heart rate graphs in the app. Identify trends, manage stress and see the results of your workouts. Review resting heart rate trends to see when your fitness is improving.

LOG FOOD FASTER: Easily log calories with our barcode scanner, calorie estimator, and expanded food database of more than 350,000 foods. See your meal history at a glance, and get nutritional insights.

MEASURE HYDRATION: Quickly log your water intake to make sure you‚Äôre properly hydrated during workouts and throughout the day.

SET & MANAGE GOALS: Create weight, nutrition and exercise goals, and start a food plan to stay on track. Then get a visual picture of your progress with colorful, easy-to-read charts and graphs. 

SEE HOW YOU SLEEP: Set sleep goals in the app, and use a Fitbit tracker to monitor how much time you spent awake, restless or peacefully sleeping. 

SHARE & COMPETE: Connect with friends and family by sharing stats, sending direct-messages, and competing on the leaderboard or in Fitbit Challenges.

STAY MOTIVATED: Get a nudge in the right direction with notifications that pop up when you‚Äôre close to reaching a goal or have already met one. 

SYNC WIRELESSLY: Fitbit trackers sync your stats to computers and 200+ leading devices so you can continuously track your progress without needing to plug in.

MANAGE WEIGHT: Connect wirelessly to the Aria Scale to seamlessly track your weight, BMI, lean mass and body fat percentages, and to see your weight trends over time. 

Fitbit Premium:
- Monthly and annual plans available that unlock habit-forming programs, audio & video workouts, and advanced insights.
- Payment will be charged to your Google Play Account after your free trial expires, if applicable.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
‚Äì Fitbit Terms of Service: https://www.fitbit.com/legal/terms-of-service
‚Äì Fitbit Privacy Policy: https://www.fitbit.com/legal/privacy-policy

Learn more about Fitbit products and services at www.fitbit.com.

recentChanges: *Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: Alright, it's gotten worse! Every morning, it logs me out of my Fitbit completely and can take up to hours before it responds to taps or not.

I have had Fitbit devices since 2015 and love them. However, for the better part of this month I haven't had access to my Versa because it won't sync with my Google Pixel 3 phone! It had been fine but suddenly stopped syncing. I have just discovered that it wasn't just me and my phone/Fitbit, but this is a widespread problem. I NEED HELP. I went through the regular channels but they just kept telling me to do what I have already done. My phone is not recognizing my Fitbit. I have deleted and then reinstalled but now it won't let me do that. In the meantime I misplaced my charger (I bought a new one and now have 2!) so my Versa tells me it is 8:08 a.m. March 14, when in reality it is 11:33 p.m. March 22. It's really not pretty enough to pass as a bracelet, and I want it to track my steps........

UPDATE: I followed the instructions and now it's worse. It worked for approx 24 hours, then all of a sudden lots of vibrations and my screen blank. I assumed the battery was dead, but it's been charging for 2 days and nothing , even after rebooting. My fitbit is 2 yrs old and just stopped tracking everything with the most recent upgrade to this app. It's been nearly 2 weeks now. Is this the lifespan of a Versa? My watch, nor the app work any more. The only thing is good for is telling the time.

I loved my Fitbit Charge 3 when it was new. Now a couple of years later, I felt a vibration similar to when I reach my steps goal. I looked at the screen and it was dark. Black. Off. Nada. Nothing This was a few days ago. I have charged for a couple of days. Still nothing. It will not work. I have read of others having the same experience. Does this mean the watch is dead after only 24 months or less? This is not acceptable. I do not recommend Fitbit Charge 3 and I will not buy another Fitbit product.

Fitbit will not sync. I have tried all troubleshooting methods, I have exhausted all options. Had it less than a month and it's garbage. Edit: the only way I was able to (hopefully) fix this problem, was to uninstall and reinstall the app. As stated before, I tried every other troubleshooting method prior to no avail. Second edit: no longer synching again. I'm trying to set an alarm and the dumb thing WILL NOT SYNCH.

title: Headspace: Meditation & Sleep
description:
Learn the life-changing skills of meditation in just a few minutes a day with Headspace. Find hundreds of sessions on physical health, personal growth, stress management, and anxiety relief. They are all designed to help you stress less, focus more, and feel better. Download Headspace to meditate anywhere, anytime and start living a healthier, happier life.

About Headspace
Headspace is your personal guide to health and happiness. It can help you focus, breathe, stay calm, and create the conditions for a better night‚Äôs sleep by practicing meditation and mindfulness. When you need some stress relief or lessons on creating a better sleep cycle, Headspace can help. Just download this free meditation, mindfulness, sleep app, then sit back and breathe to relax.

What this meditation and sleep app does
The Headspace meditation app teaches you how to breathe, meditate, and live mindfully. There are exercises on everything from managing anxiety to stress relief to breathing, happiness, calm, and focus. Even if you‚Äôve never meditated before, the free Basics course will teach you the essentials of meditation and mindfulness.

In the Sleep by Headspace experience, you‚Äôll find sleep meditations, relaxing sleep music, and sleepcasts to guide you to a place of rest. Sleep by Headspace was built around the needs of restless sleepers ‚Äî the screen is darker and buttons are easy to find. Use it if you have trouble falling asleep or problems with your sleep cycle.

What themes the meditations cover
Courses: Each course has a series of guided meditations designed to help you skillfully manage various topics and form healthy habits. Learn techniques to control how you breathe, deal with feelings of anxiety, get some stress relief when you‚Äôre being hard on yourself, or relax your mind during a stressful day. 
‚óã Stress & anxiety relief meditation: Managing Anxiety, Letting Go of Stress, Restlessness, Navigating Change
‚óã Falling asleep & waking up meditation sounds: Sleep, Restlessness
‚óã Personal growth meditation: Relationships, Self-Esteem, Kindness, Happiness, Acceptance, Appreciation, Balance, Patience, Generosity
‚óã Work & productivity meditation timer: Finding Focus, Prioritization, Productivity, Creativity
‚óã Life challenges meditation: Transforming Anger, Handling Sadness, Dealing With Regret, Self-Esteem, Grieving
‚óã Movement & sport meditation: Motivation, Focus, Training, Competition, Communication, Analysis, Recovery, Rehab, Concentration
‚óã Physical health mindfulness training: Mindful Eating, Coping With Cravings, Pain Management, Pregnancy, Coping With Cancer
‚óã Student guided meditation: Dealing with Distractions, Leaving Home

Sleep by Headspace:

descriptionHTML:
Learn the life-changing skills of meditation in just a few minutes a day with Headspace. Find hundreds of sessions on physical health, personal growth, stress management, and anxiety relief. They are all designed to help you stress less, focus more, and feel better. Download Headspace to meditate anywhere, anytime and start living a healthier, happier life.

About Headspace
Headspace is your personal guide to health and happiness. It can help you focus, breathe, stay calm, and create the conditions for a better night‚Äôs sleep by practicing meditation and mindfulness. When you need some stress relief or lessons on creating a better sleep cycle, Headspace can help. Just download this free meditation, mindfulness, sleep app, then sit back and breathe to relax.

What this meditation and sleep app does
The Headspace meditation app teaches you how to breathe, meditate, and live mindfully. There are exercises on everything from managing anxiety to stress relief to breathing, happiness, calm, and focus. Even if you‚Äôve never meditated before, the free Basics course will teach you the essentials of meditation and mindfulness.

In the Sleep by Headspace experience, you‚Äôll find sleep meditations, relaxing sleep music, and sleepcasts to guide you to a place of rest. Sleep by Headspace was built around the needs of restless sleepers ‚Äî the screen is darker and buttons are easy to find. Use it if you have trouble falling asleep or problems with your sleep cycle.

What themes the meditations cover
Courses: Each course has a series of guided meditations designed to help you skillfully manage various topics and form healthy habits. Learn techniques to control how you breathe, deal with feelings of anxiety, get some stress relief when you‚Äôre being hard on yourself, or relax your mind during a stressful day.

comments: This app has changed my life. I know that sounds extreme, but it truly has. I have depended on these meditations every night to sleep, and every morning. Especially during covid19...I think headspace is keeping me sane! I think it'd be cool if I could choose a set, like meditation, sleep cast, sleep music, to play automatically so I don't have to look at my bright screen. That's my ONLY idea to better this already amazing app!

This is the best app for meditation. I love Andy's soothing voice, the fun and cute animations, exercises and courses asking with how light hearted Andy is when guiding you through each. I also appreciate the personalized "Headspace recommends" and the customer service can't be beat!! I have only experienced two glitches so far, but the Team fixed both within 48 hours!

Very helpful. If it would be a free app then definitely It would take 5 star. But still nice app to meditate. I would recommend Headspace to free the basic lessons or at least till basic 2.I want to use the basics 3 of Headspace. Recently I come to know about free trail Of Headspace which Is purely useless for me bcz I have no any payment option . If you are giving free trail then give it free if i had any payment options to pay then what will be the need of using free trail.

I was excited for this app. Kinda disappointed I can see the appeal but there is on back ground noise when the people talk which makes it sound weird, to me at least. You had to have a subscription for most of the recordings, would rather listen to Michel Sealy than pay.

Edit: I uninstalled the app because I can't even log in anymore. I was really enjoying the sleep casts, but I tried to use one today and now I have to pay for them. I don't have any money so now I can't use the few parts of this app that were free up until today. Sucks that I was getting used to using them to help me sleep and now I can't. Edit: apparently I can still use 2 of the Sleepcasts, but my favorite 3 that I was using almost every night aren't available to me anymore.

title: Hinge - Dating & Relationships
description:
Hinge is the dating app for people who want to get off dating apps. And it‚Äôs working. Currently, 3 out of 4 times Hinge members want to go on a second date, we‚Äôre the #1 mobile-first dating app mentioned in the New York Times wedding section, and we‚Äôre the fastest growing dating app in the US, UK, Canada, and Australia.

üåü BUZZ ABOUT HINGE üåü
‚Ä¢ "Hinge‚Äôs CEO says a good dating app relies on vulnerability, not algorithms." - Washington Post
‚Ä¢ "Hinge is the first dating app to actually measure real-world success" - TechCrunch
‚Ä¢ "A great option for those fed up with temporary love." - TheNextWeb

HOW WE GET YOU OFF HINGE
In today‚Äôs digital world, singles are so busy matching that they‚Äôre not actually connecting, in person, where it counts. Hinge is on a mission to change that. So we built an app that‚Äôs designed to be deleted. 

‚Ä¢ We quickly learn your type. You'll only be introduced to the best people for you.
‚Ä¢ We give you a sense of someone‚Äôs personality. You'll get to know potential dates through their unique answers to prompts, and personal information like religion, height, and politics.
‚Ä¢ We make it easy to start a conversation. Every match begins by someone liking or commenting on a specific part of your profile.
‚Ä¢ We ask how your dates are going. After exchanging phone numbers with a Match, we‚Äôll follow up to hear how your date went so we can make better recommendations in the future.

The app is free to use. Members looking to see who likes them, set advanced preferences, or access Hinge Experts can upgrade to a Preferred Membership. 

Terms of Service: https://hinge.co/terms.html

recentChanges: Bug fixes & performance improvements
comments: Nice concept/different set up and cool prompts but ultimately disappointing. I don't want just to get matches & likes. Like other apps you can't make a connection that lasts than longer than a few minutes before all the sudden they stop responding. I'm a firm believer in "other fishies in the sea", but not when there's a limit of like ten you can try for, who end up not even responding. You guys were right on one thing on your commercial. This app will be deleted, just not useful.

Literally just a better experience than any other app, especially for a person of color. Only critique is that the premium experience doesn't seem to offer that much on the surface, which is fine with me. The free version is perfect. They should have a donate button and maybe a "found love" option when people find a relationship and wanna delete the app

Of course it's a bit difficult to find people on here that you click with, but that's just the reality of dating these days. In terms of dating apps, I think this might be the best one. The way the profiles are set up puts more emphasis on the actual profile, instead of just the pictures. That way you're not just swiping at eye candy. Maybe I'm just biased because I get more matches here than on tinder, but I like this app a lot.

This one is hard to rate due to the pros and cons. Pros: very easy-to-use interface, appears to be genuine users and not fake profiles, known for people looking for long-term dating, reliable with notifications assuming your settings are set correctly on your phone, various prompts that are fun to answer, and requires 6 pictures to even start liking other users' profiles. Cons: profiles feel limited with only allowing you to write 3 short sections to answer prompts, unable to write long introduction messages to users after liking something about their profile, only available as a phone app and not a website to use on your computer, only shows city/town you live in not the state (which is hard since I live near a state border), when un-matching a user you are required to answer why you don't like the user but most answers are regarding sexual harassment or abuse (which is a scary thought) and not related to attributes related to the user. A few other things I cannot think of at the moment. Again, good app, but I haven't found anyone yet. Just wish there was more prompts you could answer than just 3 written answers so you can get to know the person a little better by their profile.

Every time I start the app, it shows me the same profiles in the same order. I can go through 200 unique profiles, and the next time I open the app, I will have the exact same experience. Say I'm short on time and only swipe on 10 profiles. Next time I come back, I'll see those exact same 10 profiles, even though I have them all blocked.

title: IMVU - Create 3D Avatar and make real friends
description:
IMVU is a 3D avatar-based social experience with the largest 3D world and catalog to customize your look and meet new people. Chat with friends, roleplay and join a virtual world with millions of others for free!

IMVU is a virtual world simulator game and social chat. More than a life simulation, it‚Äôs a virtual life unto itself, where you can enter a 3D world with your avatar and choose your life as you want it to be.

Customize a 3D avatar, personalize your own animated emoji and message friends! Your dream life, love life and virtual life await in IMVU!

AVATAR CREATION
- Choose your life and customize yourself.
- 3D avatar creator lets you design yourself from top to bottom.
- Role play your virtual life however you desire - get weird, get wild, it‚Äôs all you!
- Avatar looks can change to match your style - shop without limits!

CHAT IN 3D
- Chat with friends from all over the world!
- Chat lobby lets you connect with players near and far.
- Avatar chat gives you full conversations that are more than instant messages.

EXPRESS YOURSELF, AS YOURSELF
- Chat with friends using your personal animated WithMoji.
- Online social game for you and your friends to enjoy.

YOUR VIRTUAL LIFE
- The avatar life is your life, make it what you want it to be!
- Want a love story? IMVU can be a dating simulator for your avatar‚Äôs love life.
- Role play and chat with friends to create an amazing story.

GET SOCIAL AND SHARE YOUR #MOOD
- While chatting, you can pose, add filters, and post photos to get people talking.
- Virtual chat with a range of emotes, emoji and functions

Your virtual world and virtual life await in the IMVU free app! Join today and make your avatar!¬†

For 3D avatar chat rooms on older devices, please follow the steps below. Please keep in mind that your experience may not be optimal.

‚Ä¢ Tap the main navigator in the top left corner
‚Ä¢ Tap Graphics Options
‚Ä¢ Tap ‚ÄúFull 3D‚Äù

Then enter your favorite chat room and experience 3D!

comments: Amazing game- but, I get kicked out a lot. Also, whenever I buy credits, I never get them. I've wasted money on this game thinking I'd get something out of it. Please fix this, I know everyone is working hard. But when you can, please fix this glitch or bug or whatever it is. I love your game, I really do. When things get fixed I'll update my review.

The game Is really great but there's honestly a issue. So there's this thing called "discovery" and most players are mobile players but if you look at the photos you can tell that they're pc players. This gets on my nerves because us mobiles try our best to get on discovery but we just can't sometimes. My wish is if you guys could put more mobile players on discovery or make two categories. One side mobile the other pc. Love the game, though. :)

So it was AMAZING until it logged me out and when I tried to log back in it didn't work. So I exited the app and waited. But then, it kept doing the same thing over and over again until I had to create a new account. But then it logged me out of THAT one and when I tried to go back in it said "service unknown error".

My IMVU keeps logging me out and even if I'm on Wi-Fi I try to reopen it, all it says is that it can't load right now try again later. So I do and it still says it over and over. I love the game, don't get me wrong but I'm about to uninstall tge app if it keeps happening over and over. It has happend 7 times now.

I love this game, its super fun to play! I met a lot of people. But, I tried to log in into my account, It said too many attempts even though I tried only ONCE. Also, when I tried to delete my account it would take me to the log in thing and it would say that my password is wrong. I only use 2 passwords and I tried both of them but it still said that it's wrong.

title: DC Universe - The Ultimate DC Membership
description:
DC Universe is a first-of-its kind digital subscription service that gives fans access to exclusive content and experiences not available anywhere else. 

WATCH exclusive original series, epic animated movies, and classic films and TV series. Stream our critically-acclaimed original programs like Harley Quinn, Titans, Young Justice: Outsiders, Doom Patrol, and Swamp Thing -- and look forward to our newest series, Stargirl.  

READ from a library of over 22,000 DC comics with our state-of-the-art digital comic reader. Follow your favorite heroes like Wonder Woman, Superman, Batman, and Aquaman through storylines like Flashpoint and Dark Knights: Metal. You can even download and read your favorites offline.

SHOP from a selection of DC collectibles and merchandise only available to DC Universe members. Get your hands on our exclusive Justice League Animated action figures and exclusive DC apparel.

CONNECT with other members and discuss your favorite DC comics, rivalries, theories, and memories in our moderated forums.

EXPLORE the epic DC Encyclopedia and learn the bios and origin stories of all your favorite DC heroes, what their alliances have been, and their appearances in movies and TV shows through the years. Read the latest news about the DC Universe and learn about new shows and comics, in interviews, features, and other exclusive articles.

WIN - members get chances to win sweepstakes and giveaways , including exclusive event access, movie tickets, stacks of comics, jaw-dropping collectibles, and MORE!
 
Your monthly or annual subscription begins after your free trial. To avoid recurring charges for your subscription fee (which may include local tax depending on your location), you must cancel before the end of your free trial or current billing period.  

By downloading the app, you agree to the DC Universe Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

recentChanges: Our February update is code named Nightwing, a former Boy Wonder who got tired of playing sidekick to one of the most recognizable heroes in the DCU and decided to break out on his own.  Dick Grayson has always stayed true to what he learned as Robin and his code is simple ‚Äì if you're breaking the law on his turf, expect a swift, painful trip to Arkham. comments: Fantastic library but a terrible UI and poor design make finding anything unnecessarily difficult. Everything is buried under confusing arbitrary menus and frequent crashes and connection issues are frustrating. I'm not sure how they even put out such a poorly designed app in this day and age. Other than being a messy cluttered unorganized disaster the comics themselves look amazing and the panels are easy to navigate. Edited to one star because the download function doesn't even work.

This app eats through data like krazy. Even with streaming and downloads set to SD, the app just chewed through 12GB's of data in the last 5 hours. Plus the downloads don't even work. Anything I download won't play after the first few minutes, it'll just stop playing, and the support page I'm sent to isn't any help at all. Really wish they would fix this app.

It's a great app, but the search engine and browser categories could be better. Seem like they remove some of the movies. I feel like all the movies and animated series should be at my disposal. Paying $75/year, the app should be much more better than what it is.

Not easily able to get in and out of even though do not seem to be able to get that to or access to somewhat of a disappointment seeing how the payments are always paid the mailing address in the person is denied so who is paying for itI noticed comic books or regular kept up on this app even on my television I like that I also like the fact that I get to see the cartoons they don't seem to be kept up-to-datebut other and being unable to get in and out of I don't mind I'll 3 stars out of five

I was very disappointed to see the lack of DC animation movies. They have some but nowhere near of what's in their library. I subscribed to watch Harley Quinn, which was great, but not being able to watch the recent JL animation movies that came out in the last 10 years made me unsubscribe.

title: Mileage Tracker by MileIQ
description:
The MileIQ business mileage tracker frees you from the pain of manually tracking your miles for taxes or reimbursement. MileIQ is a free mileage tracking app that will automatically log and track miles, and calculate the value of your drives for taxes or reimbursements. Maximize your tax deductions and reimbursements with MileIQ, the easiest way to keep a mileage log. 

Our mileage tracker helps you easily organize your drives for your business expenses and tax refunds. MileIQ sorts your drives, keeping business miles separate from personal ones, which makes it simple to have a mileage log that will be accepted by the IRS or your business. 

Track miles accurately and quickly get the reports you need to maximize your tax deductions and reimbursements without the administrative struggles. MileIQ is trusted by millions of users who have potentially claimed billions on their tax returns. 

MileIQ automatically tracks every mile you drive in the background. MileIQ means you won‚Äôt have to manually log your miles or even manually start and stop recording ‚Äî just drive like you normally would and MileIQ will create a compliant mileage log for you. Say goodbye to the messy paperwork. 

MileIQ uses smart Drive Detection technology to automatically track miles. It then logs those trips for you and will calculate the drive values for your business and personal drives. 

Log miles from every drive easily and accurately with MileIQ, the most-trusted mileage tracker app!

MileIQ Features:

Mileage Log - Track Miles & Automatically Create Mile Logs
- Mileage tracker records all trips accurately, down to fractions of a mile
- Track drives and categorize them with a swipe‚Äîswipe right for business drives and left for personal drives 
- GPS-powered Drive Detection technology captures every mile driven and logs them automatically‚Äîdon‚Äôt worry about your battery, as it intelligently consumes power
- Mileage reports provide information for the IRS and include details you need for your business expense reports.

Business Expenses Reporting & More 
- Track miles from all your business trips and sales calls for reimbursements
- Expense reports are simple: just export your mileage tracking data or send yourself a spreadsheet with all the info you need
- Self-employed or get a 1099? Write off your miles driven on your Schedule C
- Mileage app provides the 2019 standard IRS mileage rate, which is 58 cents per mile driven for business, 14 cents for charity and 20 cents for medical mileage.

Save Money - Tax Deduction & Budget Help
- Tax deductions are calculated accurately for your largest mileage tax deduction yet
- Track miles to get a large deduction, leading to lower taxes, which leads to more money in your pocket.

This mileage tracker app has helped log over 30 billion miles, saved over 60 million hours from manual logging. $2.5 billion in mileage deductions and reimbursements. 

Track your miles and join millions of drivers who‚Äôve saved billions by using MileIQ today!

For a complete record of all your drives upgrade to MileIQ Premium for only $5.99/month recurring or $59.99/year recurring.

Mileage Logging that Works

Easy ‚Äì Simple to install and use 
Automatic ‚Äì No stopping and starting the app 
Organized ‚Äì Classify your drives with a swipe 
Accurate ‚Äì Mileage logs that meet IRS mileage deduction standards

Download MileIQ by Microsoft for free today!

MileIQ is a free mileage tracking app that will automatically log and track miles, and calculate the value of your drives for taxes or reimbursements. Maximize your tax deductions and reimbursements with MileIQ, the easiest way to keep a mileage log.

Our mileage tracker helps you easily organize your drives for your business expenses and tax refunds. MileIQ sorts your drives, keeping business miles separate from personal ones, which makes it simple to have a mileage log that will be accepted by the IRS or your business.

Track miles accurately and quickly get the reports you need to maximize your tax deductions and reimbursements without the administrative struggles. MileIQ is trusted by millions of users who have potentially claimed billions on their tax returns.

MileIQ automatically tracks every mile you drive in the background. MileIQ means you won‚Äôt have to manually log your miles or even manually start and stop recording ‚Äî just drive like you normally would and MileIQ will create a compliant mileage log for you. Say goodbye to the messy paperwork.

MileIQ uses smart Drive Detection technology to automatically track miles. It then logs those trips for you and will calculate the drive values for your business and personal drives.

Log miles from every drive easily and accurately with MileIQ, the most-trusted mileage tracker app!

MileIQ Features:

Mileage Log - Track Miles & Automatically Create Mile Logs
- Mileage tracker records all trips accurately, down to fractions of a mile
- Track drives and categorize them with a swipe‚Äîswipe right for business drives and left for personal drives
- GPS-powered Drive Detection technology captures every mile driven and logs them automatically‚Äîdon‚Äôt worry about your battery, as it intelligently consumes power
- Mileage reports provide information for the IRS and include details you need for your business expense reports.

Business Expenses Reporting & More
- Track miles from all your business trips and sales calls for reimbursements
- Expense reports are simple: just export your mileage tracking data or send yourself a spreadsheet with all the info you need
- Self-employed or get a 1099? Write off your miles driven on your Schedule C
- Mileage app provides the 2019 standard IRS mileage rate, which is 58 cents per mile driven for business, 14 cents for charity and 20 cents for medical mileage.

Save Money - Tax Deduction & Budget Help
- Tax deductions are calculated accurately for your largest mileage tax deduction yet
- Track miles to get a large deduction, leading to lower taxes, which leads to more money in your pocket.

This mileage tracker app has helped log over 30 billion miles, saved over 60 million hours from manual logging. $2.5 billion in mileage deductions and reimbursements.

Track your miles and join millions of drivers who‚Äôve saved billions by using MileIQ today!

For a complete record of all your drives upgrade to MileIQ Premium for only $5.99/month recurring or $59.99/year recurring.

Mileage Logging that Works

Easy ‚Äì Simple to install and use
Automatic ‚Äì No stopping and starting the app
Organized ‚Äì Classify your drives with a swipe
Accurate ‚Äì Mileage logs that meet IRS mileage deduction standards

Download MileIQ by Microsoft for free today!
summary: No manual mileage tracking! MileIQ frees you from painful paperwork and logging.
developerAddress: 1355 Market St Fl 3, San Francisco, CA 94103
recentChanges:
New MileIQ features to free you from administrative chores and make working on-the-go easier than ever:

-All Drives: review and edit every drive from the app. You can even edit multiple drives at once.
-Round Trips: drives with the same start and end location‚ÄØare grouped together for quick classification.
-Named Locations manager: add, edit or delete Named Locations from a list in the app.
comments: Great app when it works. But it has bugs. When something goes wrong they have no idea hiw to fix it. I actually had customer service tell me to turn detection off. SERIOUSLY. The canned response to this review was not helpful. I emailed three times, called and nothing. Again, great app when it works. But when it doesn't you can't get much help.

App works well, unfortunately it's not terribly accurate for me. It doesn't offer any controls for when to trigger automated tracking. This means if I'm a passenger in another car, it's creating logs that have to be edited or deleted. I wish they would add the ability to trigger automated tracking when the device connects to Bluetooth. This would give me the ability to more accurately track miles when I'm actually driving my vehicle.

Does not allow you toggle off auto drive detection without constantly giving a notification and attempting to "open a chat" if you. The reason this is annoying is the app will constantly try and update your location causing other apps to fail even when you aren't moving. It's also useless for uber since it mixes half your rides together into blobs of random drives. This app needs some work. If you dont drive much this app will work for you fine. Kinda defeats the point though right?

Used to be great, but the past several months, it has trouble detecting my drives so I miss a lot. A competitors app does not have that problem. I reinstalled and followed instructions on fixing this but it doesn't work. Until this is fixed, I won't be subscribing anymore.

This mileage tracker is perfect for small businesses that have travel expenses. I have had this for over 2 years and absolutely swear by it. Sometimes I have to add drives but very rarely. Usually it's because my phone was rebooting or an update shut off my settings. Not often enough to be a bother. I highly recommend for business with travel.

title: PicsArt Photo Editor: Pic, Video & Collage Maker
description:
PicsArt is your go-to, all-in-one photo and video editor on mobile. Access impressive photo effects, drawing tools, image editor, collage maker, sticker maker, camera, photo filters, video editor, free image library, face editor with face swap, beautify tools, and more! Unleash your creativity with the 14th most downloaded app worldwide in 2019 with over 700 million downloads to date. Start with your picture or one from our network and give it a crop, cut out, or grid.

PicsArt is home to the hugely popular sketch effect, glitch effect, vintage filters, aesthetic stickers, and more. AND it's FREE!
 
Show off your awesome pictures on Instagram with #picsart and you might be featured! 

PHOTO EDITOR
Thousands of amazing tools for cropping, stretching, and cloning. A full library of artistic photo filters (including HDR), frames, backgrounds, and borders. Use brush mode for fine-tuning and make double exposures using layers with adjustable transparency. 100+ fonts make it easy to add text to pictures and create memes. 

VIDEO EDITOR
Some of our coolest photo features are now enabled for video. Bring your unique story to life by adding fun filters and stickers, then adjusting the size for social media. No professional experience required! 

REPLAY
Cut your editing time in half. Replay allows you to view editing steps (from start to finish) and easily apply them to your own image with just one tap per step. Each step is customizable to your liking. The PicsArt community adds hundreds of new Replays a day and recently added Replays are available to use at any time.

REMIX AND FREE-TO-EDIT IMAGES
PicsArt was the first to allow image remixing on mobile! Start with any photo with the #freetoedit hashtag, add a personal touch by editing it your way, then share back to the PicsArt community.
 
SKETCH
Take any selfie and create a sketch that looks hand drawn. The Sketch effect automatically detects the outline of your portrait and does the work for you. Change the background and line color to your liking. Five Sketch effects available. 

PICSART GOLD
Go Gold! PicsArt‚Äôs Gold subscription gives you access to THOUSANDS OF PREMIUM STICKERS, FONTS, FRAMES, COLLAGES, AND MASKS! We‚Äôre adding NEW EXCLUSIVE content all the time. All of this with an ad-free editing experience. Get over $3,000 worth of content for a nominal monthly or annual subscription fee. 

Start your PicsArt Gold membership with a free trial. Limit one free trial per Google Play account. Once the trial is over, you‚Äôll be charged a nominal subscription fee. Your Gold subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. If your subscription is subject to any promotional discount, the discount will expire upon the end of the current period and you‚Äôll be charged the standard rate upon renewal. Go to your Google Play to manage your membership and to turn auto-renew off. Your Google Play will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Read more about our terms and conditions here: https://picsart.com/terms-and-conditions 
 
FREE STICKERS & STICKER MAKER
PicsArt‚Äôs Cutout Tool lets you create and share custom Stickers out of any picture. 5 million+ free user-made Stickers and clipart are already available in-app. Add Stickers to pictures (30+ Stickers per edit), remix others‚Äô images and share.
 
MAGIC EFFECTS
PicsArt‚Äôs Magic Effects give your photos a complete makeover in just one click. Choose from a handful of amazing designs like Galaxy, Rainbow, Flora, and White Ice. 

COLLAGE MAKER AND GRIDS
PicsArt‚Äôs collage maker provides 100+ free, easy-to-use templates. Make grid-style, templated, or freestyle collages. 

DRAWING
PicsArt Draw includes customizable brushes, layers, and professional drawing tools.

CHALLENGES
PicsArt‚Äôs Challenges are fun and easy! New challenges, added daily, are a great way to find inspiration.

About Ads: https://picsart.com/privacy-policy#interest-base

recentChanges:
Mad March is here and so is our new update. Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs in store for you:
‚Ä¢ Select ‚Äì a new feature in Eraser mode that allows you to select and apply changes to specific parts of your photos. Works in specific tools that utilize Eraser mode.

comments: This app used to be the best when it came to mobile editing. But i have no idea what the hell is wrong with this app from a certain time. The new update is surely a big mess. I am unable to edit a single photo, apply a single effect. Every time after choosing a picture to edit, it just restarts again and again. Fix this guys, and make this app great again !!

I used to love this app so so much and it still is amazing. I just personally don't need a lot of these new tools introduced last year. If you want to go wild and creative then sure they are pretty exciting! I just don't need them and still am restricted by them and the need to pay. I wanted to save a project I was working on and couldn't unless I paid a subscription. Great app, just be aware of the penetrating demand for you to subscribe. (Still, love it lots, thank you!)

I've had this app for a while now and it was working great. I loved the options I had, but recently this app has gotten so bad. Whenever I go to edit it glitches out after EVERY click I make. It's so annoying/frustrating that I'm almost done with this app. This bugging out constantly has pushed my patience to it's limit and if it doesn't get fixed soon I'm uninstalling. I've updated it and it hasn't fixed anything. Please fix this because it's an overall good app that I want to keep using.

No free part, EXPEN$$$IVE paid. Actually, no, it's not a free app. I tried to add text and save my picture, but there was no save option, only a 3 day free trial that requires me to sign up, probably give credit card information, spend 10 minutes to save a picture. So, no free part, just use the free Photoshop app or VSCO, or anything. The paid app costs too much, and there is no free app.

Great, even for a novice like me. One request: an ability to create a clickable link, preferably via a graphic image added to the picture. I usually put a small image of my social media accounts. It'd be great if the viewer could just click on the link to get to one of my accounts, especially if the picture has been copied and shared through other people's accounts.

title: onX Hunt: Hunting Maps, Offline GPS/Nav & Weather
description:
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Voted "one of the most innovative hunting products of the decade" by Field & Stream. The onX Hunt App has been also been featured in Outdoor Life (hiking, biking, etc.) and American Hunter as a must-have hunting app for any hunter or outdoor enthusiast.‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Know where you stand with the most trusted and accurate GPS sat/topo maps: Use onX Hunt as a fully functioning GPS Navigation on your phone. View private and public property land ownership and land owner names on the maps! Hunting and fishing units, mountain, roads and trails, US topographic maps and more! Turn your phone into the best hunting GPS with offline maps and location tracker!

‚ñ∂ FREE HUNTING APP FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ NO ADS
‚Ä¢ Aerial view maps and 24K Topographical Maps with GPS Navigation
‚Ä¢ Local weather conditions, forecast, wind speed, and wind direction sourced from the National Oceanic Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)
‚Ä¢ Aerial/Topographic Hybrid overlay to see contours with satellite imagery
‚Ä¢ Hunting Zones, Areas or Game Management Units (GMU) for general game species in all 50 states
‚Ä¢ Free Hunting GPS app with compass, tracker and waypoints: mark waypoints with icons to navigate back to your vehicle, camp, or hunt stand
‚Ä¢ Easily measure distances between tree stands and blinds
‚Ä¢ Measure acreage with the Shape Tool to easily measure food plots
‚Ä¢ Track the distance, coordinates, duration and speed of your hunt with our GPS Hunting Tracker
‚Ä¢ Complimentary mapping layers such as topographical maps, hiking trails, running and bike path
‚Ä¢ Web Map for e-scouting at home and syncing data to your mobile. Web Hunting Map: www.onxmaps.com/web

‚ñ∂ OFFLINE GPS FUNCTIONALITY:

The onX Hunt App turns your phone into an outdoor handheld GPS Navigator by using the GPS built into your phone or tablet to display your location on the sat/topo map. Cellular coverage is NOT needed, as tile saving technology allows you to save basemaps and layers for offline navigation.

Extensive collection of Rec points, hiking and bike trails, backcountry roads, hot springs, Fire towers, and more.

‚ñ∂ WEB MAP: Memberships also include access to our online Web Hunting Map (www.onxmaps.com/web) for computer use!

‚Ä¢ Scout from the comfort of your home
‚Ä¢ Sync markups and tracks between devices
‚Ä¢ Print unlimited free maps

‚ñ∂ FREE TRIAL:

While the onX Hunt App and many of it‚Äôs features are free, you will also start a free Premium State Membership trial when you install the App. This allows you to try a full featured Premium State Membership for 7 days.

‚ñ∂ PREMIUM STATE MEMBERSHIP:

With a Premium State Membership you gain access to our proprietary hunting GPS maps developed by our GIS team. A Premium State Membership costs $29.99/year. Get the same great features of the free onX Hunt App but with the additional benefits of:

‚Ä¢ Public land like Forest Service, Bureau of Land Management (BLM maps), Wildlife Management Areas, County and State land hunting/fishing maps, Timber Lands, QUADS and more!
‚Ä¢ Landowner names with property line maps and boundaries finder in available counties (U.S. only)
‚Ä¢ Search by landowner name or Hunting property landowner boundaries to scout and look for new areas to Hunt.
‚Ä¢ Save private, or public hunting land maps for offline use
‚Ä¢ GMU or Hunting Units for multiple species (e.g. Whitetail Deer, Mule Deer, Elk, Turkey Hunting and more)
‚Ä¢ Possible Access Lands, Walk-In areas, Block Management Areas and private lands open to the public.
‚Ä¢ The largest database of nationwide Roads and Trails ever built.

* Private landownership maps may not be available for all counties (U.S. only)
View the complimentary county layer on the Map or visit our website.

ELITE NATIONWIDE MEMBERSHIP

With an Elite Membership, you gain access to our proprietary maps for all 50 states. Easily scout and plan hunts in any state now for one membership price. Available for $99.99/year or $14.99/month.

‚ñ∂ FEEDBACK:

Having a problem, or want to request new features please contact us at support@onxmaps.com

summary: Go hunting, fishing and hiking with onX GPS tracker. Offline topo map & trails.
developerAddress:
1925 Brooks St
Missoula, MT 59801
recentChanges:
Version 20.9.0
‚Ä¢ Added 10x More weather stations.
‚Ä¢ Photo Waypoints, take new or attach.
‚Ä¢ Share GPS tracks, Waypoints and more.
‚Ä¢ Fixed bugs and improved stability.
Remember to access Web Map at onXmaps.com/web for e-scouting. Know where you stand with onX Hunt, the #1 GPS hunting app in Google Play.
comments: I recently bought two parcels both in remote areas. A hunter showed me my property lines using this app. Now I have a bird's eye view of wildlife trails to get around on. I use it constantly to find landmarks (trees and boulders) near the property line overlays to find my edges. Can't live without it! Thanks for the great product.

This app works pretty well most of the time but I bought the app so my hunting partners and I can share waypoints with each other. When they share waypoints with me, they come through 5-8miles off from the point they are sending. Most other features I've used have worked pretty well so far. Edit- the developers got back to me quickly and were able to troubleshoot the problem. Great app

In general a great app, but it has bugs on Android phones which the developer promised to fix ,but has not. For instance, if you tap on a particular parcel to see its boundries it brings up many other green lines showing the boundaries of surrounding properties or just random lines that mean nothing. It renders that important part of the app useless on Android phones. They have promptly fixed the problem.

Worked great the first couple of time I used it so I upgraded to my state's premium so scout some public land. But as soon as I started adding a decent number if waypoints and photos the app kept crashing, not syncing between devices, and severe lag. Their tech team told me they are working on a fix but it's been 3 weeks now.

So I'm writing a second review since I cant reply to your response. I did contact your company. I was told in a year or so. It might be fixed. Here's my question that I asked your help department. Why when you have a program that has picture and GPS functionality does your error reporting page NOT allow you to use these tools to report errors. Instead asking for a written description of the "issue". I can hike and photograph boundaries much easier than I can write you a verbal description?

title: TikTok - Make Your Day
description:
TikTok is THE destination for mobile videos. On TikTok, short-form videos are exciting, spontaneous, and genuine. Whether you‚Äôre a sports fanatic, a pet enthusiast, or just looking for a laugh, there‚Äôs something for everyone on TikTok. All you have to do is watch, engage with what you like, skip what you don‚Äôt, and you‚Äôll find an endless stream of short videos that feel personalized just for you. From your morning coffee to your afternoon errands, TikTok has the videos that are guaranteed to make your day.

We make it easy for you to discover and create your own original videos by providing easy-to-use tools to view and capture your daily moments. Take your videos to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. 

‚ñ† Watch endless amount of videos customized specifically for you
A personalized video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.
 
‚ñ† Explore videos, just one scroll away
Watch all types of videos, from Comedy, Gaming, DIY, Food, Sports, Memes, and Pets, to Oddly Satisfying, ASMR, and everything in between.
 
‚ñ† Pause recording multiple times in one video
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. Shoot as many times as you need.
 
‚ñ† Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators
Millions of creators are on TikTok showcasing their incredible skills and everyday life. Let yourself be inspired.

‚ñ† Add your favorite music or sound to your videos for free
Easily edit your videos with millions of free music clips and sounds. We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, Edm, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

‚ñ† Express yourself with creative effects
Unlock tons of filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.

‚ñ† Edit your own videos 
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.

* Any feedback? Contact us at feedback@tiktok.com or tweet us @tiktok_us

comments: For a couple of days now, whenever I go to my home screen the tic tok song is still playing. I even tried to close all of my apps and it didn't work. it goes away after a minute, but it still bothers me. Sorry about the negative feedback. I am still addicted to tic tok though!

Great game! Tiktok is like a game with basically everything in it. Dancing to comedy etc. I also love joint accounts. The only problem I have is that you have to wait 30 days to change your name.. If you don't bother I don't mind but I'd rather it being like 5-10 days. Overall good game üòä

its a great app, i used to use it everyday. but lately everytime i go to tiktok my videos can't play. there is just a black screen, I don't hear the sound and i also can't see the profile picture of TikTokers or my profile picture. i tried to uninstall the app but its still the same. Please help! thanks

It's a really nice app. It's a great way to escape from the world and an amazing way to show off talents and to get in touch with fellow cosplayers. It's an app I would definitely recommend if you love cosplaying or just making videos to make others happy. But their are flaws like your videos get taken down for no reason or because people just dont like your content.

I have had TikTok prior and used it with no issues. However now, upon redownload, it won't allow me to post my videos. I can take and edit them but the "post" button is not there!! The videos are saving to my draft instead. I've even deleted and reinstalled the app. Please help.

title: OfferUp - Buy. Sell. Offer Up
description:
Buy. Sell. Simple.

Join the largest mobile marketplace for local buyers and sellers! 

OfferUp makes it easy to find great deals on the things you want and make money on the things you want to sell. Ditch the Classified Ads and garage sales -- this is the best way to buy and sell in your community or neighborhood with people you can trust.

How it works:

‚Ä¢ Buy or sell anything; easily offer up your items for sale in 30 seconds. 
‚Ä¢ Find great deals and discounts on clothes, shoes, furniture, cell phones, electronics, baby & kids items, sports equipment, used cars, home goods and more.
‚Ä¢ Use reputation features like ratings and profiles to see who you‚Äôre dealing with and build trust. 
‚Ä¢ Shop local items for sale with thousands of new postings daily. 
‚Ä¢ Message buyers and sellers securely from within the app. 
‚Ä¢ Build your reputation with your unique seller profile page. 
‚Ä¢ Browse items by image and sort by category or location. 
‚Ä¢ Join millions of people using OfferUp across the country. 
‚Ä¢ Skip the garage sale! OfferUp is the simplest way to buy and sell locally.

Fun facts about OfferUp:

1. With OfferUp you can easily sell anything like clothes and shoes, used cars, electronics and home goods.
2. OfferUp shows you what‚Äôs selling nearby, right in your neighborhood. 
3. Communication between buyers & sellers happens through the app via secure messaging.
4. OfferUp is better than a garage sale; shop anything you want at a discount, right on your phone or tablet.

Be part of the community: 

We‚Äôre making local buying and selling an experience that everyone can try and trust. The community at the heart of our marketplace is what makes that possible. When you join OfferUp, you‚Äôre joining millions of people helping each other make money and save money around the nation -- and right in the neighborhood.
