comments: This app sucks. It doesnt load properlly. They charge $20 to promote your items, every body asks for what your selling at a dirt cheap price. When ever somebody says they want to purchase some thing at a resonable price, the messages disappear when you log in. By the time an item sells, your practically having to give your item away. Probably the apps algorithm. It's done the same thing twice.

Update: app sucks. When not let me in and keeps giving me an error code. So tired of this inconsistency and being locked out. SNAP!! it locks you out of your messages and then asks you to register as if you don't have an account. I've only been using this for about six months and it's already happened three times. Can't reply to people's messages. Missed sales. very frustrating. Not sure why they aren't fixing this problem because according to other people it's been going on a long time

No support on bugs at all. I do not get audio notifications for items I'm selling. example: a person messages me wanting to buy an item, I see it FOUR HOURS later. response .metrics/times are way up to an hour because of this bug. could have lost the sale and look like a clown for not responding when OFFERUP NEVER NOTIFIED ME. What's up guys? This sucks. Update: There literally is NO support. Just random comments trying to look like they are actively doing something. they definitely aren't

The app works well for the most part and does have some consistently great deals. After their last update I had to reinstall the app in order to do a new post, which has me a bit concerned on their regression testing process. Just an annoyance, I would still recommend folks trying it out.

Seems like it could have been a good marketplace with good deals but you can't actually buy anything. Sellers just never respond to even full price offers or worse accept then cancel the sale. Days or even weeks wasted. Unreliable or inactive sellers/listings need to be removed. Too frustrating as is, uninstalled.

title: Smule - The Social Singing App
description:
Love music? With Smule, you can sing and make music with friends and fans around the world! Karaoke solo or duet with people across the globe. Sing duets with major artists like Ed Sheeran and Luis Fonsi. Sing a cappella, solo or with a group. Dance or play along to top hits. Use audio effects and video filters while singing your favourite karaoke songs. You can even sing LIVE for friends and fans. Try it free!
 
Featured on Entertainment Tonight, Forbes, and Google Play‚Äôs Best Apps.

FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Sing karaoke free to millions of songs with music and lyrics. Karaoke anytime, anywhere.

‚Ä¢ Choose to sing LIVE or record and fine-tune your performance. Express yourself however you want!

‚Ä¢ Sing solo or duet to songs, sing a cappella, dance, play along, or just enjoy the show!

‚Ä¢ Sound like a pro! Add polish to your vocals with studio effects.

‚Ä¢ Use pitch correction for real-time tuning while you sing. 

‚Ä¢ Star in your own music video! Record your vocals first, then add any video that you create.

‚Ä¢ Apply video filters to make your recording look pro! Choose from Selfie, Vintage, Black & White, Sepia, and Fight Club. 

‚Ä¢ Add visual effects, like smoke, bubbles and fireflies, to make your recording stand out even more. 

‚Ä¢ Share your creation on our 50M+ global platform to get discovered.

‚Ä¢ Upload your song to the Smule Songbook for other singers to perform

‚Ä¢ Share your talent and love for music with friends on social media - Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, WhatsApp, Snapchat and many more.

‚Ä¢ Have a karaoke duet with top artists: Shawn Mendes, Jason Derulo, Train, Nick Jonas, Charlie Puth, James Arthur, Jessie J and more!
 
‚Ä¢ Beat your singing score and sing like a karaoke pro!
 
‚Ä¢ Customize your profile page and pin your fave karaokes. 

With new songs added daily, you‚Äôll find your favourite songs and karaoke hits. Choose from a huge karaoke songbook of Pop, R&B, Rock, Rap, Hip-Hop, Country, Latin, K-pop and more!

Popular on Smule:

SING POP HITS & KARAOKE BALLADS:
* Shape of You - Ed Sheeran
* Play That Song - Train
* Treat You Better - Shawn Mendes
* Say You Won‚Äôt Let Go - James Arthur
* Closer - The Chainsmokers, ft. Halsey
* 7 Years - Lukas Graham
* Rockabye - Clean Bandit, ft. Anne-Marie
* Love me Like You Do - Ellie Goulding
* All of Me - John Legend

SING NEW CLASSICS & KARAOKE ESSENTIALS:
* Killing Me Softly - The Fugees
* I Will Survive - Gloria Gaynor
* Un-break My Heart- Toni Braxton
* Happy - Pharrell Williams
* Eye of the Tiger - Survivor
* Bohemian Rhapsody - Queen

SING MUSICALS & SOUNDTRACKS:
* Beauty and the Beast - Beauty and the Beast (Disney)
* Part of Your World - The Little Mermaid (Disney)
* Let It Go - Idina Menzel (from Frozen by Disney)
* Cups (When I‚Äôm Gone) - Anna Kendrick

Don‚Äôt see your must-sing karaoke jam? Upload to the Smule Songbook:
https://www.smule.com/support/upload#songbook

CONNECTING THE WORLD THROUGH MUSIC‚Ñ¢
We believe music is about more than just listening‚Äîit's about creating, sharing, discovering, participating and connecting with others. It‚Äôs the original social network with the power to break down barriers, touch souls and bring people together from all over the world. 
 
Join our global community of music lovers. Sing karaoke or a cappella! Get discovered and get fans! Connect with Facebook to make music with friends! Try it free.

FIND YOUR VOICE
No matter what kind of singer you are, you can sound amazing on Smule. Use mic effects and video filters to autotune, add reverb, and smooth over imperfections in your recordings. If you love karaoke, singing along to radio songs or a cappella in the shower, dream of singing duets with pop stars, or simply love music‚Äîtry for free now! 

FOLLOW US and keep up with new major artists and featured singers on Smule
http://www.smule.com
http://www.facebook.com/smule
http://www.youtube.com/smule
http://www.twitter.com/smule
http://plus.google.com/+smule
Have questions? http://www.smule.com/support/sing#android
This app has been Superpowered

comments: For how much it costs, it should work better. I've tried on 3 different devices now, and if I do it with the video function, the audio is garbage. I've tried it on WiFi, mobile network, directly plugged into an internet connection and it's still crackly and choppy, freezes up. I also run into the issue where a song I've selected will say it's 4 minutes long, but anywhere from 20 seconds to 3 minutes in will just suddenly cut off and end the song. Not worth what they charge.

Once I got this app it was working perfectly!! I immediately fell in love with the game... but recently.. when I am singing.. the line doesn't move or the dots at the side don't move and i can't hear myself even with voice feedback on PLEASE FIX THIS!!!!! (or else I will have to go back to watching Brooklyn Nine-Nine 24/7)

One thing I can say about this. WHY IS IT SO EXPENSIVE!!. Seriously, its ¬£100 for a year and ¬£10 for A WEEK what kind of ridiculous are they. Its stupid how big the prices are for a singing app. The only thing VIP gives you is you can do songs by yourself and make songs that people can join in on. That should be free anyway. I have no idea why its ¬£100 for a year. Its stupid. If you want to make more money. Decrease your prices because I know people wont buy VIP. Especially kids who can't afford

Excellent and I expected nothing less than such a good app. The only problem I have which I don't clearly understand is that in Xiaomi the audio while recording have small interruptions , but in Nokia 3 everything is fine. How is it possible for a Xiaomi that has better quality in many ways than Nokia 3 actually has some issues ? Is it because of my devices?

Good, but sucks on Android. I used it on an iPhone years back and it worked perfectly. I switched to Android, but it's not the same. My biggest issue is my mic feedback won't sync with the music in real time, so I can't hear myself when I sing. And it clips causing glitchy audio, vocals don't sync when I'm done with a song so constant post-production fiddling, etc. Been waiting a while for a fix, but nothing. Bottom line, if you're considering a subscription then do it with an apple phone.

Discover our library of exclusive novels such as The Supreme Magus, Young Master Damien‚Äôs Pet, Nanomance Reborn, and tremendous translated novels like Library of heaven‚Äôs path, Lord of the Mysteries, Full Marks Hidden Marriage, as well as numerous adapted comics.

Bug fix
Comic Privileges! Get Privileges to read the authors' stockpile in advance!
comments: The stories are great but its very hard to read on this app. Daily log in will only give you 1 fast pass to unlock a chapter. 1 fast pass per chapter. I've been reading non stop for 2 consecutive days to earn a points, i didn't even earned that much!!! And takenote! 1fast pass is equals to 1000points! Just great! You really need to buy coins that cost you too much if you want to read, there is no other way! . So guys, prepare your credit card. Gonna find another app!!

I would have given this 5 stars but the recent update is very annoying. Spirit stones were better, I could actually save some to read some other chapter, which cannot be done with the fast pass. Also, I had some coins but I never got to actually use them to read locked chapters. Now another problem is that I am not able to log in into my already existing account. And when I use the same mail id to log in, it automatically creates new account. Please resolve this issue.

I don't think it is only me but I am not getting daily coins and have no way of getting coins except from if i buy them. Now I can only read a few chapters everyday I really liked this app before but now I am starting to dislike it. It doesn't make sense to me why a book app would do this. I also hate that coins expire. The update was only for their own benefit because they are forcing us to spend a lot of money if we want to continue to read. I do not recommend this app to anyone at all.

I love the stories and comics! I can't wait to finish the ones I've been reading. Really good way to pass the time and enjoyable for lovers of reading, like myself. Four stars, however, because of the whole Fast Pass process. Makes for very slow reading unless you pay for more passes. But other than that, I recommend giving it a try. Woop!

More and more I'm hating the app. Every update is just for their benefit. Forcing us to spend money in the app if we want to read more. The updates are not to improve the app. They are just to remove the benefits lectors have for free. I only downloaded the app because of one story and I was willing to spent money at the beginning to read faster (I did). But now they are forcing it so much that I dont want to. Ps. Moving to a different app or a web. This is not worth it. I'll read it elsewhere

title: QuickBooks Self-Employed:Mileage Tracker and Taxes
description:
Are you self-employed, a freelancer or an independent contractor? Organize your finances with QuickBooks Self-Employed and let us help you find your tax deductions & returns in time for tax season!. Put more money in your pocket during IRS tax season with this convenient mile tracker, expense tracker, invoice generator and tax deductions estimator. Become a tax pro with easy-to-use online services. 

QuickBooks Self-Employed users have found billions in potential tax deductions by automatically tracking mileage for work. Save receipts and attach them to business expenses, send  invoices and categorize business expenses apart from your personal finances. Get all the tax refunds a self-employed business owner is entitled to! 

Track Mileage Automatically!.
‚Ä¢  Mileage tracking automatically works using your phone‚Äôs GPS, without draining your phone‚Äôs battery.
‚Ä¢ Trip mileage is saved and categorized to maximize mileage tax deductions.

Scan Receipts
‚Ä¢ Receipt scanner enters transaction information & can easily save receipts.
‚Ä¢ Business expenses are automatically matched and categorized ‚Äì saving you time and maximizing your tax refunds so that you are ready for IRS tax time.

Expense Tracker to Organize Business Expenses
‚Ä¢ Self -employed, freelancer or small business owner ‚Äì manage business finances easily and keep up to date so you do not miss out on any tax deductions.  
‚Ä¢ Import business expenses directly from your bank account.

Get Paid Faster
‚Ä¢ Create invoices and send invoices easily on the go. 
‚Ä¢ Enable payments and bank transfer services to get paid faster.
‚Ä¢ Invoice generator ‚Äì get notified when invoices are sent, paid, and money is deposited!

Stay Prepared For Tax Time
‚Ä¢ We take care of your bookkeeping so you can avoid year-end surprises 
‚Ä¢ Easily organize income and business expenses for instant tax filing
‚Ä¢ Directly export Schedule C income and expenses.
‚Ä¢ Instantly export your financial data to TurboTax Self-Employed by upgrading to the Tax bundle*.

*Users will receive one state and one federal tax return filing.

Purchased TurboTax Self-Employed? Activate QuickBooks Self-Employed today at no extra cost

Already have QuickBooks Self-Employed on the web? The mobile app is FREE with your subscription, and data syncs automatically across devices. Just download, sign in, and go! 

Price, availability and features may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase. QuickBooks Self-Employed is from Intuit, the maker of TurboTax, QuickBooks, and Mint. 

To learn how Intuit protects your privacy, please visit http://security.intuit.com/privacy
*Based on QuickBooks Self-Employed users who have identified less than $100k in deductions
*Based on TY15 subscribers that have identified >$0 in business expenses and of those users that have >$0 in tax savings

 *Getting paid 2X faster based on U.S. customers using QuickBooks Online invoice tracking & payment features from August 2016 to July 2017

7535 Torrey Santa Fe Road

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements to help you make the most of QuickBooks Self-Employed.
comments: I have been using QuickBooks for a year now, it is ok , you can follow your expenses and have all organised when the app is working properly. In my case, recently the transaction function does not record all data from my bank for the last month , is the second time this happens. Also they make it so difficult to get human help , I have to spend half an hour goin through the AI questions to get the help I need. Not really reliable when you have to check expenses continuously.

If you get a new phone you start from ZERO . Unlike other receipt keepers. That's super problematic and makes this make all effectively useless. Glad I changed phones earlier in the year rather than later when I may have had months of receipts to try to categorize. Pass on this app until it figures out a way to be able to transfer business rules, receipt saving and etc across multiple phones for a single email/account

Today my phone (android) has installed the latest update as promissed. Problem is... it has changed all my "milleage" tab km to miles on my phone. ALL my logged km have automagically converted to miles eventhough it still shows in km. I cannot even, with some certainty, tell if the conversion is even accurately due to not having a back up log. What's going on with you guys?

I would not suggest this paid app. If I could get my money back I would. The software kept increasing my expected tax payments every time I modified transactions to the point that my expected payment was 3 times my actual income. Pretty poor functionality for the most fundamental of purposes for this app.

Update 3/10/2020 Wish I could get a refund. Customer service is non existent. The assistance they claim to provide me is the same as my last complaint. App is currently not accepting mileage updates when I select personal or business. App still shows wrong bank account information. They still deposit funds into the wrong account and have zero ways of changing the default account, or at least they've not provided me a means to change accounts. They also like to bombard you with TurboTax spam.

title: Microsoft OneDrive
description:
Microsoft OneDrive keeps your photos and files backed up, protected, synced, and‚Äã accessible on all your devices. This OneDrive app lets you view and share OneDrive files, documents, and photos with friends and family. Plus, you can use the app to automatically back up your phone‚Äôs photos and videos. Start with 5 GB of free cloud storage or upgrade to an Office 365 subscription to get 1 TB of storage. 

 

Microsoft OneDrive offers the following features: 

 

Back up photos & videos 

‚Ä¢ Automatic photo backup when you turn on Camera Upload 

‚Ä¢ Find photos easily thanks to automatic tagging 

‚Ä¢ Photo sync helps save space on your device 

‚Ä¢ View photos on your phone, computer, and online 

‚Ä¢ Access entire folders on the app without being online* 

  

File sharing 

‚Ä¢ Share photos, videos, and albums with friends and family 

‚Ä¢ Get notifications when a shared document is edited 

‚Ä¢ Set password-protected or expiring sharing links*  

  

Scan 

‚Ä¢ Scan documents, receipts, whiteboards, and more

Organize 

‚Ä¢ Search photos by what‚Äôs in them (i.e. beach, snow, etc.)

Security

Microsoft Office 

‚Ä¢  Back up, view, and save your Office documents.

The OneDrive app for Android offers 5 GB of free cloud sync file storage, file upload, file sharing, and file backup in the cloud. 

 

Using this app with OneDrive for Business 
For you to sign into OneDrive for Business, your organization needs to have a qualifying SharePoint Online or Office 365 business subscription plan. Camera upload, search, sort, and the ability to add OneDrive for Business accounts are available only on devices running Android 4.0 or later. 
 
This app is provided by Microsoft. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or its affiliates maintain facilities. 

 

*Requires Office 365 subscription

recentChanges:
In the eternal struggle between light and dark, we‚Äôre proud to announce that this release of OneDrive finally brings balance to the force: you can now enjoy Dark Theme and an epic new set of Microsoft Fluent icons throughout the app.
Photo enthusiasts that sign in with a consumer Microsoft account can now enjoy memories of years past: just visit your Photos tab to relive photos taken in previous years on this same day.
comments: Great app. I have been using One Drive for about 6 years. In the last 18 months I have had to monitor One Drive very closely as every 3 days or so it decides to dump a ton of my files into the recycle bin. So I have to restore all the files and be very careful whenever I empty the recycle been. I lost some pretty important files when this first started occurring. I used to trust the program 100%, but ever since this started occurring I have been keeping my eyes out for a convienent time to move.

Moving a file around/within a folder requires you to navigate from the root folder, each an every time. It is laborious and painstaking. Can't even cut/copy and paste a file, as there's currently no functionality to do this...PCs from decades ago could do this... Almost ironic; It's a file management and storage system, yet doing what it's fundamentally meant to is like wading through mud. Otherwise very good, and iteratively improving, albeit without fixing the above glaringly obvious problems.

The only thing I would change about the app is to be able to choose which profile I want to be saving to when going to save things using 3rd party programs or other Microsoft products. Like I'll go to save a word doc onto my onedrive it goes to the last profile used instead of giving an option choose first. But that's a small thing and may just be personal.

Good quick alternative for offline backups, with universally accessible features and contents. Recently found that there is a Dark Theme option as well. Thanks. Once it gave me 'Unusual Network Traffic..." message, saying that my account may be blocked in 48 hours, although it didn't show which file was 'inappropriate' according to them. So don't rely on the Cloud too much. My account is active, but that message definitely upset me. I now type my Day Logs offline, and stick to offline backups.

To download a file according to your help instructions you have to check off each individual file one by one. 20 + gigs of pics one by one is absolutely stupid and goes against any sort of time management plan. On my Computer with Microsoft operating system I can select all and transfer with two clicks of a mouse. One Drive can not be a Microsoft product as I believe Microsoft operating systems take time management into consideration. Massive failure from a time management perspective.

comments: Not good app . It does not work properly it is waste of datayou cannot do what you want to do but in this have there are so many ads come in between and its not give correct figure. Handwriting always come and say that give it highlight rating but I did not give it.

Horrible waste of money not even aging your photos they just use stock photos Updade i literally downloade ten minuts ago and then cancelled and its sayin it will. Cancel at the end of my billing cyle. It was supposed to be a 3 day free trial and as long as I cancelled I wouldn't be billed why should I be billed for something that's a hoax and doesn't do what its advertising it does ***DO NOT BUY

I downloaded the app to see if the other users raited the app correctly and they did. I tapped free trial and then continue and then my phone froze. After a few minutes my screen told me to pick a payment method and then I couldn't get out of that screen even though I was pressing the x. This was NOT a good experience. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
Ad wouldn't close in another game i was playing. Every time i pushed the "x" to close this app's ad, it opened Playstore instead.

Flat out hoax. Clearly made to get children to download and then out of frustration "sign up" past the blocking screens and thus get suckered into a subscription. Yes it does say it will cost after 3 FREE days. Here I wish I could make 'FREE' bigger and in bold font and make the 'it will cost' smaller and a light grey on a graphic background to ensure it cannot be seen or read... To devs and Google how about moving to a free trial WITHOUT automatic renewal. I propose this for ALL apps.

comments: The mobile version of this app is frustrating. It's great when it decides to work but 95% of the time, the app wont load, when it does load and play a video, it is constantly freezing. It also will freeze and then skip back by itself and replay audio that has past and then start playing again just to freeze again. Can we please have someone look into this and actually fix it????!!!

I'm sorry but this is ridiculous. The episodes. Don't play without glitches, if they play at all. One minute I can watch on my TV, the next I can't. Then there's the mobile app, which is a total loss. But what is REALLY effing annoying and weird, is that an episode is English dubbed one second, and Japanese subbed the next. And it happens, WHILE YOU'RE watching!!! I appreciate funimarion for providing fans with dub options, but the app is a disaster. And the website is even worse.

App needs work. Clicking on things like "recently add" takes you to list that keeps refreshing when you get to the end. What looks like 100s of shows is really just the same 15 shows repeated again and again. Click on a show and going back takes you all the way to the top of the list. There is also video playback issues... forever to load, pause and can't continue. Want to go back or skip forward a few seconds, nope, video stops working. Overall just a poor UI. Also needs a night mode.

This is my second review. I noticed you respond regularly to these however instead of "talk to customer support", "sorry you're having a bad time." and shrugging off doing something about it put some effort into fixing the app or just take it down. You have all the clear consistent information you need to figure it out: laggy, freezes, slow, bad resolution ect. It's not us it's you and we would dearly love for you to fix it so we can actually enjoy the content you provide.

I have this app on my phone, it's really awesome. I love it, but it won't let me subscribe even on the website, and I would like to. Sometimes when I go to a different page it's just blank, and I have to start all over. Not all the episodes of some anime are in English and I'm not really into reading subtitles so I have started some and don't finish. Other than that I deal with it and will continue watching, and trying to subscribe.

description:

Dreame is a dreamy community for female readers and writers providing captivating, serialized online fiction. comments: Love the stories! They grab me and hold me like only certain stories have ever in my life. There are some spelling and grammatical errors but nothing serious. The only thing that needs improvement is that the stories have holes in them. For example, in one story, 2 characters got married, an important part, but the wedding was not included, only details were added not the wedding ceremony itself. Also there was a very abrupt ending to one story almost like the author was forced to end it. Great!

First story I read was very alluring, even though there were a lot of grammatical errors. No ads that I can see, which is great. But the disappointment comes as soon as you get into the story, you run out of the credits it takes to unlock the chapters. Apparently it takes 15 days to unlock. That is ridiculous. It will take you several months to read one book without purchasing any credits. Smh. I personally will not be purchasing any credits and will probably delete the app.

My experience in using this app is quiet good but I'll rate only four stars because I am not satisfied. I don't think it's a good Idea that some episodes are locked and can only be unlocked with coins. Me as a reader, I feel to much excitement with the next episodes, but suddenly, get frustrated because the episodes are locked. And to be honest, if I am going to compare this app to wattpad? wattpad is way better than this one.

Im in between on how i feel. I have two complaints. 1. Some books allow you to wait for pages to open and others you are forced to pay coins. We should have option for both on every chapter of every book. 2. Why does the amount of coins change for each chapter. 15 to 28. It should be one price only. 10 to 15 coins tops. APP needs to make these changes.

I loved this app, I even just spent almost 20 dollars in two days. I could not access my account last night. I message the company, I can access my account now but all of the books I was reading are now back to the beginning. It didn't save my complete books. Now I have had this account for some time now and have spent about hundred dollars on the app. Well I guess I'm never getting another app like this. I suggest you don't waist your time.

title: Palmistry
description:
Palmistry is to judge and analyze the overall development and direction of life according to the length, thickness of fingers, the shape, color and pattern of palm. Palmprint is unique for everyone. Palmistry app takes photos of palms, uses artificial intelligence analysis to identify fingers and palm information, depicts palmprint lines such as life line , emotion line , intelligence line , career line , etc., carries out professional analysis combined with modern algorithms, and provides detailed reports.

Palmistry app is a basic concept of palmistry compiled by 5 AI engineers and 3 palmistry teachers. It uses deep neural network and development languages. AI learns nearly 5 million real palm sample image data with 120 positioning points. Through palmistry recognition, AI data is measured, matching the concept of palmistry, and an analysis report is obtained.

After entering the app, it is very simple to get personalized palm report.
1. Take photos of palm area as required.
2. We will mark the recognized fingers and palmprint on your palm photo.
3. Get personalized palm reports.

Different palmprint controls different areas:
Life line controls the energy, health and overall quality of life of the body.
Emotional line, controls motional life, partner's situation and marriage outcome.
Wisdom line, controls the whole personality thinking, character, etc.
Business line, controls business development and wealth accumulation.

comments: I just noticed after I convinced myself to try the first 3 "free" days, if you dont cancel you'll get an automatic payment of $94.99 - for a full year subscription debited to your account. And with all thats going on im pretty sure getting a refund or in touch with any customer service will be in vain. Watch out!

Horrible app. I feel sorry for people who believe in this stuff. It said I have poor health and that I need more cardio.... Had a yearly check up last week I'm in perfect health. I ride my bike everywhere, at least 40kms a day every day. It said I don't like my job and that I switch jobs often... I've had the same job for seven years and love it.. the only thing it got right was calling me a composer because I am. I did each test 3 times and got completely different results each time. Lmao scam

After you installed this app, it'll require a monthly payment, unless you press free trial (which caught me by suprise), which I was pretty disappointed. Would make more sense if you pay first and then install the app like other apps do, or have it tell you in the description at least. Even though I gave this rating one star, my real rating would have been a half star (which wasn't a option). What a waste of time and space. So yeah, definitely DON'T install this app.

This app is SUPER TRASH. It requires a monthly payment for a one time thing and you need to enter your credit card information for one time stuff. Also also... it's one of those apps which have a really annoying advertisement in game apps and stuff. Please don't download this app. I wasted my time on this so you don't have to.

Poorly written explanations with many errors in typing and grammar. For a service that requires revolving payments it needs a lot of improvements. I was even unable to rate the app when the pop up, popped up. I had to back out of the page. Cancelling immediately, less than 10 minutes after installing.

title: The New York Times
description:
Understand the world through award-winning independent journalism, expert reporting and multimedia storytelling with the NYTimes app.

Favorite Features:

‚Ä¢ A redesigned Top Stories provides a more consistent experience across all our apps and  website. Our new home page groups similar stories together so you can easily return to sections that interest you.
‚Ä¢ Breaking News alerts that link directly to developing stories.
‚Ä¢ Save articles for offline reading on any device.
‚Ä¢ Share articles, photos and videos through your favorite sharing platform.
‚Ä¢ Watch exclusive videos and browse our award-winning photography.
‚Ä¢ Experience NYT stories through innovative formats, like augmented reality and 360¬∫ video.
‚Ä¢ International coverage of current events and cultural stories from our 50 bureaus around the globe.
‚Ä¢ Podcasts: Listen to audio series including ‚ÄúThe Daily‚Äù and ‚ÄúModern Love.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ The Mini Crossword: Enjoy wordplay every day with the daily mini puzzle.
‚Ä¢ Read our Spanish-language coverage with NYT en Espa√±ol.
‚Ä¢ Reading at night? Turn on our experimental Night Mode for a dark-friendly app theme.

The NYTimes app for Android is built responsively and is formatted from 4" phones to 12"+ tablets. The app works on all devices running Android OS (5.0+).

The New York Times offers the following subscription options: 

‚Ä¢ Basic Digital Access, which includes unlimited article access. Cancel anytime.
‚Ä¢ All Digital Access: Basic + access to The New York Times Crossword and NYT Cooking. You also receive one bonus subscription to give to anyone you‚Äôd like. Cancel anytime.

The NYTimes app requires certain permissions to provide you with the best possible reading experience. Here‚Äôs a little bit about what each one does:
‚Ä¢ In-app purchases: This allows you to make purchases within the app.
‚Ä¢ Location: In exchange for the free content provided through the NYTimes app, we compile demographic information about our readers in accordance with our Privacy Policy. This information is no more specific than the state in which you are located.
‚Ä¢ Photos/Media/Files: This permission allows the app to cache images locally, reducing load times for pages you revisit.
‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi connection information: This item gives the app permission to use available Wi-Fi networks rather than your mobile network. In the absence of trusted Wi-Fi networks or if Wi-Fi is disabled, the app will make use of your cellular network (if available). Normal bandwidth and usage charges apply as detailed in your service agreement with your wireless carrier.

Feedback? Suggestions? Issues? Please contact our support team at android@nytimes.com. We‚Äôll do our best to assist you. Your feedback is important to us.

‚Ä¢ In-app purchases: This allows you to make purchases within the app.
‚Ä¢ Location: In exchange for the free content provided through the NYTimes app, we compile demographic information about our readers in accordance with our Privacy Policy. This information is no more specific than the state in which you are located.
‚Ä¢ Photos/Media/Files: This permission allows the app to cache images locally, reducing load times for pages you revisit.
‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi connection information: This item gives the app permission to use available Wi-Fi networks rather than your mobile network. In the absence of trusted Wi-Fi networks or if Wi-Fi is disabled, the app will make use of your cellular network (if available). Normal bandwidth and usage charges apply as detailed in your service agreement with your wireless carrier.

Feedback? Suggestions? Issues? Please contact our support team at android@nytimes.com. We‚Äôll do our best to assist you. Your feedback is important to us.
summary: Download the free NYTimes app to read the latest headlines from today‚Äôs news.
developerAddress:
620 Eighth Avenue
New York, NY 10018
recentChanges:
This version includes general bug fixes and improvements.
Reach out at android@nytimes.com with any questions, comments or other feedback.
comments: Downloaded the app and compared to my girlfriend's UI... Completely different. Very confused about why we have different interfaces. Mine sucks- it's almost to the point of one of those over simplified newsboards. Couldn't find the search bar, sections aren't easily navigable (no side bar), poorly designed. Let me choose my interface!

This app logs me out everytime I close it (sometimes even while I'm using it). It's hard to navigate and honestly not worth having if you have a subscription and can just get the same content online without all the hassle. It seems like an easy enough thing to fix, and you would think a company of this size would have the means to just fix it

The app sucks. I have subscribed to the basic service using the phone credit but still cannot access it. After opening some articles, I was notified that I had reached the amount of articles I could read and later reminded to subscribe again to enjoy the basic service. What?! To make the case worse, I cannot get refunded as well. I love the NYT, but its app is simply unreliable. I'm terribly discouraged from attempting another purchase. The same thing might happen again.

App is a good start but has room for improvement. I love when scrolling thru is interactive with the the content; its a nice touch. Wishlist: (1) morning brief should be available at the top of the page in the morning hours, and similarly the evening brief in the evening hours. (2) i want to pick what news i get notifications for (ex: turn off stocks, sports). (3) "for you" tab should let me pick categories the first time/for set up, but then just show me articles from those selections.

Notifications do not work. Click on one and it takes you to a different article. Examine every article available, and the one they notified you about simply isn't available. None of the games with properly anymore. Vertex shuts down. Spelling Bee rockets off a string of letters you didn't even touch and has to be manually restarted. The crosswords don't refresh properly. The acrostic clues are truncated. Sad.

Start Skouting and make new friends, or meet new people, anytime, anywhere.

Download and join Skout now!

Skout is the global network to meet and chat with new people and do fun things!

comments: Pretty good, however after 6 years of using skout I now can't send messages. A message sends and then disappears as if deleted. Tried logging in on all platforms (iPhone, Samsung, pc, tablet) on multiple accounts. Same issue. Emailed support, received a standard dismissive reply with no assistance offered. Now support just won't reply

I was a fan of this app for a while but all of a sudden its stuck on the blue logo screen & is unusable. The app said I had to allow location permission in the settings which I did & when i logged in on my laptop I was told I had to verify my number on the app, I have already done this but currently can not get past the logo screen to try and do it again. I tried contacting support but no response. I was also not contacted to help when I couldn't get the Buzz feed in the app. Uninstall for good

The first time I created the account I was like yes I have get what I wanted so long but after some days I get logged out and i tried to log in again but I can't it keep going in and going out and I don't know why is it like that......i just want to know why and fix the problem that is all thank you
It takes forever to load. Chats also disappear sometimes, messages are not sent even when trying many times to do so. It's completely awful and makes chatting to other people a nightmare.

Was logged in as the facebook login and was not even on for like 20 min. I closed the app down after making the profile and finished it and now it wont let me log back in as the Facebook alternative log in it will load the facebook screen and say loading. but then go away fast and still be on the login area for skout like what was the point of making the account for the Facebook area and then not 20 min later cant log in. Also I dont want to make 13 accounts just cuz one didnt work after.

title: Radish ‚Äî Free Fiction & Chat Stories
description:
Radish Fiction is a magical world where you can indulge in thousands of the hottest bite-sized romance stories, chat stories, love stories, and fantasy stories about seductive romance, literotica about secret affairs, erotic stories about bad-boy baby daddies, sexy vampires, and jaw-clenching scandals with billionaire bosses.

What you will love about Radish:
‚Ä¢ Spend endless hours reading chapters of free sexy stories from your new favorite romance books with daily updates
‚Ä¢ Read Radish Original stories written by some of Daytime TV‚Äôs TOP Emmy-winning writers
‚Ä¢ Enjoy Chat Stories - text message conversations that will have you tapping your way through text stories from your favorite genres including romance stories, fantasy and more.
‚Ä¢ Join live interactive chat rooms where you can talk directly with the authors and other fan fiction readers

You can have exclusive access to this land of unfiltered fiction whenever you desire. 
 
Looking for good romance books as a bedtime story? On your lunch break? Have a minute between classes? Dive in. Maybe even read a few episodes while the baby is sleeping. Jump into the story whenever and as often as you want -- your secret is safe with us, we promise.

What types of binge-worthy stories can you indulge in?
Meet Mina from our viral hit His Royal Appetite -- she just got fired from her job and thinks its the worst day of her life until she meets a sexy stranger named Leo at a bar.  After their hot one- night stand, Mina discovers he is not just ‚ÄúLeo-from-the-bar‚Äù -- he is Leopold Desmet, Duke of Brinovia. And the stubborn royal wants to taste everything on Mina‚Äôs menu. 

Looking for more than a one-night stand with a royal duke? Meet Caliana from the paranormal world of Torn Between Alphas. Faced with a financial crisis she has a choice: A) Borrow money. B) Find another job. C) Sell herself to the Alpha. Cali chooses C and offers her virginity to the highest bidder. But Xavier wants nothing to do with the girl his brother found online. He‚Äôs an Alpha and her annoying presence has ticked off an enemy wolf pack who would like nothing more than to see Xavier‚Äîand now Cali‚Äîdead.

Join college student Emily as she becomes the surrogate for enigmatic billionaire Colton Collins. She‚Äôs ready to have his baby but is completely unprepared for the passion that erupts between them, and the dark secrets in Colton‚Äôs past.

You can also jump into thrilling fantasy encounters with sexy frat boys, powerful alphas, vampire escorts, bad boy royals, and sexy billionaire bosses. Our diverse and award-winning authors have got you covered.

Who is part of our amazing author community?
We support and encourage writers from every realm. Read stories from NYTimes and USA Today‚Äôs best-selling authors like Kelley Armstrong, Sylvia Day, Lisa Renee Jones, Courtney Milan, and Marie Force. You will also discover stories by emerging writers and unique creator-owned titles like Simone Sharazi‚Äôs‚Äôs global phenomenon Once Upon a One Night Stand series. 

You can support Radish romantic stories writers by purchasing coins to unlock more juicy episodes. We also have a lot of fun in-app events where you'll have the chance to win coins!

Want to know more about our community and follow along for the journey?
Radish Fiction was built with passion across oceans from Seoul ‚Üí New York City. 

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/radishfiction/
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/radishfiction/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/radish_fiction

comments: Sometimes very good, has quiet a variety of good novels but a bit too short, the chapters are too short and sometimes too short to make sense when you compare the price you have to pay. I was trying to open the app on my laptop but its not working so i only have to access it on the phone and currently I dont have a phone, so how can one get the app on the laptop?

Edit: I've changed my rating because nobody should have to spend $100 on a book I don't care how good it is. Even dealing with the unlock of a free episode has become ridiculous. Just when you've spent over 30 coins and you're nearing the impossible of reaching the unlocking episodes ever 6 hours which is a ridiculous amount of time when it only take about 5 minutes to read a chapter it resets to a higher number than before. I've wasted way to much money. My own stupidity but still.

Great stories. Just too expensive for coins. And where is the option to buy said coins??? It's ridiculous that you have to wait 24 hours for the next page. That's longer than other similar apps. I wouldn't recommend this app to anyone. Waste of time and money. Hopefully Radish will change it's app to make it more affordable and exciting to use in the near future

Great variety of stories in different genres but it is expensive compared to other book subscription services and nearly impossible to get coins and read a book at a normal pace. It would work if you were following the release of chapters WITH the release but with stories that are complete or far ahead you have to pay more than the book is worth in coins to catch up. They need to offer an unlimited subscription service that is priced more competitive with Amazon Unlimited.

Most of the chapters are to short to justify spending the kind of money you'd have to on a book. Honestly it's cheaper to buy a published book. $10 for a full length 30 chapter books.. This app has you paying $12 for 27 SHORT chapters. And some of these stories have like 100 "chapters" that's like $45 for a book on this app...... No. Just no.

title: Viki: Korean Dramas, Movies & Chinese Dramas
description:
Watch all your favorite subtitled dramas, movies, and TV shows from Korea, China, Taiwan, and Japan anytime, anywhere, with Viki. Stream for free or subscribe to Viki Pass for an awesome HD experience, completely ad-free.

Our ever-growing collection of award-winning series, movies, variety shows, music performances, and more, is sure to have something for everyone. And with the mobile app, you can enjoy all your favorites both at home and on the go.
 
VIKI OFFERS
Subtitles: Unlimited access to thousands of subtitled shows and movies.
Korean Dramas: Watch Korea‚Äôs most popular shows, including Hotel Del Luna, What‚Äôs Wrong With Secretary Kim?, and Melting Me Softly. Enjoy an extensive library of timeless classics that include all your favorites, such as Boys Over Flowers, Heirs, While You Were Sleeping, and Descendants of the Sun.
Chinese Dramas: Watch China‚Äôs most popular drama series, including Nirvana in Fire, Go Go Squid!, Eternal Love, Princess Agents, Scarlet Heart, and Legend of Fuyao.
Taiwanese Dramas: Watch Taiwan‚Äôs most popular shows, including HIStory3, Before We Get Married, Hello Again!, and Behind Your Smile.
Japanese Dramas: Watch Japan‚Äôs most popular dramas, including You‚Äôre My Pet, Mischievous Kiss, In Time With You, and Hakuouki SSL.
Movies: Watch all your favorite films, including The Beauty Inside, A Werewolf Boy, The Man From Nowhere, The Outlaws, The Dude in Me, and more.
Kpop: Watch Korea‚Äôs Top Idol Groups, such as BTS, Blackpink, Twice, Monsta X, GOT7, and more, in all your favorite variety shows, dramas, and award shows.
Streaming Players and TV: Rakuten Viki is available on Roku, AndroidTV, AppleTV, Google Chromecast, and FireTV.
KOCOWA: Access KOCOWA with Viki‚Äôs Premium Plan to watch content from KBS, SBS, and MBC.

Legal Streaming: Rakuten Viki legally licenses all of its content. No need to worry about viruses.

Try Viki Pass free for 7 days first! Check out the plans at https://www.viki.com/pass.

Questions, comments or suggestions? Reach us at mobile@viki.com.

comments: Such a shame that even after so many complaints about the ads issue, the problem isn't fixed. Like you get 3 ads in an interval of 3-4secs and it happens in every 5-10 mins. Please fix it as soon as possible because it's really annoying. Respect your app users complaints and work on them

This is a really great app i remember when it just came out and how it wasnt very popular and there was lots of great contents and you didnt have to pay. Now its popular and you gotta pay but yh its a really great app. Its addicting tooüòÇ. At leat for me it is

At first, I used it okay but on my next open all the show that i can watch is from china and I cant find from others. Maybe there's a problem. Every open of this app is getting worst. If this problem continues. I decided to clear this app from my phone. Please fix it?!
Great app, I am able to watch a lot of shows them seem very interesting to me. The english translations for the show are faster than I expected since they are ready within three days usually.

Worst app I've ever seen üò° I can't watch any episode a minute without ads, continuously bombarded by ads. You can say it's the special app for ads in the name of drama. It'll be a good app without ads or 2-3 ads in whole episode (if necessary);üò∑

comments: Not a great app. The stories are cool, but you get to read 1-3 chapters before they start charging 3 tokens for each chapter. Their "deal" that they give to new readers is 5 dollars for 46 tokens which is only 15 chapters. As an alternative, there are points which you have to do "actions" for. Those actions are playing other games and getting to a certain point in them. Its 300 points for one chapter. If you want to use points, you'll be spending way more time on other apps than this one.

I tried several other comic apps, and this is the best one. Their translations are accurate, and the titles they have available are some of the best ones out right now like "who made me a princess", "abandoned empress", "emperors daughter", and so much more. The interface is so clean too. I don't really care about the money part. I would rather pay than look at ads, and messy interface bc of the ads. Here i can pay $5.00 and read in peace.

I really wish there's a new way to earn a free tokens or points, for example watching advertisment, or maybe a little mission like read a certain manga in a certain time. I really love this app because the mangas here are beautiful, i know that paying it, its worth but im worry about the people who doesn't have a coin, how they gonna read the manga they love if its locked? So please make a update version, and please someone agreed with me.

Most of the reviews are accurate. There isn't much you can read for free before you have to spend money to continue reading a story. And out of the three stories I sampled, they all felt rushed; like some info was cut out and the rest pushed together. The chapters are also too short, like maybe a five paragraph essay's length. All in all, not worth spending money on. You'd come out better actually buying physical books.

Easy to use and enjoy the stories, though agree there could be more variety of stories and that the token deals could be more of a deal. Still, gotta side-eye all the people complaining about cost. Five bucks gets you at least 13 chapters, which is basically a volume. Stop being greedy and support your content creators y'all.

title: BET+
description:
BET+ is a premium subscription streaming service with over 1,000 hours of your favorite Black content from the best Black creators. Now, you can stream Black culture: the movies you remember, the TV shows you love and the new series you can't live without. And they're all in one place, commercial free. 

Everything from The New Edition Story and Real Husbands of Hollywood to House of Payne is available on BET+. This service also includes exclusive original content such as First Wives Club from Girls Trip co-writer Tracy Oliver,  plus movies, plays and new series from Tyler Perry that you will only find on BET+. 

Check out some of the hits and exclusives: 

‚Ä¢	First Wives Club
‚Ä¢	Bigger 
‚Ä¢	Martin
‚Ä¢	Meet the Browns
‚Ä¢	House of Payne
‚Ä¢	The Oval
‚Ä¢	Dark Money
‚Ä¢	Preacher Lawson Comedy Special
‚Ä¢	Being Mary Jane Movie 
‚Ä¢	The New Edition Story
‚Ä¢	The Bobby Brown Story
‚Ä¢	Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
‚Ä¢	Real Husbands of Hollywood
‚Ä¢	The Quad
‚Ä¢	College Hill
‚Ä¢	Hit the Floor
‚Ä¢	TI & Tiny: The Family Hustle
‚Ä¢	The BET Awards
‚Ä¢	BET Hip Hop Awards


APP FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ Can't finish an episode? Continue watching right where you left off, without missing a moment. Just tap on the program you were watching, and our video player does the rest.

‚Ä¢ Chromecast support lets you cast your favorite shows to your TV. Just hook up your TV to your Chromecast device.

Full episode streaming is available within the U.S. only. 


Start Your Subscription Today!
‚Ä¢ Your first 7 days are free, then your paid monthly BET+ subscription begins.
‚Ä¢ Avoid auto-renew charges by canceling at least 24 hours before the end of your trial or current billing period

For help, visit www.bet.com/betplus/help or contact BETPlus-support@bet.com.


The Terms of Use for this app include arbitration for disputes -- see https://www.bet.com/betplus/legal-faq.html.

Your California Privacy Rights: https://www.bet.com/betplus/privacy-policy.html

Do Not Sell My Personal Info: viacomprivacy.com

New York, NY 10032
recentChanges:
BET+ is acting brand new‚Äîwith new episodes of our originals, new stand-up specials, and new additions to the movie collection! We‚Äôre adding new goodness all the time.

And those glitches you told us about? We‚Äôre handling those, too. Check out the very latest right now!
comments: Always stops my movies/shows and says "sorry this video isn't available right now" . Then I have to close out of the app completely & get back on. It'll work for some time then stop again. Glad I'm only testing out the free trial. I've already cancelled it & will definitely not be spending my money on something that should be free anyways! I also don't like the fact that you can't start a favorites list or anything like that. Not worth $10+ I can tell you that right now.

The app would be a good one if the message "Sorry video is unavailable" would stop popping up when I'm into a show. And the app is always buffering. I don't have this issue with any of my streaming app but BET+.It's not one show it's everyone I watch. If they could fix that issue I will give them 5 stars but now they will get 1.

Not working. I just downloaded tonight I verified my email watched an episode of a show and it played the same episode again it didn't play the next episode tried to go and hit play myself and still not working very disappointed thankfully in the trial but def not going to pay for it when I am already having problems.

Ridiculous! I had my tril, then paid the 9.99 and this application hasn't worked since or my smart TV or my phone. All it says is " something went wrong" like others also I see! This application needs to be fixed or I want a refund.

My payment was taken for this app today and now it wont even let me in and none of the videos play straight through you always get the message that the video isnt available. I wish I would have canceled before the payment was taken and it seems to be very limited selection to choose from its annoying

title: CamScanner - Scanner to scan PDF
description:
The world‚Äôs leading mobile scanning app:
* Installed on over 380 million devices in over 200 countries around the world
* Over 500,000 new registrations per day
* CamScanner, 50 Best Apps, 2013 Edition ‚Äì TIME
* Top Developer ‚Äì Google Play Store
* ‚ÄúThe application employs its own image cropping and enhancing algorithm that leads to clearer images.‚Äù ‚Äì Makeuseof.com
* ‚ÄúCamScanner may just be the best deal for scanning documents on your phone.‚Äù ‚Äì CNET.com

CamScanner helps you scan, store, sync and collaborate on various contents across smartphones, iPads, tablets and computers.

Features:

*Quickly Digitize Document
Just use your phone camera to scan and digitize all kinds of paper documents: receipts, notes, invoices, whiteboard discussions, business cards, certificates, etc. 

*Optimize Scan Quality
Smart cropping and auto enhancing ensures the texts and graphics in scanned documents are clear and sharp with premium colors and resolutions. 

*Extract Texts from Image
OCR (optical character recognition) feature recognizes texts in document images and extract them from images for later searching, editing or sharing. (Premium only)

*Share PDF/JPEG Files
Easily share documents in PDF or JPEG format with friends via various ways: post on social media, send attachment or document download link through email. 

*AirPrint & Fax Documents
Instantly print out any documents in CamScanner with nearby printer via AirPrint; directly select document and fax to over 30 countries from the app.

*Advanced Document Editing
Make annotations on documents with a full set of editing tools. Also adding customized watermarks are made available to mark your own documents.

*Quick Search 
When you have plenty of documents, you can use Tags to categorize and easily find them. In addition, OCR for Search helps you find texts inside image and notes. Just enter one keyword, you can quickly find the document you want. (Registrants only)

*Secure Important Documents
If you want to protect confidential contents, you can set passcode for viewing important documents; also, while sending document download link, you can set password to protect others from seeing it.

*Sync across Platforms
Sign up to sync documents on the go. Just sign in to any smartphone, tablet or computer (visit www.camscanner.com ) and you can view, edit and share any document. (Registrants only)

Premium Subscription Service:
1. OCR (Convert Image to TXT, Image to WORD & Image to EXCEL)
2. Batch download PDF files in web app
3. Share secured document downlink with others
4. Add extra 40 to the maximum number of collaborators
5. Add 10G cloud space
6. ID Mode Scan
7. Remove ads or watermarks
8. Collage of two separate documents
9. E-signature
10. Book Mode Scan

Payment models for Premium subscription:
-$ 4.99/month
-$ 49.99/year
Please note the subscription is automatically renewed at the end of the period unless you choose to cancel the subscription.

CamScanner users scan and manage 
* Bill, Invoice, Contract, Tax Roll, Business Card‚Ä¶
* Whiteboard, Memo, Script, Letter‚Ä¶
* Blackboard, Note, PPT, Book, Article‚Ä¶
* Credential, Certificate, Identity Documents‚Ä¶

3rd Party Cloud Storage Services Supported:
-Box.com, Google Drive, Evernote, Dropbox, 

The free version is an ad-supported version and scanned documents are generated are with watermark, plus a limit of 30 pages of adding annotations; Uploading to Evernote/OneDrive is only available for 7 days; Invite 10 collaborators per document at most.

Permission Overview:
1. Storage: CamScanner needs permission to store docs in your phone.
2. Camera: CamScanner needs permission to use camera to scan docs.
3. Phone: In order to bind Premium membership to your device or to ensure normal use without login, CamScanner needs to get your device ID.


We‚Äôd love to hear your feedback: asupport@intsig.com
Follow us on Twitter: @CamScanner
Like us on Facebook: CamScanner
Follow us on Google+: CamScanner

developerAddress:
Milpitas,CA
95035
recentChanges: OCR updated! It becomes easier for proofread as you may now enlarge the image when editing the texts.
comments: An undeniably useful application. Great for photographing documents if you don't have a scanner. Can be a little slow to send those files, but still useful. I had a security scare recently that reminded me to delete sensitive documents when I'm done with them. I'd be careful in that regard, but I still recommend the app.

Power packed app for scanning, OCR, format conversion, editing & sharing of documents. No other app comes close to it. Also really easy to use. Cons: pricings are quite steep for casual users Update: where's the recycle bin? If one accidentally deleted a page, only a message pops up informing they'll be kept for 30 days but you can't even find how to restore

Exceptional tool to manage and edit documents! A must for every literate. The options to share in any format and different sizes, import pictures from gallery or other documents, crop and customize scanned documents in a variety of available options makes it awesome. Looking forward to learning more features. There are ads when opening and closing the application that might irritate, but that's nothing compared to the services provided for free. Plus, one is free to purchase premium :)

Used this app long time ago for occasional use and need it once again for occasional use as well. Cant regain my old files i once had saved in the previous apps, they were IMPORTANT docs lost Even after doing the free trail still wont give access. This app is trash to me now. Its good for a one time use of a scan if need other than that its a no go. Waste of money for the $49.99.

This app used to work fantastic but now it intentionally lower the quality so handwriting is no longer legible. That will not get me to buy the app. That will make me find a different app instead. Now I'll be spreading word-of-mouth about another app instead of yours. A lot of people have downloaded your app because I told him it was very good, you're welcome. Now you made a liar out of me by lowering the quality of the free app like morons. No more free advertising for you. Dumbasses.

title: RoboKiller - Stop Spam and Robocalls
descriptionHTML:
RoboKiller is a spam call and robocall blocker that helps you filter and control incoming phone calls by automatically blocking and adding to the blacklist any unwanted caller.

No spam call can stand a chance when RoboKiller‚Äôs call blocking algorithm comes into play! Any robocall, telemarketer, unwanted caller or a phone call with an unknown caller id will be marked as spam with the help of a number blocking audio-fingerprinting technology. Stop unwanted phone calls with the robocall blocking app!

With RoboKiller you can:

BLOCK SPAM CALLS

- Stop your phone from constant ringing - spammers are added to our spam call blocker‚Äôs blacklist without bothering you;
- Reduce unwanted calls by 90% in your first 30 days of using the spam filter and robocall blocker app;
- Spam list updates automatically to ensure the most up-to-date protection, blocking even the most sneaky scam call or telemarketer;
- Use our robocall blocker to free yourself from scam: block phone calls you don‚Äôt want and keep the number blocked for as long as you wish.

CONTROL WHO CAN & CAN‚ÄôT CALL

- Block unwanted calls by adding them to Block List;
- Keep your contacts or any new number safe in Allow List;
- View the number you‚Äôve missed in you Recents;
- Pause blocking - temporarily disable spam blocker if you're expecting an important call from an unknown number, then continue to block calls when you‚Äôre ready.

FIGHT SPAM WITH ANSWER BOTS

- Choose from a variety of Answer Bots that will give spammers a taste of their own medicine, blocking them in style;
- Send spammers to lengthy hilarious recordings provided by RoboKiller;
- Listen to blocked and recorded calls to check what you‚Äôve missed.

REPORT SPAMMERS

- Join the fight against robocalls: report any specific number or an unknown caller to our spam blocker and prevent it from reaching other RoboKiller users;
- Contact our dedicated customer service team 24/7 regarding any issues with our spam call blocker app.

Block phone calls you don‚Äôt want to get with RoboKiller - scam call and robocall blocker.

RoboKiller has been featured on The New York Times, NBC, Wired, Engadget, Vice and other publications.

RoboKiller is a spam blocker built by people who hate robocalls and respect privacy. We promise to never sell your data, spam you, or waste your time. Our mission is to stop robocalls forever, or die trying! Block telemarketing calls and stop spam calls with our unwanted call blocker.

RoboKiller is free to download. A subscription is required to use the service, but you can try it out completely free for 7 days. Once the trial ends, your subscription will automatically renew and you‚Äôll be billed monthly. You can cancel your subscription at any time.

Answer your phone without fear thanks to RoboKiller, a spam call blocker app!
summary: Block 99% of Robocalls + Spam Calls
developerAddress:
101 S. Broadway St
South Amboy, NJ 08873
recentChanges:
Hey there, RoboKillers! We're back at it again with a new update:

- Fixed a bug that caused the app when there were no registered calls on an account

Thank you for helping us continue the fight against spammers and robocallers!
comments: Doesn't deliver as advertised. First week of use, in trial period. All the robocalls tonight rang through and disturbed my peace. Only when I physically rejected a call did it go to the recorded answer. The caller was a collector I believe and he immediately got that it was a recording and disconnected the call so it did not fool anyone. When I tried to reach RoboKiller customer support thru the app, none of the links worked to do so. Very frustrating. [UPDATE] Has worked as advertised lately.

Found that it did not recognize the calls that are actually bugging me (spoofed calls in mandarin). Was only able to block spoofed calls that was similar to my number where most are in the realm of 1-800... Etc. Cancelled after free trial. Only successfully blocked a call from my bank that I'm fairly sure was legitimate (to be confirmed). I liked that it transcribed voicemail messages, but like I said, most of them are in mandarin so... My visual assessment of the number was way more reliable.

Works mostly as advertised. Surprised at the negative reviews here, haven't had trouble. Still, it doesn't waste as much scammer time as the marketing wants you to believe. I only get "ring once" or pre-recorded robocall scams that are "press 1 to connect" or make you call back a number. These aren't affected by the advertised "hilarious" Robokiller bots. Only the legit Dr's offices, uber drivers etc using non-whitelist numbers get the bots. I assume the real benefit is in the database.

The app doesn't really work. I still get just as many spam calls as I did since I got it. What sucks is that the fix is to add a spam call to the list, but its just like me blocking the number only difference is now. They change the numbers like they always fo and the call still goes through. Im letting this month chatge after that Im uninstalling it

Phone does ring twice then the app will pick up. There are a lot of answer bots to pick from. After the call is done you can listen to the phone cell. The app also stores your voice mails from your contacts.

title: AllTrails: Hiking, Running & Mountain Bike Trails
description:
Explore the outdoors with AllTrails! Discover nature with hiking, biking, backpacking and running trails around the world. Log your hike, walk, run or mountain bike ride with our GPS activity tracker. Looking for a good spot for camping or backpacking? The AllTrails community is a great place to get inspired. 

View trail maps to find that kid friendly or dog friendly trails that you‚Äôve been searching for. Take the mountain biking, horseback riding, or backpacking trip you‚Äôve always wanted to do. Explore national parks or discover new running maps, biking and hiking trails in your area. Download offline maps, get to the trailhead and start your outdoor adventure.

Whether it‚Äôs a hike or a cycling ride you‚Äôre after, AllTrails inspires you with trail maps for your next outdoor adventure.

Explore 100,000+ Hiking Trails and Mountain Bike Routes
‚Ä¢ AllTrails has the largest collection of GPS trail maps, topo maps, and downloadable offline maps for trails in national parks and your own neighborhood
‚Ä¢ Discover the outdoors with new mountain biking, running or hiking trails, with reviews and ratings from a community of hikers, cyclists and trail runners like you
‚Ä¢ Find a hike, mountain bike ride, or trail run that‚Äôs perfect for your fitness and experience level
‚Ä¢ Filter by dog friendly, kid friendly, and wheelchair friendly walking trails

Record Your Outdoor Adventures with the AllTrails GPS Activity Tracker
‚Ä¢ Turn your phone into a GPS activity tracker and follow your trail so you don‚Äôt get lost while exploring the outdoors
‚Ä¢ View your hiking, running and cycling stats at a glance
‚Ä¢ Share your latest backpacking, hiking, running and mountain biking activities with friends on Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp

Save Your Favorite Trails
‚Ä¢ Explore all the hiking and cycling trails on your bucket list and add new ones to check out
‚Ä¢ Easily save your favorite trails to run, hike, camp or bike again and again
‚Ä¢ Follow the hikers, cyclists and runners that inspire you

Get GPS Driving Directions to the Trailhead
‚Ä¢ With just one tap, get GPS driving directions so you can get to the trailhead in no time

Hike across the most beautiful national parks and nature preserves on the planet. Whatever your fitness or experience level, AllTrails will help you explore new trails with confidence.

---

Get More with AllTrails Pro!
‚Ä¢ Download offline maps - track your exact GPS location as you navigate the trail, even when you don‚Äôt have a signal
‚Ä¢ Never miss a turn with off-route notifications
‚Ä¢ Stay safe with Lifeline - assign safety contacts who know your plan and can track your progress
‚Ä¢ Know what to expect with real-time map overlays including air quality, satellite weather, pollen, and light pollution
‚Ä¢ Always have a backup - design and print stunning custom topo maps
‚Ä¢ Experience AllTrails ad-free - remove the distraction of ads and focus on the journey
‚Ä¢ 1% for the Planet - feel good knowing that part of your subscription will be going directly to helping the environment

AllTrails Pro is available as an annual subscription for USD $29.99/year, or you can get three years for the price of two when you buy our 3 Year Plan via a one-time payment of USD $59.99. You can subscribe and pay through your Google Play account. Your annual subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Auto-renew can be turned off anytime by going to your My Subscriptions page on Google Wallet. Access more AllTrails Pro features on our website: https://www.alltrails.com

---

COMPATIBILITY
Sign up required to favorite trails, record your activity, or follow users

SUPPORT
We love hearing from our users! Email us here: android-support@alltrails.com

LEGAL
Terms of Use: https://www.alltrails.com/terms

summary: Explore the outdoors: hiking trail maps, bike trails, camping & backpacking maps
developerAddress:
530 Bush Street, Suite 900
San Francisco, CA 94108
recentChanges:
Android 10.6.2:
- Zoom into a trail map to see the suggested direction of travel.
- Photos taken in the app will now appear in your gallery in Android 10.
- Improved sharing of trails, lists and maps in Android 10.
- Multiple bug fixes.
comments: Tried many of these trail apps and this one has more trails listed than most, but it takes way too long for your "completed" & "stats" to update. It should be done immediately (and no it's not my cell service because i never had any issues with other apps in this regard). I see you went for quantity and not quality.

This app is a great tool, not only to find trails around the world, but also, and in my opinion more importantly, accurately navigate your travels. Not all Trails are marked well, but with Allatrails you don't have to worry. Also the social aspect is a fun bonus to read real reviews on the journey on which you will embark.

Once I am on the walk and tracking on GPS I love the app - even locally is taken me to places I wasn't aware of. However when I'm planning the walk I find the app counter intuitive. for example once you downloaded a map it's difficult to find it again, I've never worked out how to look at various layers. Some walks include a narrative with waypoints others do not.

The app is amazing my only complant is that to use some of the more advanced map overlays like the terrain stuff on google maps, you need to pay for it. But you can find all sorts of trails and what not in the base app. I found so many off road car trails and the users can upload there trail photos so it makes for an amazing app for me. I've been looking for off road trials that are not the major rock crawling ones for months now, and i found them so damn quick. Would definitely recommend.

UPD: Didn't help at all. App works really slow. Doesn't load my lists sometimies. Often doesn't update GPS coordinates unless I close and open map again. Doesn't load images (unless I go to Share menu). It was a good app, that's why I bought lifetime subscription. Now I'm thinking it was mistake. Pro maps do not worth it. Really dissapointed with direction you guys going :(

title: TuneIn Radio: Live Sports, News, Music & Podcasts
description:
LIVE SPORTS. MUSIC. NEWS. PODCASTS.

TuneIn is your source for timely political news this 2020 Election season. Spanning from Super Tuesday to the Inauguration, TuneIn provides in-depth coverage from national networks like MSNBC, CNN, FOX News Talk, CNBC and more as well as the local radio stations reporting on the races close to home.

TuneIn brings together live sports, music, news, podcasts and AM & FM radio from around the world in one free app.

Featuring the world‚Äôs largest library of live, on-demand and original audio at your fingertips, hear what matters most to you, discover new moments that move you.

With live sports, exclusive music channels, fast-breaking news, more than 5.7 million podcasts and over 100,000 AM and FM radio stations globally, you‚Äôre never without something amazing to listen to. Catch your favorite NFL, NBA, MLB or NHL team, binge your favorite podcast, drop in on your hometown's local news radio and discover new music all without leaving the TuneIn app.

TuneIn Premium subscribers can listen to the NFL, MLB, NBA and NHL, commercial-free news from MSNBC, CNBC and Fox News Talk, and a vast array of nonstop commercial-free music stations. 


The Top 5 Reasons To Download the TuneIn App:

1. Never Miss a Live Sports Game
At work, at home, at the gym, on the road. Hear live and on-demand coverage of every NFL, MLB, NBA and NHL game ‚Äì plus College Football, Baseball, Basketball, Hockey, talkSPORT & ESPN Radio ‚Äì literally everywhere you go.

2. Endless Music
Never worry about having to pick the next song with exclusive music stations curated by renowned DJs, influential tastemakers and special guests. Discover the best new songs and artist in every genre, along with all of your favorites.

3. Breaking News from Every Angle
Experience live 24-hour news radio from local, national and global sources, including top outlets like CNN, MSNBC, Fox, BBC News, NPR, CNBC and Cheddar. Listen to MSNBC, CNBC and Fox News completely ad-free with TuneIn Premium.

4. All Your Favorite Podcasts
From chart toppers to newly discovered gems, immerse yourself in the world of talk. Follow classic podcasts like RadioLab and the TED Radio Hour Podcast, explore top-rated hits like The Joe Rogan Experience Podcast, NPR's Up First podcast and NYT's The Daily podcast or search for your favorite podcast in the TuneIn app.

5. The Most Powerful Free Radio App in the World
Radio has never been so simple. Stream 100,000+ AM radio, FM radio and internet radio stations from around the globe. Radio stations currently trending in the US: CNN, MSNBC, BBC News Radio, KQED-FM and WDR 2 Ruhrgebiet. 

Not Just on Your Phone
TuneIn is available for free across 200 platforms and connected devices. Stream music from your Apple Watch while you work out. Tap into TuneIn for CarPlay to catch the game on your drive home. Have your podcast follow you around the house with Google Home, Amazon Echo and Alexa.


Upgrade to TuneIn Premium for the Full Experience
 ‚Ä¢ Live Sports - Football, Baseball, Basketball, & Hockey, ESPN Radio & More
 ‚Ä¢ Commercial-Free Music
 ‚Ä¢ Commercial-Free News - CNN, BBC News Radio & More.
 ‚Ä¢ Today‚Äôs Best Podcasts
 ‚Ä¢ 100,000 Radio Stations



Subscribe to TuneIn Radio Premium through the free app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a monthly subscription fee according to your country. The subscription fee will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. Your subscription will automatically renew every month at the then-current subscription fee unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then-current subscription period. Your iTunes account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the then-current period. The subscription fee will be charged monthly. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings.

Privacy policy: http://tunein.com/policies/privacy/
Terms of use: http://tunein.com/policies/

comments: When one thing gets fixed, a bunch more get broken. (1) Now, if I get a phone call, the audio for whatever I'm listening to when the call comes in pauses but then resumes several minutes later while the call is still in progress. Occasionally the call is dropped. (2) When I open the app, it no longer resumes what I was listening to most recently even though I have that setting enabled. (3) Constantly getting stream connection errors. Some days I have to just give up.

A very important live news app. It is one of my most preferred app. before other similar app. A must download app. for anyone who wants to stay updated with live happenings around the world. I personally rate it five(5) stars plus. The developer of this Application, please keep improving on it's performance. Thanks.

Looks pretty good. I uninstalled it at first as it looked like there was no way to use it for free. One bad thing I've noticed is that the mini player appearing in the drop down notification menu vanishes, especially if you go and look at a YouTube video or something. I'd rather it stay in the notification menu so I can restart the stream. It doesn't auto restart very well.

This app is like a ticking time bomb in your phone. Without even opening the app, it just starts playing music at random times. You can't even shut it down because it doesn't show as a running app and continues to blast noise out during meetings or at 2am while you're trying to sleep. You have to reboot your phone to turn off the noise.

*New update* Same issues I don't know what you guys did with the latest update but you screwed it up. It's extremely glitchy. The audio while paused is gone forever. The going forward or back 30 seconds now needs seconds of buffering and only goes back about a minute. It stops playing randomly and I have to press stop and then play. BRING BACK THE OLD WORKING VERSION!
