comments: It's a great VPN, WHEN IT WORKS! More often than not in my experience it tries to connect to a server, rather than actually doing it... Sometimes its instant and I'm filled with glee, however, 90% of the time I'm relogging, trying different servers, and just hoping to SOMEDAY connect to one!! I've tried all alternative options in "settings" to no avail. This happens with the paid version, which is why I'm very dissapointed. DO NOT BUY; if you experience this as well through the free trail.

NordVPN does not work with most streaming services. The company's position: "accessibility to the streaming services is an extra feature and we do not guarantee that you will always be able to access it with no issues 24/7." Even though they advertise that they offer uninterrupted streaming. So you have to disconnect, then reconnect, every time you wish to stream. They will respond by saying you should contact customer service. 2 chats, 4 emails later (ID #5305367)no change. Time for a new VPN.

Great VPN! If you are using on a Chromebook and you are using apps, then you need to install and activate the NordVPN app to be fully protected. There is a Chrome extension that protects the browser ONLY. It was easy to find the answer to this question on the FAQs by NordVPN. Some streaming services do not allow you to use their service (YouTube TV as of 3/2020) and NordVPN at the same time. Other apps that don't allow you to use NordVPN, also. I am concerned mostly about financial transactions.

Not very user friendly, I had to figure out by myself and totally by chance that I have to use obfuscated connection to successfully connect without being blocked. There is no users' guide provided,would be cool though,with every scenario to troubleshoot.And it's not working on my android tv box, leaving me stuck to the 8" tablet to watch movies. I'm not impressed. Tough luck that I got the 3 year subscription without testing the first year. The 3 stars would be for the price then.

So far so good. Expressvpn has left me with a useless 6 month subscription in China. It just won't connect and is slow as a snail when it does once and hour. Nord connected quickly and is good so far. I wish I'd spent the money here first but I had good luck with the other last time. I'll keep both just in case now.

comments: It's such a shame, I was enjoying this app alot for the first 2/3 days. My account was flagged and banned for NO reason. I had no reason to have breached any of the terms. The online support was arrogant and and explained nothing. The links the 'support' send do not work. I was enjoying my time with the people I met on here, but that has all be wasted because of poor support from Taimi.

I want to say that this app is amazing, because it's a really great app. However I find myself constantly frustrated by hangups in how it runs, I completly understand the restriction on an app like this when it comes to making money. This has led me to be confused by what features I can and cannot use as some times I can use a feature while other times I'm completely barred from them. I love the concept of the app and it does work well, it's just not very user friendly to those who cant pay.

It's a good, friendly app with LOTS of features! I like that there's a newsfeed, video posting, groups you can join, add friends, etc. There are certain features (for unlimited use) you have to pay for which is understandable. I don't like that it notifies everytime someone views your profile. Why do I need to know who viewed my profile and decided not to "like" me? And why would I want every person instantly knowing I'm viewing their profile (especially when they're "online")... Awkward.

Taimi is by far my favorite app nowadays. It's not the perfect app, naturally, but it's probably the best one in the Store currently. They can be a bit pushy with subscriptions at times but I've always been using it in the free version nevertheless, and I've been having a great time. So it's not a "pay to play" app. I absolutely recommend it!

it's good and it feels quite safe. location isn't always precise, for example it happens frequently that users specify their location in their bios because the "location setting" indicates somewhere else. feels kind of weird to be asked about body hair when making the profile. chats are alright, people were kind and it's good to have some reveals accessible even if you're not paying. better than many others.

title: Sideline - Get a Second Number for a Business Line
description:
SECOND PHONE NUMBERSideline gives you a 2nd phone number on your smartphone to let you divide your communications easily and without confusion.

Sideline is more than a second line for you and your business. It‚Äôs the flexible, personal communication app that gives your customers a work number they can use - not your private one. Already tens of thousands of professionals are using Sideline to help them transform how they keep in touch with their customers with a dedicated second phone number that gives out your professional caller ID - and keeps your professional second line separate from your private one.

By creating a custom business number, Sideline gives professionals like you the chance to connect with customers, build your small business, and manage all your contacts and communications quickly and easily. Basically, you get your own dedicated, personal work number without the hassle of buying a second phone.

Sideline is your second line designed for professionals - and gives you amazing features like:

AUTO-REPLYIf you miss a call on your work line, Sideline responds automatically with a custom private message.

A TEAM WORK NUMBERSplit one business number with multiple devices, so your team or department can be more responsive in answering your work line.

CUSTOM NUMBERBuild your identity with a personalized second number, such as ‚Äú(555) PET-SHOP‚Äù or ‚Äú(555) FLOWERS.‚Äù So you can pick a more durable work line and professional identity, and not just a burner phone number.

LOCAL AREA CODESearch area codes to find a local second phone number for your company or small business.

BUSINESS TEXTINGText-enable your business to easily connect with customers using your 2nd or work line.

ENTERPRISE DASHBOARDManage work numbers on employee devices. (Enterprise account required. See Sideline.com for details)

Because Sideline is so helpful and efficient at helping small business and professionals, we‚Äôve got people porting their Google second number over to Sideline.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES FOR YOUR SECOND PHONE LINE

CARRIER RELIABILITYAll calls are cellular (not VoIP) to make your 2nd phone number as reliable as your 1st.

UNLIMITED CALLING ON YOUR SECOND LINECalls use your existing carrier plan, so no extra calling credits needed for your second number.

MESSAGINGTexting includes SMS and picture messaging, group messaging, and more. So you keep all the functionalities you need.

CUSTOM CALLER ID ON YOUR 2ND PHONEIt‚Äôs clear which phone number is ringing, so you can prioritize accordingly.

SEPARATE VOICEMAILRecord a professional greeting or set up multiple greetings for every situation.

VOICEMAIL TO TEXTSave time and conveniently read voicemail transcriptions as a text.

DO NOT DISTURBSend Sideline calls directly to voicemail on nights, weekends, or holidays.

NUMBER PORTINGTransfer an existing number to Sideline from another device or landline.

WEB MESSAGINGAccess your Sideline business number online and text from the desktop.

Sideline is a business number, not a burner phone! It‚Äôs a second number for professionals that brings connections, inspiration and innovation to small business owners. Keep your private and your work number separate and manage your business more effectively.

Download Sideline and create your 2nd line today!

Privacy policy & terms of use

comments: The app is great! Call quality and features are reliable and high quality. I love the customization options. The only thing I wish they could add for the android version of the app is the feature to change the main and message wallpaper. This feature is available on the iphone version of the app.

I'm a subscriber for ~2 years. My experience was positive to start and has continued to get worse. Unfortunately, I don't recommend. Phone calls have delayed audio despite strong connection. I've communicated issues and they've persisted. Will update if that changes with this review.

Good App..yet frustrating..helps out alot...but wheres the feature to delete more than 1 message...it either deletes 1 text message or them all...and also the quality of sending and receiving video and photo content are horrible...also why is there a whole other number showing up on my phone when someone calls me...i never know who is calling me
Frustrating. Everything was great until today. I keep getting messages that say to keep your device mobile private open sideline app and call again. IM IN SIDELINE APP. I've reinstalled 3 times now

I Have had Sideline for almost a year with no issues. I use this number for business, so it is critical. Because of a technical problem, my calls were suddenly going directly to my other numbers voicemail without ringing. I then had need to call customer service to get help. Let me tell you, it was an extraordinary experience. I was very impressed. Such real, personable, professional service ! In the end, Dominic had the whole thing corrected in less than an hour. Stellar performance !

title: SHOWTIME
description:
With the SHOWTIME app, you can stream entire seasons, star-studded movies, groundbreaking documentaries, comedy, sports (including SHOWTIME Championship Boxing), and much more ‚Äì all commercial-free. Watch all the latest episodes of your favorite shows whenever and wherever you are ‚Äì live or on demand. New titles added all the time so there‚Äôs always something great to watch. On the go? Download full episodes and movies and watch offline. No cable subscription needed!

Simply download the SHOWTIME app to sign up for your free trial, then only $10.99/month. Create your account and start streaming on your favorite phone, tablet, connected TV, gaming console or on your computer by visiting Showtime.com. Cancel anytime.

The SHOWTIME app is a standalone streaming service that enables anyone with a high-speed internet connection in the U.S. to sign up for SHOWTIME.

*You will not be charged for the SHOWTIME streaming service during the free trial period. TO CANCEL YOUR SUBSCRIPTION AND AVOID BEING CHARGED, YOU MUST CANCEL BEFORE THE END OF THE FREE TRIAL PERIOD. To keep your subscription once your trial period is over, you will not have to do anything.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and optimizations
comments: this app is painful to use. showtime needs to hire a UX designer who actually watches shows from an app. the search field is buried in a menu. If you add a show to your list, it's hard to access the full series so that you can watch/download new shows (you can only do this by finding the search field and searching for the show again). You can't add a series to your list, just individual episodes. When you're starting a new series it lists the episodes in reverse chronological order. I guess this makes sense if you've been watching the whole time and are just looking for new episodes, but for starting a new series (especially since you can only find episodes by starting with the search field), it's annoying to always start with the last season, and then have to scroll all the way to the end to get to the first episodes. wouldn't be so bad if it weren't so hard to get there in the first place. also, it's easy to forget this format (maybe it's just me), so frequently when i start a new series i'm starting with the last episode of the first season. I could go on but why bother. Its nice that you can download shows and watch when you're offline. app gets 1 extra star for that feature.

Crashes every 5 minutes says"playback interrupted"Then makes me log in again. Once I sign back in I dont know where I left off, it wont show you either.You have to scroll through each episode to see where you left off. When it finally does play it says loading and lasts for 30 seconds or more every few minutes.The shows are great if you are ever able to actually watch them.Watch it through prime it's so much better, it doesnt crash and when you hit play it picks right back up where you left off.

I am at my wit's end with this app, it says there isn't enough space on my phone to download episodes, despite having a ton of space left on my phone. The app will also randomly sign me out for no reason, and if I back out of the app to check a notification while I'm watching a show, 1 of 2 things happens:1. it actually plays with no errors, exactly where I left off in the show. 2. A playback error occurs and I have to restart the episode. Absolutely ridiculous.

Horrible! Crashes all the time. Constantly buffers. When you come back to a show, it doesn't keep the place your left off. It doesn't even keep track what episode you are on! I have Netflix, hulu, Prime video, HBO and they all work great! Unlike Showtime!!

The layout and the way this app functions needs ALOT of work. It cant even remember what episode you were watching you have to manually search for it and then select it. THEN if you go out of the app for any reason it cancels playback and you have to do the search all over again. Then before you watch anything it asks if you are sure you want to watch without using wifi... EVERY SINGLE TIME.

recentChanges:
We're constantly working on improving Norton Secure VPN and appreciate all of your feedback.

In this release, we've been focused on making improvements to the connectivity issues that have been occurring.

Any suggestions? Let us know what you think by leaving a review.
comments: Connection to VPN disconnects every few minutes requiring user to relaunch the app to re-establish the connection. Very annoying when you want to continue browsing knowing the VPN will remain connected. To the best of my knowledge I have instructed my phone not to restrict the app and allow it to auto start. I have also enabled 'connect automatically' within the app itself. App also doesn't launch immediately, instead you have to look at s picture of a lighthouse?

I will revise this review after I have had time to use it more and evaluate all aspects of it, but I strongly recommend using Norton antivirus and Norton Secure VPN, as well as most Norton products in general because it's been a solid, tried and true company for at least 40 years, (or as long as I've been alive.)

Great for security I had the same issue others had on the trial broke down an paid for the subscription and it works totally opposite of the trial The security for transactions is completely different very secure I do not have every thing I look up follow me advertisers are not able to follow me. If you bank or use a trading platform or purchases you will see the difference. I was very skeptical. Glad I made the purchase and was able to buy a lifetime purchase norton AV for 5 devices with VPN.

Update: 3/14/2020 - now no longer works at all, not able to "set up Norton account" can't even get into the program. Have tried uninstalling and reinstalling several times. Norton Mobile Security seems to work just fine...but this VPN app flat out doesn't work. I answer to developer comment, same problem either over my home wifi or cellular. Doesn't matter. Takes a LONG time to connect. Many times it NEVER connects. When it works, it seems to work well though...just very hit and miss.

What a ridiculous and useless app. Unstable, and wouldn't connect. I assumed it was because I was using a limited version during the free trial. So then I went to cancel, which was insanely difficult and wound up being charged for something I can't use. Tryi g to request a refund from my phone on the mobile website put me into an endless loop of new tabs being opened, without ever being able to request my refund. This comes off like a scam, which is a shame considering the Norton reputation.

title: MLB
description:
The MLB app ‚Äì the #1 source for live baseball on your Android phones and tablets ‚Äì is the official app of Major League Baseball.
 
**** MLB APP SUBSCRIPTIONS ****
The MLB app offers two subscription options for its extensive premium features, covering live MLB games from Opening Day to the World Series.
- Yearly recurring fee of $19.99.
- Monthly recurring fee of $2.99.
- MLB.TV subscribers receive MLB Audio features for free.
 
**** 2020 FEATURES ****
(NOTE: Additional features and functionality will be available in regular app updates throughout the season)
 
‚Ä¢ Watch and Listen Live
‚Ä¢ Watch the MLB.TV Game of the Day (subject to blackout restrictions; no subscription required)
‚Ä¢ Access your MLB.TV subscription to watch every out-of-market game (Subscription required)
‚Ä¢ Watch in-game highlights (No blackout restrictions; no subscription required)
‚Ä¢ Listen to Home, Away and Spanish-language (where available) radio broadcasts (MLB Audio subscription required)
‚Ä¢ Watch 60fps video for unmatched high-quality streaming of select live MLB.TV broadcasts (supported phones and tablets only; MLB Audio subscription required)
‚Ä¢ Watch Condensed Games (MLB Audio subscription required)
‚Ä¢ Multi-platform live audio access for MLB Audio subscribers (portable to Mac/PC and to the MLB skill on voice activated platforms with a valid MLB.com account)
‚Ä¢ Universal support for MLB Audio subscribers, accessible on Android phones and tablets and other supported mobile devices
‚Ä¢ Watch MLB Network programming (pay TV authentication required)
 
-- Follow Your Favorite Team --
‚Ä¢ Enhanced, Gameday pitch-by-pitch features, including realistic ballpark renderings from all 30 MLB parks
‚Ä¢ Breaking news, schedules, interactive rosters and player stats for every team
‚Ä¢ Sortable batting, pitching and fielding statistics
‚Ä¢ Favorite team icon home screen widget for one-tap access to your favorite team‚Äôs page (Phones only)
‚Ä¢ MLB icon home screen widget for in-progress scores around the league
‚Ä¢ Designate your favorite team to be featured as the app's home screen and be highlighted on the scoreboard, and in the news and video sections
‚Ä¢ Search function for all active and historical MLB player cards (Phones only)
‚Ä¢ Closed captioning for live video
‚Ä¢ Application available in Spanish language, requires device language set to Spanish
 
The MLB app features live action from the Arizona Diamondbacks, Atlanta Braves, Baltimore Orioles, Boston Red Sox, Chicago Cubs, Chicago White Sox, Cincinnati Reds, Cleveland Indians, Colorado Rockies, Detroit Tigers, Houston Astros, Kansas City Royals, Los Angeles Angels, Los Angeles Dodgers, Miami Marlins, Milwaukee Brewers, Minnesota Twins, New York Mets, New York Yankees, Oakland Athletics, Philadelphia Phillies, Pittsburgh Pirates, St. Louis Cardinals, San Diego Padres, San Francisco Giants, Seattle Mariners, Tampa Bay Rays, Texas Rangers, Toronto Blue Jays and Washington Nationals.
 
Access MLB Audio for $2.99 per month or $19.99 annually. You will be automatically billed $2.99 through Google Play every 30 days or $19.99 every 365 days until you cancel your subscription. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your subscription can be managed, and the auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the Google Play Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
 
¬© 2020 MLB Advanced Media, L.P. All Major League Baseball trademarks and copyrights used herein are the property of the applicable MLB entity. All rights reserved.

recentChanges: MLB is proud to announce At Bat is now MLB, your #1 app for live baseball. Major League Baseball is always live with the MLB app. With the same great features, continue following your favorite team‚Äôs action with game tracking and video highlights, along with up-to-the-moment stats, standings, news, and more. Get the number one app for live baseball, download MLB today.
comments: The app will not cast my MLB Network cable subscription on Chromecast. All I get is the scoreboard screen and it says it's " Ready to Cast". But it doesn't. I was hoping to watch MLB Network on our den (non cable box) TV. Frustrating...

Initially had trouble (seeing ads and the MLB Audio function not working). Turns out that my auto-renew via PayPal wasn't kicking in here on the app because my MLB account was under a different email address. So, I have revised my rating from 2 stars to 4.

Cannot login to MLB Network with Spectrum. Tried multiple times over the last month, just updated the app again today, and it still doesn't work. I've had At Bat (& now MLB) for years with no problems accessing MLB Network, please fix.
Wow, been using this app for years to listen to games in the past but after the updates during the off season it now eats up nearly 2 gigs of data for a game....DATA HOG. BEWARE.

Purchased it last year and it worked great - so much so that I purchased a gift subscription for my cousin who is out of market for his favorite team. So far this year, not so much. It won't recognize my purchase; it will tell me I have already purchased, but will the go back to the purchase screen. I have done a force stop several times, and have uninstalled and installed at least a dozen times since the first game of preseason. Also having trouble with my Kindle Fire tablet and my Firestick app, as neither of those will recognize my purchase either - so it appears to be an MLB glitch. Hopefully they will fix it soon. Five stars last year; so far this year 2 stars for the aggravation. Please fix it soon!!!

title: Rosetta Stone: Learn Languages
description:
For the first time, we‚Äôre offering every one of our languages under one subscription. Flip between languages as often as you‚Äôd like and enjoy the freedom to get seriously curious. To access, simply select Unlimited Languages when you subscribe. 

EXPANDED DESCRIPTION  
Millions of people have learned languages using Rosetta Stone¬Æ, and you‚Äôre next. From day one, you‚Äôll: 
 ‚Ä¢ Stay focused with a personalized learning plan based on your motivation. 
 ‚Ä¢ Learn languages intuitively using our proven immersion method. 
 ‚Ä¢ Perfect your pronunciation with instantaneous feedback. 
 ‚Ä¢ Download lessons to do everything offline.  
 ‚Ä¢ Access different kinds of exercises with our Extended Learning features. 
 ‚Ä¢ Sync progress across all your devices. 
 ‚Ä¢ And never see an ad, ever. 

RECENT AWARDS
‚Ä¢ 2019 PCMag Editors‚Äô Choice
‚Ä¢ 2019 Tabby Awards Winner
‚Ä¢ 2019 Best Mobile App Awards: Best Designed App and Best Overall App

Choose from 24 languages to learn:
Arabic, Chinese (Mandarin), Dutch, English (American or British), Filipino (Tagalog), French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Persian (Farsi), Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Spanish (Latin American or Spain), Swedish, Turkish, or Vietnamese. 

Select a language learning subscription: 
Choose from 3 and 12-month subscriptions‚Äîas well as a Lifetime option. 

Enterprise and Education Learners
Unlimited use of Rosetta Stone's mobile app is available for existing Enterprise and Education Learners.
Features may vary for Enterprise and Education Learners.

For questions or assistance, please visit http://support.rosettastone.com

comments: Couldn't speak more highly of this program. The content & material it provides is undeniably the best on the market, while being fun & engaging. I've never had any technical difficulties. I bought the full personal package a couple years ago & recently recieved a free upgrade to access all languages! It was already more than worth the purchase so I am very grateful. If you actually want to start learning a language or brush up on your skills you won't regret the purchase!

When I tried to do spanish it kept telling me I was doing it wrong. I personally took spanish classes and was looking for more help. I don't think this app is really good with its audio. When I try to speak into the audio its always says "Please move to a quiet place and speak slower". I usually speak fast so uhhh don't know what to do then.

I also had the message "SOMETHING HAS GONE WRONG" but after trying many things all I did was delete the app. Shut off my tablet. Waited 2 mins and turned it back on to reinstall and that solved the problem. Hopefully this helps others. The App version is actually very easy to use and learn. I'm satisfied.

Very happy to have all languages available and grateful that they updated my purchase with it without me having to do anything. App is fun and easy to use and it checks for the accent which is the main thing. Excited to learn French and later Tagalog, Italian, Hebrew, and all the other languages I've been wanting to learn!

I haven't used it much, but this is clearly not the typical language learning app I'm used to. I finished the first core lesson and didn't hear or see a single word in English, but I'm definitely more confident in what I've learned here than anywhere else. It's interesting, and in the best way. I can't wait to keep learning. :)

title: Keepsafe Photo Vault: Hide Private Photos & Videos

comments: Awesome, I've had zero issues because I can read pretty well and all of the features/drawbacks are pretty well explained and fairly obvious. Haven't lost any photos and the cloud service has brought me through multiple phones. Would definitely recommend. I've had the premium sube for a few years now. $25 a year isn't much to support something you like.

READ BEFORE YOU DON'T DOWNLOAD!!!!!!! Pictures I had saved, even from years ago on separate devices all got deleted. I know they synced because they had been saved for years most of them. There's nothing left now. Have spoken to Developers and Customer service. Told them the issue well over five times and have still been waiting hours for a response back. I suggest using a different app and boycotting this app before they lose all your pictures and play dumb afterwards.

It never fails me but at times it clutters the files. When I access the individual files they don't follow the preview arrangement and others seem unnecessarily repeated! The database could be corrupting the arrangement or something like that. Otherwise, it's the best of it's kind. No competition.

The app doesn't reveal any content in it as you open it and it hides all the saved pictures. Nothing is shown at all. Keeping on opening it and closing it back and forth for hours but didn't work. - EDIT - Just editted my review from 2 stars to 4 stars after the problem or the glitch resolved. I may not be too bitchy about it, just hoping not to lose my pics on this app.

Do NOT download; boycot this app and any other app from this developer. They subscribe you to premium trial without your knowledge, when the trial period runs out, they hold your photos hostage in an effort to try to make you pay for the app. I had to delete an album with 3 photo that the app rendered inactive so I could not export them. The app gave me a pop-up telling to upgrade to premium else I will lose 4 fotos. I am NOT kidding you. Andmore frustration the app put you through try to expor

recentChanges: Updates to the intros page, color changes, and various performance improvements.
comments: It's very easy to navigate, it gives you plenty of matches based on your preferences. Something they can improve is once you have written to someone and they don't like you, you can't see your messages to those people. Maybe you can still save those. Messages just so you know who you have reached out to. Also, sometimes you can swipe no by mistake and you can't really go back and unswipe. Other that that pretty satisfied with how the app works.

I have to say, I've tried Tinder, Bumble and Badoo (for Tinder I even paid for the gold subscription) and this was by far the best! Real profiles of amazing people, some of which with great detail, thanks partly to the supplied multiple choice question system. Better matches, fast and efficient filtering. Minimum wasted time. It's a great tool and I'm happy I paid for it! :) Although now with corona, it's kind of wasted money, but that's not the application's fault! üòÇ Thanks for the good times!

I love the fact, especially as a guy, that you can send an intro message with your likes to help you stand out and start a conversation. I think OKCupid has really come a long way in becoming one of the most user-friendly dating sites out there. The only thing keeping me from giving it five stars, is that bumble and tender probably have more attractive women using them, but I think Cupid is also making progress on that front as well!

I had the app before they had the "Doubletake" function and I feel that it was best the previous way since you were able to message directly. With the Doubletake, I feel like the app is useless like Tinder. I have so many people who swiped on me (and vice versa) but somehow they don't come out in Doubletake. If swiping just to pass time is ok with you then you'll have no issue with it. That's all it's good for.

The app itself is great, I have enjoyed using it for years now. The customer service on the other hand is absolute trash. My account was stolen and they refused to respond to any of my many messages. If you have an issue you will be ignored, the best they were able to do for me was banning my account. And this was after months. As a paying customer I found this treatment excessively unfair. There are plenty of competing services with far better customer service.

title: Udemy - Online Courses
description:
Udemy is an online learning platform featuring 130,000+ video courses taught by expert instructors. Take courses in anything from programming languages like Python, and Java to personal development classes like design, drawing, writing and yoga. Join the more than 40 million students who are mastering new skills, advancing their careers, and exploring new hobbies on Udemy.

LEARN ANYTHING: Discover courses in over 2,000 topics - from coding and data science to marketing, Photoshop, yoga, and more. New courses, on cutting-edge topics like machine learning, artificial intelligence, and blockchain, are continuously refreshed. 

LEARN AFFORDABLY: Udemy has both free and paid courses within your budget. Once you‚Äôve enrolled in a course, you‚Äôll have lifetime access to the content. 

LEARN FROM EXPERTS: Be inspired by 50,000+ expert instructors teaching in 60+ different languages.

LEARN ANYWHERE: Download courses to learn offline. On the go? Listen to courses in audio-only mode. 

LEARN AT YOUR OWN PACE: Ask both students and instructors questions. Personalize your learning experience with speed controls and closed captioning. 

Free and paid courses available in:
- Development: web development, programming languages (Python, Java, JavaScript, Ruby, Swift, C# & more), game development, coding basics, coding bootcamps, etc.

- Business: Finance, financial analysis, entrepreneurship, public speaking, presentation skills, writing, etc. Plus, data & analytics (SQL, machine learning, deep learning, data science & more). 

- IT & Software: IT certification, network & security, cyber security, CCNA, etc.

- Office Productivity: Microsoft, Apple, Google, SAP, Oracle, etc.

- Personal Development: productivity, leadership, personal finance, career development, study skills, etc.

- Design: drawing, web design, graphic design, design tools (Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator & more), UX design, UI design, design thinking, etc.

- Marketing: Search Engine Marketing (SEM), Search Engine Optimization(SEO), social media marketing, marketing fundamentals, mobile marketing, content marketing, product marketing, etc.

- Lifestyle: arts & crafts, travel, gaming, dog training, etc.

- Photography: digital photography, photography tools, commercial photography, video design, etc.

- Health & Fitness: yoga, nutrition, meditation, self-defense, etc.

- Teacher Training: online course creation, presentation skills, instructional design, etc.

- Music: instruments (guitar, piano & more), music fundamentals, music techniques, music software, etc.

- Languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese, etc.

comments: The lessons are good but the servers of this app are non-existent. The video keeps on buffering after every 4 or 5 seconds even though others apps work smoothly with the same network connection. The same is true for the Udemy website. It becomes frustrating after a certain time and the excitement to learn vanishes. I kept waiting for an hour to watch a 16 minute lesson and wasn't able to complete it. It was either a problem with the lesson or the Udemy server. It keeps on buffering.

Works great but facing problems while playing videos and opening pdf lessons of my course at times. The videos get stuck displaying a message telling me to play the videos from my computer instead. It isn't a connectivity issue. The pdfs simply refuse to open while the ones on my phone open as usual. Moreover, this app works well only on high speed connection. When connected to the WiFi the video playback speed drastically reduces. I hope the problems get resolved soon. Thank you Udemy

Hello Udemy team, I have an issue regarding the screen resolution. I cannot watch the videos in full screen body ratio. The width of the videos are fixed to certain level. And we cannot even zoom. As you can see when I play a video in YouTube. I can get Full screen display ratio. It would be better user experience. If you update it to the full screen size ratio. and also great helpful for mobile user's. Please look into it and let me know. Thank you. Kind regards.

Please can someone explain why my course downloading is not effective. Each time I try to download a new course, the downloading starts from a previous course that I've already completed before. Is there any way I can correct this? However I've been enjoying the use of this App, this download issue is my only challenge. Please assist.

I like the app but there are a few glitches I am facing recently. They are, 1) Even after downloading the whole course I am unable to view it when my internet is turned off or my phone is in poor network zone. 2) Recently I have bought a new course but I am unable to make the course offline, the download button does not work. Hoping to hear on a resolution soon for you. Thanks & Regards, Kevin Rodrigues

title: Microsoft Word: Write, Edit & Share Docs on the Go
description:
Read and edit documents attached to emails, collaborate with your team and bring the Microsoft Office features wherever you go with Microsoft Word. The Word app from Microsoft lets you create, read, edit, and share your files quickly and easily.

Word introduces a mobile PDF reader for your phone. Edit documents and read PDFs or e-books while traveling, before bedtime, or wherever you want.

Create documents, blogs, write-ups, or resumes on the go. Write letters, resumes, documents, or notes your way with robust tools that enable you to write with the best format options.

The writing app and word processor is as handy as you want it to be, whether you‚Äôre a blogger, writer, journalist, columnist, student, or a project manager working on documentation. Your office moves with you when you use Microsoft Word.

Write a letter, create templates, read Word documents, edit docs and collaborate with your team wherever you are with Microsoft Word.

Microsoft Word Features:

Create Documents With Confidence
‚Ä¢ Create docs, assignments, letters, blogs, scripts, notes, resumes and more with beautifully designed modern templates.
‚Ä¢ Editing with rich formatting and layout.
‚Ä¢ Document editor keeps formats and layouts pristine and looking great.
‚Ä¢ Docs app with templates for resumes, forms and more.

Read, Write, and Edit
‚Ä¢ Read docs, letters, PDFs, scripts, and more on your device with Reading View.
‚Ä¢ Edit documents from PDFs by converting to and from Word documents.
‚Ä¢ PDF file conversion: save as PDF after editing and share your PDF file with a few taps.

Collaborate and Share With Anyone, Anywhere
‚Ä¢ Project managers can collaborate by commenting in your doc right next to the text.
‚Ä¢ Read & edit documents as a team and stay on top of changes to the text, layout, and formatting.
‚Ä¢ Editor version history lets you revert to view earlier drafts.

Sharing is simplified
‚Ä¢ Share files and collaborate with a few taps.
‚Ä¢ File & doc permission management that lets you see who is working on them.
‚Ä¢ Copy Microsoft Word files directly into the body of an email message with its format intact or attach your PDFs and docs to an email.

Microsoft Office 365
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Office 365 users can access premium features:
‚Ä¢ Editing tracks and reviews changes.
‚Ä¢ Format with page orientation, columns, custom headers and footers.
‚Ä¢ Edit charts and modify chart elements.

Download Microsoft Word now and edit documents anywhere.


REQUIREMENTS

OS version: running any of the supported versions of Android and have an ARM-based or Intel x86 processor. Support for Kitkat & Lollipop devices will continue till June 2019
ÔøΩ 1 GB RAM or above

To create or edit documents, sign in with a free Microsoft account on devices with a screen size smaller than 10.1 inches.
Unlock the full Microsoft Office experience with a qualifying Office 365 subscription (see http://aka.ms/Office365subscriptions) for your phone, tablet, PC, and Mac.

Office 365 subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Play Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your Play Store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled during the active subscription period.
This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Office on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/eula

comments: I hate to complain, because it might just be the best Word Processing app out there. But, there are innumerable problems with the interface - especially manipulating/dragging the cursor for editing. Also there are periodic discrepancies in template formatting, indentions, margins and paragraph spacing. All in all though, it gets the job done. And, as I said, it probably is the best mobile word processor out there. I'm sure that with time and updating the devs will get all of that fixed.

Wonderful!!! It's more than wonderful this software has been a dream of mine for over twenty years I was first using Microsoft 98 word and word weaver. I think that was the name of the product that I had used. in my office supply and tool store. It was a really a good product back then. It really promoted my thoughts and ideas into a reality. Thank You. Office 365 is where it's at " a good product "

This app seems to do most of what a desktop version of Word does. The trick is to figuring out what all of the little icons mean to do what you need to do. For example, you can convert a table to text, but it took me a while to figure out that there was a conversion *arrow* that looks similar to a "back" arrow (or *undo* arrow) that was actually the convert icon. I don't know if that example made sense, but the point is that you can do a lot with this if you're willing to figure it out.

The interface is very janky and has numerous problems of which I cannot name from the top of my head right now. Despite this it "gets the job done" but despite this for simple editing such as moving images/shapes and paragraph spacing and intergers tend to be very janky. But I haven't had it for long but these are my first impressions on mobile.

Not full-fledged like the Windows version, but good for the Android platform, well tailored to touch-screen interaction and a works well with mouse and keyboard on a tablet. You'll miss some features and sometimes find that annoying, but overall, it's probably the best word processing app you can get for your phone or tablet.

title: Ultimate Guitar: Chords & Tabs
description:
Get the world's largest catalog of guitar, bass & ukulele chords, tabs, and lyrics to learn your favorite songs!

Search for any song by type, difficulty, tuning, and rating.

Focus on guitar techniques or discover songs for particular moments with collections from professional guitarists.

Play 15,000+ popular songs in their original sound with Tonebridge Guitar Effects.


Features:
‚Ä¢ Explore guitar, bass & ukulele chords, tabs, and lyrics for more than 800,000 songs
‚Ä¢ Get offline access to favorite tabs
‚Ä¢ Switch to left-handed mode
‚Ä¢ Put together tab collections and compile your favorite tabs in playlists
‚Ä¢ Edit chords, lyrics or change tabs in other ways to fit your requirements with Personal tabs
‚Ä¢ Watch videos to refresh songs in your memory or use it as a backing track
‚Ä¢ Set the most suitable font style and size for the tab
‚Ä¢ Enjoy dark mode for a gig


With Pro account:
‚Ä¢ Play songs note by note, at a pace that suits you best using interactive tabs (Tab Pro)
‚Ä¢ Jam with over 7,000 HQ tabs that include backing tracks and synchronized lyrics
‚Ä¢ Hit the right tempo with metronome
‚Ä¢ Use the built-in guitar tuner to achieve the right sound 
‚Ä¢ Transpose songs to the tone that suits you
‚Ä¢ Choose the most comfortable chord variation from the world's biggest library of chords 
‚Ä¢ Make a difficult song easier with the simplify function
‚Ä¢ Use autoscroll to avoid distractions during your practice 
‚Ä¢ Share, print, and export the most important songs


Problems or feedback?
We strive for excellence, and we're always eager to improve your Tabs experience! Please do not post bug reports or feature requests as a review. Let us help you in person - contact development team at support.android@ultimate-guitar.com, and we'll do our best to meet your requests.


Stay in touch:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/UltimateGuitar
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ultimateguitar
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ultimateguitar


You can read our privacy policy at www.ultimate-guitar.com/about/privacy.htm
You can read our terms of service at https://www.ultimate-guitar.com/about/tos.htm

Features:
‚Ä¢ Explore guitar, bass & ukulele chords, tabs, and lyrics for more than 800,000 songs
‚Ä¢ Get offline access to favorite tabs
‚Ä¢ Switch to left-handed mode
‚Ä¢ Put together tab collections and compile your favorite tabs in playlists
‚Ä¢ Edit chords, lyrics or change tabs in other ways to fit your requirements with Personal tabs
‚Ä¢ Watch videos to refresh songs in your memory or use it as a backing track
‚Ä¢ Set the most suitable font style and size for the tab
‚Ä¢ Enjoy dark mode for a gig


With Pro account:
‚Ä¢ Play songs note by note, at a pace that suits you best using interactive tabs (Tab Pro)

‚Ä¢ Share, print, and export the most important songs


Problems or feedback?
We strive for excellence, and we're always eager to improve your Tabs experience! Please do not post bug reports or feature requests as a review. Let us help you in person - contact development team at support.android@ultimate-guitar.com, and we'll do our best to meet your requests.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements. We are not joking.
comments: My experience with the app was really great until I went to update it. The app just completely stopped running for me. It would load a gray screen and then just send me back to the homepage. I tried re-installing the app, along with restarting my phone to see if that would help any. I really want to get back to learning songs from my phone, so can you please help? That would be great.

Just use the website. The app blocks you from using features like transposing unless you pay money, which instead you could do for free on the website. An ad appears for every sheet you open, and usually unskippable. You want to try opening another window on your phone? Well now you're back at the home page of the app and have to find your sheet music again. Overral horrible. Don't recommend.

The music I love, of all variety. The (actual correct) chords and so very much more. I've been using this app for years, however I more recently used the paid version. You have created the most outstanding app for music lovers and musicians alike. The paid version is way beyond excellent. Thanks. Jeffery T. Lowcountry S.C.

So far so good. I will give this a try as I have been a lurker for the last 3 years and decided to subscribe. I will update after a few weeks under my belt. Update, after about a year, this app is great resource to any level musician. I do not have any issues with the app so far and is reliable. Definatly worth it!

Where's the Transpose/Pitch option? It's also buggy as hell, if you switch to another instrument it jumps to a different part of the song and it often for no reason just stops and jumps to the opening screen and always when you press play it's a delay, if you turn on count in there's a delay between the count in and when it starts.. So why have a count in?

title: Ancestry - Family History
description:
Discover where you came from through photos, stories, historical documents, and so much more. With the Ancestry¬Æ app you can explore and collect your family stories anytime, anywhere.

  ‚Ä¢ NEW - Now search for ancestors across 20+ billion historical records, photos, gravestone images, stories and more
  ‚Ä¢ Discover your genetic ethnicity, and make connections with living relatives, by taking an Ancestry DNA¬Æ test
  ‚Ä¢ With Ancestry Hints¬Æ get sent new automated discoveries about your ancestors; their life stories, their actual family photos, where they came from, languages they spoke, how they made a living and more 
  ‚Ä¢ Preserve you and your family‚Äôs information (photos, stories, life events, and more) in a single location so it can be preserved for generations to come 
  ‚Ä¢ Share your discoveries and collaborate with friends and family
  

Android Phone and Tablet Features:

  ‚Ä¢ Ancestry Hints¬Æ automatically finds records, photos, and stories about your family

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Fantastic. Very easy to use. Easy to upload data. Gives hints of other possible family members with lots of information. You find lots of other people researching the same family line & you can even find living family, you never knew you had or maybe even lost touch with. Some of the photos that have been uploaded by other members can open up a whole new world of passed loved ones you never knew just come to life. More information of where your roots started can be an eye opener. Very enjoyable

The best I've found so far, but it is a pale imitation of the web site. Cannot search UK only, which is more and more annoying the more I try to use the app. Even setting place to 'country only' still gives me mostly US results, when I absolutely know the person never set foot outside England. When you follow a hint, and save it, it only attaches to the person and perhaps spouse. A census does not add to other family members. You cannot download images like you can from the Web site.

A great and convenience resource! I can load my information and have it at my fingertips when away from home. I get lots of follow-up information from others who have taken DNA tests and are linked to me. I've met many relatives previously unknown to me.

Would rate zero stars. The DNA kits are are ripoff. You pay 70$for the kit, then what they don't tell you is to even view the results you have to pay the 25$ a MONTH membership fee. Then on top of that to even view part of your results you have to pay an extra 20$. So depending on whether you buy the kit on sale or not you are going to spend 100+ dollars per person . Would not recommend.
Great app for family tree. Easy to use. I only use the free version. Hope it stays free. Only complain is the constant reminder for registration on the screen. It blocks the view üò™

title: GameChanger Baseball & Softball Scorekeeper
description:
GameChanger provides simple - yet powerful - free scorekeeping tools, advanced statistics, live updates and team management solutions for baseball and softball teams. Score the game, calculate stats, generate a scorebook, and stream live play-by-play to parents and fans.
 
The GameChanger app is the premiere team management app for baseball and softball teams of all ages and skill levels. Our in-app messaging, game & practice scheduling, attendance tracker and team announcements make it easy for every coach to organize and manage their teams.  
 
Make informed decisions and keep your baseball and softball community connected with GameChanger!  
 
Key features: 
 
- SIMPLE SCOREKEEPING: Anyone at the game can capture the play-by-play of the game with our easy-to-use free scorekeeping app. 
 
- IN-GAME STATS: See stats and player charts when you need them the most. Back-up your decisions with real-time team and player statistics.
 
- SEASON STATS: Your season stats - including team & player charts - are updated automatically after every game.
 
- PITCH COUNT ALERTS: As ‚ÄúThe First Pitch Smart Certified App‚Äù, we make it easy to monitor and protect your pitchers‚Äô health, including custom pitch count alerts. 
 
- GAMECHANGER SYNC: Quickly sync your game data with MaxPreps.
 
- TEAM MESSAGING: Make sure everyone on your team is up-to-date with in-app messaging and email or push alerts.
 
- SCHEDULING: Everyone will know the up-to-date team schedule and who's attending.
 
- LIVE PLAY-BY-PLAY: Give family & fans the ability to receive live play-by-play with a real-time field view and box score.
 
- POST GAME RECAPS: We generate a newspaper quality game recap after each game, instantly, for coaches, players, family, fans, and local media. 
 
Download the GameChanger Baseball & Softball score keeper app today for free.

 
PARTNERS  
 
Our Partners: Little League International, Cal Ripken Baseball, Maxpreps.com, Perfect Game USA, Babe Ruth Baseball and Softball, ASA/USA Softball, The National Pro Fastpitch league, and PitchSmart. 
  
HOW CAN GAMECHANGER HELP YOUR TEAM?
 
SCOREKEEPERS: Anyone can be the score keeper for their team with just a few taps. Our free scorekeeping app for baseball and softball easier than your traditional scorebook and is comprehensive enough to track 160+ stats, generate spray charts, monitor pitch counts, and provide key game insights.
 
COACHES: Get the tools you need to make better decisions with real-time stats, spray charts, player charts and season statistics. Our messaging and scheduling features help every coach organize their teams and keep their baseball and softball communities connected and informed.  
 
FAMILY, PLAYERS & FANS: Can't make the game? We stream every pitch live on GameChanger‚Äôs GameStream so you never miss a moment. You can also sign up to receive the team schedule, message the coach, family and get live game and player alerts! 
 
GameChanger was founded on the firm belief in the power of youth sports to be a pathway to building lasting life skills. 
 
Photography by **K.M. Klemencic** (https://www.flickr.com/photos/klemencic/) and by **chrismetcalfTV** (https://www.flickr.com/photos/laffy4k/) is licensed under **CC BY 2.0** (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/).
 
GameChanger Terms of Use: https://gc.com/terms
GameChanger Privacy Policy: https://gc.com/about/privacy
California Disclosures: https://dickssportinggoods.com/s/california-disclosures
US Patent No. 8,731,458

recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Fixed: Minor bug fixes and improvements.
comments: The app really is fantastic & intuitive. It's the price that rubs me the wrong way. What? We don't currently spend enough money on my daughter's softball? I should pay more you say? If I want the 'full experience', apparently, yes. I think $20 & $30 would be much more reasonable (annual price of course). What, is Dick's really hurtin' for money?

My household has been using GameChanger for the better part of 8yrs. It's been a life saver for my wife and I, friends, and other family members when we couldn't be at the field watching our daughter play. I personally don't have any issues with GC, except one. The developers should add a start time button that logs the start time of games and a functioning clock that keeps up with the game time. If you have a kid playing baseball or softball you know how important this is.

This is by far the most detailed way to Score Keep your games. It's a little bit tricky bc it literally does everything and has a selection for every scenario but if your very serious about tracking your team's games and stats I don't know of a better way to do it. Highly recommend to anyone serious about Scorekeeping.

It kind of slow behind on play when it live. A I dont like it cause im under someone account however I subscribe to live, and if they are'nt around my live is dead. It won't work. Other than those two issue I like it. When you now able to be there, this is your eyes and ears.

Pretty easy to use. Only wish the count would stay highlighted (brighter) on Android OS when entering balls and strikes. Hard to see in sunny condltions. Otherwise love the stats and newspaper-like article that generates after done scoring a game (with paid membership).

comments: I'm not even going to rate it because of how bad this is. I'm saying they want to scam you a crazy amount of money just to see what you will look like when you grow up.And their ads are worthless due to how bad it is.The game is trying to track down your location to rob your house which is what this app will leading to.So I would recommend not to download this application and play somethings else and wait until you grow up to see what you will look like.

Seriously, $30 a month for a few photo features? No, I don't want to spend that every month to see what animal I resemble or what I might look like as I age. On top of that, 75% of the time it either says there's an error or it can't find the face that is very clearly there- facing forward, totally in the boundaries and clear as can be.

Waste of time. All it does is asks u to subscribe and see the result but theres a way to see the result by watching an ad, did that and it only put blurs on our faces. Plus the baby prediction was so wrong. We already have a baby that look nothing like what they predicted. Also how did they get my bank info!?

I couldn't find anywhere except in user reviews about having to pay for a fee and needing a "free trial" that actually states it'll charge close to 30 pounds per month. Maybe something to mention up front if you can't do a thing without giving up your credit card or bank details. Like I'd pay ¬£341,88 for a year of seeing how I fake age and what animal I look like. If I'd be dumb enough to pay that? An ass.

If only there were half ‚òÜs...I watched the video of this app and thought "Wow, this seems like the real deal, it actually shows how you age (& not in a fake or phony way!)".. I was impressed. I thought it would be fun, so I started my 3 day trial ($30/mo after!); I tried the aging one, and it depicted me the same but with messed up eyes and some wrinkles (Snapchat does better!). All other options I tried were worthless, too. PLEASE dont waste ur $!!! WORST APP EVER!!!!! FALSE ADVERTISING!!!

title: Coffee Meets Bagel Free Dating App

recentChanges: It‚Äôs now easier than ever to meet people who inspire you on CMB! We‚Äôve embraced a clutter-free design that highlights what matters most: you and your connections. And to spark meaningful conversation from the start, we‚Äôve added a new feature. Now, you can send a message with your Like even before connecting. In beta testing, members who used this feature had a 25% higher chance of getting Liked back!
comments: Unfortunately the app isn't as good as it used to be. At one point, we had videos of people that answered questions. Now that was different and very awesome. It eliminated the fakes and someone who was serious. However, now, it's hard. Seeing Covid-19 is real, i recommend bringing it back as states are shutting down.

App has become very slow over the last few months. Sometimes buttons or pages take a few seconds to register and load. If you have the app opened in the background and send a response at a later time the app rejects it and hangs. You have to close the app, open it again, and send the message again. How is this app even allowed to ship without proper scaling built in? It looks like the team needs to focus on their spaghetti code clean up rather than new features for a while.

It wasn't like the app I heard it was or imagined it to be! The reason I installed the app was just that other dating apps like tinder are overcrowded. I heard this app delivers quality matches but using it for past three days I won't agree with the statement. This app has very limited features to use for free and seeing the way the app operates in the area I am using it, won't make any difference to get the high pricy paid version. I hope it gets better with time but won't recommend downloading

Probably the best design of any dating app I've tried. However, the developers botched the monetization so badly it ruins the experience. They also suggest users who haven't logged in in two weeks, which is far longer than other dating apps. Get ready to swipe on a whole lot of stale bagels that haven't actually opened this app in ages.

Been having some issues with the app recently. Issues like matches through "Suggestions" or "Discover" are not appearing in the Chat tab. Support through the app is also weird and doesn't give much confidence as they have a "attach image/screenshot" which doesn't work. I found this out while trying to attach screenshots regarding the Matches not appearing in Chat issue. Please fix the App . Thanks! Update #1, 17Mar2020 : both support and customer experience have ignored me for 24hours or more.

title: Anymoji | Animated AR Emoji
description:
Anymoji is the animoji maker for Android. It has tons of 3D animal emoji and celebrity avatar emoji that can follow your facial expression. You can use Anymoji to create cool post or story for social media like TikTok, Instagram, Snapchat and YouTube. Let it get you more likes for your posts and stories, and get more fans & followers on Instagram, Tik Tok, Snapchat, YouTube, etc.

Key Features:
‚Ä¢ Cute Animal Emoji (Animoji)
‚Ä¢ Celebrity Avatar Emojis
‚Ä¢ Multiple Faces at a Time
‚Ä¢ Magical Backgrounds

* Animal Emoji (Animoji)
Great variety of cute 3D animal emoji including monkey, pig, lion and so on. It rings emoji to life in a fun new way by combining your own expressions with your favorite emoji. It uses the TrueDepth camera to capture and analyze over 50 different facial muscle movements, including smiles, frowns, and more to make those animoji follow your expression.

*  Celebrity Avatar Emoji
Besides animal emoji (animoji), Anymoji also got 3D avatar emoji of celebrities. You can use those celebrity emojis to do the lip sync of famous songs or famous scenes. That‚Äôll be trending or viral on social media.

*  Multiple Faces at a Time
Anymoji can capture and analyze more than one face at a time. You can use it with your friends together to create wonderful videos. 

*  Magical Backgrounds
You can choose to change the background when you record the video to match your style and preference or just add some edge to your video.

comments: When I downloaded I was turned off by the very large amount they charge ($59.99 for a year) you do get a free 3 day trial but if you don't remember to decide whether or not it benefits you or you like it then you just lost $59.99 for food and other bills~! On the plus side it is entertaining and I could see it be a great platform for musicians, dj and comedians! I would love to get to try the Dolphin Anymoji :-)

So, I like the app, but i can't say i love it, when you get to do the face stuff, It has bad quality, so it is hard to make it look sad, so this app isn't bad, but i wish it had better quality, next, you can only use a few faces, and that is sad, you can't even play Jojo Siwa!üò≠üòßüò† Stop making it to where you can use only 3 faces.

I really like this app but, it is also laggy on my phone and I can barely see the settings, and when I stick my tongue out it doesn't, I am not trying to be mean but, can you fix that? Thank you! And I don't know if it is only laggy on my phone. Thank you!

You can only do a free trial for three days!!üò≠ And then you have to pay $60 a year!üò°üò≠ The bad thing is that I REALLY wanted this app, but nope! Way too much for an app... If the creators see this comment please make the app either cheaper, or ACTUALLY free..

I love it, now I dont have to but an iPhone. Definitely not as great quality as an iphone. But I'm so impressed how this is the almost the same thing as iPhones. I love how you dont have to pay to use the thing, I like how theres free ones! Definitely considered for you guys to get this app awesome and I'm still amazed. ‚ù§ü•≥

title: Burner - Second Phone Number - Calling & Texting
description:
A second line for calling, texting and picture messaging. Get started with a free 7-day trial subscription.

Burner is the market-leading private phone number app ‚Äî a second line for calling, texting, and picture messaging in everyday situations. Did you know that your personal info is attached to your phone number and easily searchable online? Every time you give out your real phone number, you risk exposing your personal information. Only give your number to people you trust. For everyone else, there's Burner.

HOW BURNER WORKS
With Burner, you're in control of your personal information. No one can find your real number from your Burner number. We intercept calls on your Burner and route them to your cell phone so no one can see your real number. Since you can call, text, and manage your contacts from within the app, you don't have to carry a second device.

Use Burner for everyday situations. Create a disposable phone number for dating, salespeople, deliveries, shopping online or selling items on Craigslist. You can use it as a longterm second phone number for your business or side projects. Integrations allow you to archive messages and voicemails, and communicate with your team. Create multiple numbers, keep them as long as you want, or burn them anytime. Share your Burner with anyone and everyone, or keep your new number secret for anonymous texting. No hassles, no contracts.

Burner is free to download and comes with a 7-day free sample number. Additional numbers are available through in-app purchase or subscription. Only give your number to people you trust. For everyone else, there's Burner.

PLANS AND PRICING
- There are two types of Burners: Prepaid and Subscription. Payment will be charged to Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase.
- You can upgrade, downgrade or cancel from the Manage screen inside the app or from the Google Play store.

Privacy Policy: https://burnerapp.com/privacy

Terms of Use: https://burnerapp.com/terms-of-service

IMPORTANT: Phone calls use cell phone minutes. Burners are free for a trial period only ‚Äî please review our pricing before purchasing. Area code availability varies. May not work with SMS shortcode services. Not for 911 emergency services. Works in US and Canada only. Not available in Puerto Rico.

comments: Won't let you try it without your payment information and an automatic $5/month subscription after 7days. Don't download unless you're willing to submit your payment information. Now they have my real number which they'll probably sell to scammers and telemarketers. Wish they would have disclose those details before making me give up my number. Not cool.

All burner numbers I used to have worked for SMS and other verification services that allowed to stay anonymous for personal reasons be it safety or otherwise. Now not a single number can be used for the original intent, use, and functionality. Will be looking for a better service that allows for the full use of numbers as originally able to do. At the current usefulness of the app it's nothing more than an expensive quickly thrown out number that has zero usefulness unless you simply plan on ghosting people for dates or something else that's pretty lame.

I love this app. After free trial it is still very affordable. It works perfect to keep up with people that your required to speak to a person via court order, but do not need them getting your regular phone number. It is able to change, therefore allowing you to not have unwanted spam calls and prank calls very often!

was a good app. Paid auto renew for 3 lines on Googlle play store. Google says it renews Mar 3rd. Today is Feb 10. The app says subscription lapsed, expired. Guess they took my money and ran. Cant get a hold of their support either. Use to be a 5 star app. Now just a theif. Update: was not resolved. Uninstalled.

Great app but taking one star because I wish you had a option like google voice to archive your messages for people you aren't actively having a conversation with. I love that feature. Update 3/22/20 would still love a archive feature on this app like you can with email or Google voice. Please please please add this feature.

title: Calorie Counter by Lose It! for Diet & Weight Loss
description:
Lose It! is a calorie counter & food diary diet app that helps you stick to your diet and reach your goal weight. Simply download the app, set your goals and track your diet, food and exercises to lose weight. Easily track macro, carb and calorie intake with Lose It! calorie counter & food diary app!

Since our launch in 2008 we have been featured in The Wall Street Journal, The Today Show, Men‚Äôs Health, Women‚Äôs Health, CNET, Buzzfeed, CNN, Shape, Good Morning America, and more.

‚Ä¢ 80+ million pounds of weight lost by our members (and counting)
‚Ä¢ 27+ million searchable food items in our comprehensive international food library database 
‚Ä¢ 40+ million users who have started their weight loss journey with Lose It!
‚Ä¢ 25+ macro nutrient, carb, calorie and health goals to choose from
‚Ä¢ 3 days of calorie and diet tracking is all it takes before a user starts to see a result in weight loss

Stay on track of your diet and calorie intake with Lose It! Calorie Counter. Whether it be a keto diet, vegan diet or anything in between, Lose It! will help you track your macro, carb and calorie intake to reach your weight loss and health goals. Stop making excuses ‚Äì start losing weight with Lose It!

HOW THE LOSE IT! CALORIE COUNTER & FOOD DIARY APP HELPS YOUR WEIGHT LOSS JOURNEY

Lose It! isn‚Äôt your average calorie counter and food & diary app. Lose It! uses the proven principles of calorie counting and tracking to help you succeed. To get started, input your profile details and we‚Äôll calculate the daily calorie budget best for you. Next, easily track your food, weight, and activity and get ready to celebrate your weight loss victories. Gain insight on your macro, carb, protein, sugar, fat and overall calorie and food intake on a daily level. Stay on top of your keto, vegan, vegetarian or whole 30 diet! There‚Äôs no easier way to change your calorie and diet habits and learn about your nutrition needs. 

LOSE IT! CALORIE COUNTER FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Barcode Scanner ‚Äì quickly scan food barcodes or search our database to track your carb, macro and calorie intake.
‚Ä¢ Snap It ‚Äì Want to know your carb count after that burger? log food by simply taking a photo of your food. Just tap the camera icon for food tracking and calorie counting in a snap. 
‚Ä¢ Track Nutrients ‚Äì track more than just calories including macro, protein, water, carb, sugar, body measurements, sleep cycles, and more. Stay on top of your keto, vegan or vegetarian diet needs! Learn what nutrients you need along your weight loss journey.
‚Ä¢ Fitness App Syncs ‚Äì connect trackers, apps, and devices like Fitbit trackers, Misfit trackers, Garmin trackers, Withings scales, Google Fit, Healthkit, and more.
‚Ä¢ Challenges ‚Äì step up your game with fun weight loss, fruit/veggie, health and exercise challenges by yourself or with your friends.
‚Ä¢ Meal Planning & Targets ‚Äì meal targets help you calculate suggested macro, carb, protein and overall calorie intake. Customize your diet and eating for personalized weight loss!
‚Ä¢ Patterns ‚Äì learn about your food and calorie intake habits with our exclusive personal insights to identify what is hindering or helping your weight loss progress.
‚Ä¢ Recipes ‚Äì customize your diet and weight loss journey with breakfast, lunch, and dinner meals you create yourself. Find easy food recipes for your Keto diet, vegan diet, vegetarian diet, Whole 30 - or any diet!
‚Ä¢ Workout Guides - library of workouts to help guide you to weight loss success. Weight loss is more than just a diet and food tracking! Get moving and work your way to a healthy weight & healthy living.

Download Lose It! Calorie Counter today and join our community of members helping us reach our mission to mobilize the world to healthy weight loss. No matter your diet needs or weight loss goals, Lose it! Calorie Counter can help you find healthy success!

LOSE IT! SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
Lose It! basic is free, but you can upgrade to Premium to unlock additional features. 

Full terms: 
http://loseit.com/terms

recentChanges: We did some reorganizing this week and moved friend requests and group invites to the Community section of your Profile.
comments: Please help! No matter what I do the app continues to change my starting weight. So while I lost weight this week it shows that I gained weight. I am not on premium because I really just need a simple food tracking app as I'm doing alternate day fasting. It's just a little discouraging to have the app showing me I gained weight when I lost weight. I changed it twice before I started as it kept somehow going back to a different starting weight. 30 pounds less than I am!

Easy, not crowded with ads, connects to Strava if you pay. It is only $40 a YEAR. I havent upgraded yet, but thinking I will. I like the barcode scan option. Havent used the food photo yet. Has all I need. No pestering coach, but it does send a notification like once a day if it has been a while since you recorded. I like a little reminder, but not one ever hour as some apps seem to do. So far, I like the app. Much better than the other free one I tried.

Very good app. I feel it is worth the price for premium. Previously I was using MyFitnessPal until the bugs just became too much. The one area that needs improvement is search. While it works most of the time there are enough times searching doesn't happen when inputting info. Latest example: cauliflower pizza returned chips, cookie, mashed potatoes, amazing greens, etc... This is version 12.1.700 (11037).

Lose It! has been a great help in my progress to keep track of my food intake. The site offers good advice for health as well. There are many features which would take long to describe, and there's been the occasional crash of the app, which doesn't surprise me. But overall, Im very pleased with Lose It! I have tried to reach out to Lose It staff to ask questions not on the website. I'm a bit disappointed for no response. That said, Lose It! seems to be the best at what I need.

This app used to be great, but not so much anymore. They've taken away standard features and only made them available in the premium upgrade. My Fitbit only syncs in premium now. I'm also really disappointed that you can no longer see all of your daily nutrition amounts, only fat, carbs and protein. You can no longer see sodium, sugars, fiber, etc. I've used this app for years, otherwise I'd look for another one.

title: Geocaching¬Æ
description:
Geocaching turns every location into an adventure. Join the world's largest treasure hunting game and discover the world around you in a whole new way. Millions of cleverly hidden containers called geocaches are waiting to be found. 

Get outside, get moving, and challenge yourself to find secret locations, solve challenging puzzles, connect with other geocachers, and explore parts of your world you never knew existed. There is probably a geocache near you right now - download the app and find out.

Start exploring:
‚óè	See details with description, recent activity, attributes, and hints for each geocache
‚óè	Navigate to the cache using map, compass, or driving directions
‚óè	Live Search continuously updates nearby geocaches as you move
‚óè	Find all easy Traditional geocaches and geocaching events
‚óè	Message other players for tips, hints, and more
‚óè	Learn about trackables: geocaching game pieces that travel from geocache to geocache
‚óè	Adjust your navigation and distance settings to your personal preference 
‚óè	Access to GeoTour caches of all cache types and D/T ratings

Search for the right geocache:
‚óè	Search for GC codes, locations, landmarks, and neighborhoods
‚óè	Search for GeoTours by GT code or see a directory of all GeoTours worldwide
‚óè	Sort by distance 

Move trackables:
‚óè	Search for trackables
‚óè	Log trackables - grab, retrieve, drop, dip, or discover
‚óè	View your trackable inventory

Share your experience:
‚óè	Log a geocache now or save as a draft for later
‚óè	Add photos to share your adventure
‚óè	Improve cache quality by reporting geocaches that need maintenance 

Choose map options:
‚óè	Street
‚óè	Satellite
‚óè	Hybrid


Unlock even more adventure with Geocaching Premium:
‚óè	Find any geocache in the world, including Premium-only caches
‚óè	Filter geocaches by size, type, difficulty, terrain, and found/owned
‚óè	Sort lists of geocaches by distance, Favorite points, or geocache name
‚óè	Geocache anywhere, anytime with offline maps
‚óè	Take the road less traveled with Trails map
‚óè	Plan, add, or edit your next adventure with Lists
‚óè	Award Favorite points to geocaches you enjoy most
‚óè	Auto-sync Lists and Pocket Queries created on the Geocaching website
‚óè	Gain access to all Premium features on the Geocaching website

We are committed to building the best tools for geocachers to create, share, and play this game. By joining and maintaining your Premium membership, you are helping to shape the future of Geocaching. In addition to your support of the game, Premium members also get access to more features, more geocaches, and more adventure.

You can buy a Premium membership subscription through your Google Play account.
