‚óè View your trackable inventory

Share your experience:
‚óè Log a geocache now or save as a draft for later
‚óè Add photos to share your adventure
‚óè Improve cache quality by reporting geocaches that need maintenance

Choose map options:
‚óè Street
‚óè Satellite
‚óè Hybrid


Unlock even more adventure with Geocaching Premium:
‚óè Find any geocache in the world, including Premium-only caches
‚óè Filter geocaches by size, type, difficulty, terrain, and found/owned
‚óè Sort lists of geocaches by distance, Favorite points, or geocache name
‚óè Geocache anywhere, anytime with offline maps
‚óè Take the road less traveled with Trails map
‚óè Plan, add, or edit your next adventure with Lists
‚óè Award Favorite points to geocaches you enjoy most
‚óè Auto-sync Lists and Pocket Queries created on the Geocaching website
‚óè Gain access to all Premium features on the Geocaching website

We are committed to building the best tools for geocachers to create, share, and play this game. By joining and maintaining your Premium membership, you are helping to shape the future of Geocaching. In addition to your support of the game, Premium members also get access to more features, more geocaches, and more adventure.

You can buy a Premium membership subscription through your Google Play account.
summary: This app has everything you need to begin your geocaching adventure.
developerAddress:
837 N 34th ST
STE 300
Seattle, WA 98103
recentChanges: Ongoing maintenance. The latest app update includes small visual changes and bug fixes for a more consistent experience.
comments: My kids and I love geocaching but I'm getting really frustrated at this app. It wont show any geocaches since the last week. We were in the middle of the woods when all the geocaches disappear off the map. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app, I restarted my phone, I even logged into another phone. I still have no geocaches on my map. I have paid for a year subscriptions. I am highly disappointed. Can someone help? If not, can I have my money back?

Never consistent ,offline mode is horrible, works when it wants to. GPS is always way off,when other gps apps have usuable accuracy at +-10ft ,the geocaching app is off by 30 ft or more. Why have an app that's supposed to find things be GPS, then you have to carry a second gps,or direct input the coordinates in another app on the same phone to find it. Every update now it seems to make the app worse.

Nice little app for geocaching. One downside is that souvenirs are not displaying on it but they do appear on the desktop version. Seems it's a known bug with Android and logging out and back on didn't help - I lost the one souvenir that was displaying. Be good if that could be fixed. On Samsung S7 Android v8.0 with latest geocache update.

I love geochaching but the app keeps ceasing over and over again! After closing the app I reopened it and it will not load anything, the map won't even move or let me zoom in! It completely ruined my geochaching adventures today and its frustrating beyond words!

I love Geocaching! Gets me out in the woods and helps me find hidden gems at times. The only complaint is that sometimes the GPS sends me a ways away from where the cache really is... and has me looking way longer than needed.

title: Password Manager - Keeper
description:
Keeper is the most secure password manager for Android! Rest easy with password security from Keeper‚Äôs password manager. Protect your passwords and personal information with Keeper¬Æ - the leading secure password manager and digital vault. Keeper offers unlimited password storage for everyone - generate, store, and AutoFill strong passwords on all your devices while securely storing private documents in your own encrypted vault.

** Rated "Best Password Manager" and Editor's Choice by PC Mag **
** Rated "Best Security" by Tom's Guide **

Why Keeper?

‚Ä¢ Keeper is the world's most trusted and downloaded password manager with thousands of 5-star reviews on Google Play and iTunes. Millions of people and thousands of businesses trust Keeper.
‚Ä¢ Store every password in one secure password manager. Never worry about losing your passwords again. Password Keeper lets you store as many passwords as you need in your own security vault.
‚Ä¢ Our password generator helps keeps hackers at bay by creating strong, unique passwords. Stop using the same passwords over and over. Improve your online security with Keeper password manager and keep your passwords secure and organized.
‚Ä¢ Not just for passwords - Password Keeper locks your confidential files, photos, and videos in a secure encrypted vault.
‚Ä¢ Never worry about having to remember a password again! Access your password manager with fingerprint login. Login online with our secure AutoFill, KeeperFill.
‚Ä¢ Emergency Access lets you control who can access your passwords when you can‚Äôt.

What Makes Our Password Manager The Best?

‚Ä¢ Keeper strives to keep our Password Manager as simple and intuitive as possible. Our 5-star reviews back that up every day.
‚Ä¢ Every user is provided a secure and private vault protected by our unmatched Zero-Knowledge security architecture with multiple levels of encryption. Only you know the password to your vault. With Password Keeper your information remains 100% encrypted 100% of the time. 
‚Ä¢ Save time, stay organized with our password autofill feature. With KeeperFill, your passwords are always available to be automatically filled

‚Ä¢ Monitor the security of your passwords by enabling BreachWatch. BreachWatch continuously scans the Dark Web for passwords that have been exposed and instantly notifies you so that you can stay secure.
‚Ä¢ Keeper's Security Audit feature helps you keep passwords up-to-date and makes sure your passwords are as secure as possible.
‚Ä¢ With our password generator, we make keeping password security a breeze. 

Most Secure Password Manager in the Industry

‚Ä¢ Built with zero-knowledge security architecture. Your password manager and files vault can only be seen by you.
‚Ä¢ Integrates with Two-Factor Authentication providers (SMS, Google Authenticator, Duo Security, RSA SecurID and Yubikey).
‚Ä¢ Only password manager to be certified SOC-2 and ISO27001
‚Ä¢ Utilizes AES-256-bit encryption and PBKDF2 technology

* If you need assistance, please email support@keepersecurity.com

comments: This has been a decent application - not without some issues though. I love the fact you can have your passwords in folders and subfolders. This makes it easier to share it with my spouse and also allows us to store less frequently used or no longer used passwords in a subfolder. About two years ago there was an upgrade that messed up how the folders worked. They would come up differently on different platforms (such as phone vs computer) but it still worked fine. This got fixed. Then recently I somehow got signed up for file storage and breach watch options, neither of which we use. When I tried to renew, I could not get these off the renewal option. I contacted tech support and they fixed both issues quickly. I was then able to renew without these options. That was fantastic! To get to 5 stars, I'd expect no issues at all until after the next renewal - no problems with folders, and no problems with renewal at the same rate.

This app requires you to pay $29.99/year simply in order to delete your files they let you create when you were using a so called "free trial" - I've used the app for 800+ days according to one I first created a file through the app, I've utilized the app consistently since then. Sounds pretty shady to me to hold on to my data and require money after allowing me to use it as a password locked notes folder basically. The app claims to help you more than it does I wouldn't recommend their service.

Great at helping me keep passwords straight. More important, great customer service. Couldn't remember my master password. Emailed customer service. Dann emailed me the next morning and gave me the steps to go through. Thanks Dann!

Worst purchase I've ever made. Decided to buy because it was half price and when I did it somehow reverted to all my old passwords, it did not keep the current passwords I had saved on my device, now I have to change every password for every account I have because this app decided to delete all my current ones.
This app has been a lifesaver for me! I keep all my passwords and important information in it. I have changed phones several times and have not lost anything important!

title: Adobe Acrobat Reader: PDF Viewer, Editor & Creator
description:
Adobe Acrobat Reader is the most reliable, free global standard document management system available. View, edit, sign, and annotate PDF documents by working directly on the text. Collaborate with your team even if you‚Äôre working from home or out of the office.

Adobe Acrobat Reader is the free global standard for reliably viewing, signing, and commenting on PDF documents. 

VIEW PDFs
‚Ä¢ Quickly open and view PDF documents.
‚Ä¢ Search, scroll, and zoom in and out.
‚Ä¢ Choose Single Page or Continuous scroll mode.

ANNOTATE PDFs 
‚Ä¢ Comment on PDFs directly using sticky notes and drawing tools.
‚Ä¢ Annotate documents easily with highlights and markup texts.
‚Ä¢ View and respond to activity in the comments list.
‚Ä¢ Give and receive feedback from your home office.

WORK WITH OTHERS AND SHARE PDFs
‚Ä¢ Access shared documents quickly. Simply view, review, sign and send.
‚Ä¢ Add your comments to shared PDFs for effective team collaboration. 
‚Ä¢ Receive activity notifications for files you‚Äôve shared.
‚Ä¢ Track pending actions for documents shared with you.
‚Ä¢ Sharing PDFs is made effortless. Create links you can send by email
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with your team when you work from home.

WORK WITH SCANNED DOCUMENTS
‚Ä¢ Access scanned PDFs that you‚Äôve captured using the free Adobe Scan app.
‚Ä¢ Upload and sign documents. Open your scans in Acrobat Reader to fill, sign, review, and share.

FILL AND SIGN FORMS
‚Ä¢ Easily fill out and sign PDF forms and other digital documents by typing text into fields.
‚Ä¢ PDF form filler feature lets you use your finger or stylus to add an e-signature to any digital document.

STORE AND PRINT FILES
‚Ä¢ Sign into your free Adobe Document Cloud account to store and access files across devices.
‚Ä¢ Star files to keep important digital documents at your fingertips.
‚Ä¢ Connect to your Dropbox account and access other storage providers including Google Drive.
‚Ä¢ Print digital documents directly from your device.

IN-APP PURCHASE 
Subscribe for even more PDF power. Subscriptions work across desktop, web, and mobile. 

ACROBAT PRO DC
‚Ä¢ Organize and edit PDFs.
‚Ä¢ Create PDFs using documents or pictures (like JPG).
‚Ä¢ Convert PDFs into Microsoft Word, Excel, or PowerPoint versions of your documents.
‚Ä¢ Merge multiple PDF files into one document.
‚Ä¢ Sign and send documents to others for review.

ADOBE PDF PACK
‚Ä¢  Convert JPG to PDF and create PDF documents from other picture files and docs.
‚Ä¢ PDF viewer also lets you export PDF documents to Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint or RTF.
‚Ä¢ Organize and combine files.
‚Ä¢ Send documents to others for review.

EXPORT PDF
‚Ä¢ Export PDFs to Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, or RTF.
‚Ä¢ Make scanned PDFs editable.

Adobe Acrobat Reader is a Microsoft Intune supported partner app and accommodates multiple identities.

Terms & Conditions: Your use of this application is governed by the Adobe General Terms of Use 
http://www.adobe.com/legal/terms.html and the Adobe Privacy Policy http://www.adobe.com/privacy/policy.html
Do Not Sell My Info: https://www.adobe.com/privacy/ca-rights.html

Adobe Acrobat Reader is a free PDF creator and document editor that allows you to easily convert JPG files to PDF format and create and sign fillable PDF forms. Add your e-signature to shared documents and send them to colleagues for fast, efficient and paperless team collaboration when working from home or out of the office.

comments: I used to really like this app. Not that much since the latest update that messed up one of the features I enjoy the most : the Reading mode. It no longer operates properly. To my despair... Since my last review, absolutely nothing has been done to improve the Reading mode feature, which is really poor on my android smartphone compared to similar apps. Is there any way to improve the Reading mode feature?

If digital documents are a part of your everyday, then you've heard of adobe. My line of work regularly involves sending and modifying PDF documents; Adobe Pro and DC are just outstanding as a 1 stop shop...add in adobe scan and its instant from my phone to desktop and ready for editing! Creating, editing, preparing, and even signing are all done from 1 convenient application!

I've been using Adobe for years. But since it's last update, it will not open pdfs like it used to. Better yet, the app just won't open! Garbage update. In case you're wondering, I'm using a Galaxy S8+, yes, blah blah blah everything is updated. Just saying

Auto-cloud forcing, Apple level frustrating! Stop forcing the F** cloud on us! It's not brilliant it should be an option! Files just cannot be saved locally apparently, only broadcast into the cloud. Re Reply: This is not just a reader, it's an editor & creator, these functions are cloud only. That is not optional. To say I don't have to use half the app is not optional. Allowing me to save privately to the device I'm using would be optional.

Kinda blows my mind that you need to pay for a subscription just to change the color of your text from black to white. Maybe I just couldn't figure it out with the free version, but that should be a basic feature. Not paying $10 just to use the app once, maybe twice, to get a different text color. Unless someone can tell me how to do it in the free version, I give 1 star. Money grabbing scam from what I can see

title: Canva: Graphic Design, Video, Invite & Logo Maker
description:
Canva makes design and video editing amazingly simple (and fun)! üôå Create stunning Christmas cards, Holiday wallpapers, and New Year greetings with your photos and videos‚Äîeven if you‚Äôre not a design expert!

A versatile free graphic design app: full editor, Instagram story maker, video maker, video collage creator, logo maker and poster maker, book creator & mood board creator ‚Äî Canva is the ultimate editing app.

Design your Instagram Highlight cover, Instagram Story or no crop posts, create a logo and banner for social networks: Facebook, Pinterest and Twitter. You can also make birthday invitations & wedding invites. 

Stay on brand with our logo creator or logo designer for your business cards, posters or Instagram posts. Available on your phone & computer to jump back into your design anytime, anywhere.

How to Use Canva
1. Start from scratch or a ready-to-use design
Create a design with our blank canvas, or save time and use any of our 60,000 FREE templates created by professional designers, including a logo & video. No need for a tutorial or to hand draw designs. Use our logo designer & logo maker, poster and video editor tools for your masterpiece. 

2. Use the perfect image
Upload pictures and videos from your device gallery, or pick from our library of premium photos & illustrations to make the perfect logo, poster and video.

3. Edit & add text to photos or videos
Easily add quotes or multiple text to any graphic. Change font (we've got 500+ options!), size, color, spacing, and position.

4. Edit pictures like a pro
Use our free image editor to apply photo filters, change brightness, add vignette, and more.

5. Show it off to the world
Share designs directly to Instagram, WhatsApp, email, or simply save to your device.

Use Canva for Social Media
‚Ä¢ Create a memorable instaquote with the Instagram Highlight cover, Instagram highlight icons maker, and Instagram story maker
‚Ä¢ Create Facebook Posts & Facebook Covers
‚Ä¢ Design Pinterest & Twitter banners & thumbnails + video editing app for Youtube
‚Ä¢ Make cards, evites, photo collages & use Canva as a picture maker, poster creator or logo creator for all social media 
‚Ä¢ Free Holiday Cards and Christmas Story Templates
‚Ä¢ Design festive New Year Quotes, Christmas Card Maker

Use Canva for Everything
‚Ä¢ Logo designer, book cover, blog design for any project
‚Ä¢ Evites for any event: birthday card maker, wedding invitation maker, evite creator
‚Ä¢ Simple, free image editing app
‚Ä¢ Photo collage maker, flyer maker, banner maker for any occasion
‚Ä¢ Design motivational quotes and humorous memes
‚Ä¢ Stunning Instagram Story templates
‚Ä¢ Free Instagram video and movie maker editor; edit video templates
‚Ä¢ Party invitation maker, school poster maker, video banner maker
‚Ä¢ For business: logo editor, brochure, resume, presentation, promo poster maker

Create Designs Quickly
Use Search to find templates faster. Type your theme: "birthday card," "baby photo collage, "sale flyer," ‚Äúsave the date card,‚Äù "music poster maker," "beauty social media post," more.

Collaborate on Canva
Create a free team to easily share & edit designs with friends or colleagues. Work together on presentations, business cards, brochures, & other design needs. Upgrade to Canva Pro to set your brand colors & upload brand fonts.

Canva Makes You Look Good
Use Canva as an invitation creator, poster creator, logo maker, online invitation maker, business card maker. Add a video to your next Instagram Story to make it come to life!

---
Follow @canva on Instagram for design tips. Got feedback? https://canva.me/android/

Permissions:
READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Add images from your photo gallery.
CAMERA/WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Take a photo in the app & store designs in your gallery.

comments: I love this app! I usually used to have many flyers or anything to create - sort of apps. But Canva provides multiple options to create such as templates, flyers, t-shirts, cards and many more options which are uncountable. Many other applications have these features but different options in different apps. But Canva provides multiple options in the same apps which is great! I have no complaints at all. Not even 1 drawback in this app. I highly recommend others to use this application.

It is a nice app, a lot of artistic designs and templates. But, the app crashes frequently. I worked on a project and I made 9 slides, then I went out of the app (to download my own pictures), then back again but suddenly my latest 5 slides were missing. This app is nice and I love it, but this happens too much (it happened numerous times before). Please fix this problem.

Do far so good. The one thing that's been bugging me that I haven't been able to figure out is; I'm not able to see certain colors when using the app on my Android phone. That's the reason for the 4 star rating. I'll change this rating as I'm able to figure out the solution to the problem. Thanks

After the update I lost ALL of my works, at least I had saved some on my phone. I'm pretty disappointed at this and that is why I giving the low rating, since it isn't such a reliable app. Other than the "reliable" issue and some bugs that I encounter from time to time, the app is great for creating professional artworks.

Canva is an amazing program and a fantastic tool, but DO NOT download this for Android. If you can, use your PC or buy an iPad, but for some reason the Android version of this app has almost no functionality, it will not maintain image formats between devices. Simple tools such as backgrounds and elements are simply nonexistent. I have never been so consistently frustrated by an app. These features clearly already exist. Edit: App is fully updated. Nothing helpful has been added.

title: Strava: Track Running, Cycling & Swimming
description:
Track your fitness with Strava activity tracker. Record routes, map your favorite bike trail or run & analyze your training with all the stats ‚Äì for free! 

Marathon training or simply love going for a bike ride? Turn your phone into a sophisticated cycle or running tracker with Strava. Try out a new trail with Strava distance tracker and mile counter or even track running speed. Join millions of active people and reach your goals!

Fitness Training with Strava Activity Tracker: 3 Ways to Train Smarter
1. Record routes, track running & analyze: Track distance, swim pace, cycle speed, elevation gained & calories burned
2. Map your route: Mix up your run, swim or ride with the world‚Äôs largest trail network
3. Training challenges: Push yourself with monthly Challenges & compete with others

DISTANCE TRACKER & MILE COUNTER
‚Ä¢ Track running, cycling and swimming: Compare your performance over time
‚Ä¢ Track distance, pace, speed, elevation gained and calories burned on every run
‚Ä¢ Mile counter: Use your Android device or pretty much every GPS device out there

CONNECT & SHARE
‚Ä¢ Record routes on your Strava feed so friends & followers can comment & share their own progress
‚Ä¢ Your cycle route is the best? Share the route map & photos of your latest bike ride
‚Ä¢ Join Clubs of brands, teams and friends for activities and growing communities

JOIN SUMMIT
‚Ä¢ Set your fitness goals and get customizable training plans. Use the distance tracker and set your own time or segment goals
‚Ä¢ Get live feedback to help you train safer & perform better

RUNNING TRACKER and TRAINING
‚Ä¢ Marathon training hit a plateau? Track distance and boost your performance with running tracker Strava and access tailored plans with Premium
‚Ä¢ Turn your device into a personal coach for triathlon or marathon training

It doesn‚Äôt stop at running and cycling, you can use Strava activity tracker for a whole range of sports:
‚Ä¢ Swim
‚Ä¢ Alpine Ski
‚Ä¢ Hike
‚Ä¢ Crossfit
‚Ä¢ Kayak
‚Ä¢ Rock Climb
‚Ä¢ Surf
‚Ä¢ Yoga
‚Ä¢ Indoor running
‚Ä¢ Indoor cycling
‚Ä¢ Gym workouts
...and many more!

NOTE ON GPS SUPPORT:
Strava depends on GPS for recording activities. In some devices, the GPS does not work properly and Strava will not record effectively. If your Strava recordings show poor location estimation behavior, please try to update the operating system to the most recent version. There are some devices which have consistently poor performance with no known remedies. On these devices, we restrict installation of Strava, for example the Samsung Galaxy Ace 3 and the Galaxy Express 2. 

See our support site for more information: https://strava.zendesk.com/entries/27141334-Does-Strava-4-x-run-on-my-Android-device

recentChanges: This week, we‚Äôre rolling out Workout Analysis for all activity types. Summit athletes will now get a detailed review of their workout performance whether they are cycling, swimming, or surfing.
comments: Overall, this is the best activity tracker that I have seen, especially for cycling. The only downside is the occasional crash when recording via cellphone. The interface is clear and intuitive and the social aspects bring a community of interested and interesting people together around activities that we all enjoy. Now go out, and do something awesome.

The app is great for the most part. There is still the occasional inconvenience whereby if I read the details of someone's workout then go back to viewing the workouts of the peeps I follow, the app will scroll to the most recent addition. So imagine having scrolled through 10-20 people, examined a workout then having to start again from the top. It's quite the pain.

The Strava app offers good tracking of activity and a nice way to connect with community around your training. However as a nordic skier, I can track my individual skis, but that is all. Because nordic is not one of the three core sports (bike, run, swim), the platform does not include any of these activities in my profile. It also does not track totals or allow me to set goals because nordic is not a core sport. Unfortunate given the other functionality.

Works pretty good. I enjoy a out of features, like automatically linking you with people you're running with. The GPS seems to work fine and there's a decent amount of analysis of you're into that. That said, there still seem to me a lot of bugs. When I you to share runs it'll often say I did but nothing will happen. Sometimes I'll upload a picture to a run and it won't be there, I'll do it again and then there's two. I'd still say it's one of the best running apps are there.

Strava is a pretty good app though seems to have a few bugs at the moment. Worst of all though is the support, there just isn't any. I like using Strava to check my runs and would love to give five stars but the problems my wife and I are having with the app they're lucky to get two stars. This review has now gone to one star and I wouldn't give that to be honest. Downloaded an update and still the same problems. I'm not paying for the premium app if they can't get the basic app right

title: QuickBooks Online Accounting, Invoicing & Expenses
description:
Track miles, manage invoices, maintain your financial reports and cash flow, and see your profit and loss. Run your small business on the go with the QuickBooks Online Accounting app, trusted by over 4.3 million small businesses worldwide. 

You don‚Äôt need to be a tax accountant to keep your small business bookkeeping organized. Create, send, and track invoices from viewed to paid. Access accounting solutions to know where your money is going. Plus, see where your business stands with financial reports. Small business accounting is easy with QuickBooks cloud accounting software. Our bookkeeping services make it effortless to stay on top of your business on the go. The Quickbooks Accounting app is here to make the life of every small business owner easier.

Tracking mileage automatically

Automatically track your business mileage using your phone‚Äôs GPS, without draining your phone‚Äôs battery.

Swipe to mark trips as business or personal to maximize your mileage tax deductions.

Dashboard business insights

Check your profit and loss to know what you‚Äôre making and spending, plus view your account balances.

Easily track your expenses by category so you know exactly where your money goes.

See your open and overdue invoices at a glance for easy cash flow analysis.

Create invoices and get paid faster

The invoice generator lets you send and manage invoices in multiple currencies so you always know who owes you and who paid you.

Get paid faster by credit card or bank transfer (requires a QuickBooks Payments account).

Manage payments, track sales and customers on the go

Get maximum tax savings by scanning receipts and attaching them to your expenses.  

Stay up to date on your profit and loss by connecting your bank accounts. Track finances and manage payments quickly and with ease.

Review your bank transactions and add them to your accounting records with a tap.
Easily add your customers so you can keep in touch with them on the go.

Do even more with online accounting

Customize your invoices and sales receipts with your logo, colors, and custom fields in minutes. 

Be prepared for tax time and get all the tax deductions you deserve by giving your tax accountant access to your QuickBooks data.

Add more tools with over 80 partner apps, including inventory management and advanced CRM, by going to apps.intuit.com

It‚Äôs easy to get started

Already using QuickBooks Online? Download the world‚Äôs #1 accounting app, sign in with your QuickBooks user ID and password, and enjoy the QuickBooks Accounting app for free!

New to QuickBooks Online? Download the app, create an account, and try QuickBooks free for 30 days! There‚Äôs no credit card required and no obligation to purchase.

Your free trial includes unlimited access to QuickBooks on the web and all your mobile devices. 

Not compatible with QuickBooks Desktop for Windows or Mac.

#1 Accounting Software for Small to Midsize Businesses
*Based on PCMag, as of November 2019

From INTUIT

Makers of QuickBooks Online, GoPayment, QuickBooks Payroll, TurboTax, and Mint.com

Visit:
https://security.intuit.com/privacy to learn how Intuit protects your privacy.
https://qbo.intuit.com/c1/Terms_Of_Service.html to read the Intuit terms of service.

Download today and start managing your small business easily on the go.

recentChanges: Thanks for using QuickBooks. We update our app regularly to improve performance, fix bugs and add new features so that you'll always know where your business stands.
comments: Whatever you do do NOT sign up or create a subscription through the app or the Google Play Store - you have no ability to manage your subscription or upgrade your account through the app and quickbooks customer support is unable to help or change settings as well. I am very competent with navigating apps and I can say with 100% confidence this is on the app developers at this point - extremely frustrated and unhappy with the app

It's amazing how far behind the times this company is. The only way my bank will allow me to link to Quick Books is by using my routing and account number, but QB doesn't know how to do it that way. This is crazy! So I need to switch banks just so I can link my expenses with QB. What a pain in the ass.

6.10.19 - i hate it. you can't do "billable" expenses from the app. you cant edit invoices that have been sent. terrible. i hate it. 8.12.19 - still hate it. noone has "investigated"my situation. üëéüëé 12.5.19. yup.. still hate it. I use it but cringe every single time I open it. POS app. 1.3.20 still hate it no "billable button". Zero stars 3.5.20. still hate it. Zero stars

Tried to open an account, somehow ended up opening 2 separate ones. Cancelled my subscription but has still charged for the 2 accounts for over 2 months. Absolute shambles. I tried to use the one account that I actually wanted but had absolutely terrible service off the helpline, nobody knew what to do. Shocking.
paying $20 a month for an app that keeps crashing that rely on for our business is nerve wrecking. please fix asap. Have tried app from two different computers to make sure it wasn't from my end.

title: Azar
description:
Azar allows you to talk and make friends with people from over 190 countries. 

‚Ä¢ Over 400 million downloads worldwide!
‚Ä¢ More than 70 billion matches!
‚Ä¢ Featured in Google Play Store in over 130+ countries! 

‚ñ∑ Discover & Connect!
Azar allows you to meet someone new at the turn of each swipe. 
You can easily explore new cultures and people from all over the world. 

- Meet new people from all over the world through live video calls (using 3G, 4G, Wi-Fi)
- Select the region and gender of your choice and start building new conversations 
- Add new people to your friend list and spark conversations 
- Send and receive messages/video calls with existing friends 
- Don‚Äôt be afraid of foreign languages! Chats are translated in real time. 

‚ñ∑ Share Azar with people around you and make more connections 
Please leave a review on the Google Play Store and Facebook. Your review will help make Azar a better service.

- Want more information? http://azarlive.com 
- Updates on Azar? http://www.facebook.com/azar.application 
- Want to follow Azar? https://instagram.com/azar_official 
- Need help or have suggestions? https://help.azarlive.com/hc 
- Business partnership inquiry? azar.business@hpcnt.com

‚ñ∑ Creating a better and enjoyable community at Azar 
The Azar team is committed to creating a service that anyone can use safely. We believe our users are able to meet new and genuine people with each swipe. Please respect other users and follow our community guidelines to keep the Azar community at its best!

‚ñ∑ Protection of Personal Information 
- All personal information is securely stored and not sold nor shared to third parties.
- Information other than what you write directly on the profile can not be seen by other users.
- Your detailed location is not shared with any other user or third parties.
- Please take caution when delivering sensitive information, because you are responsible for the information you provide to the other party once you connect through Azar.

comments: Azar's response below is irrelevant and from a bot. App review - If someone reports you then your account will be suspended without complete investigation of the issue. If you are suspended then you will not get any opportunity to present your case. This policy is against consumer protection legislations. Paid subscriptions become useless during suspension. Azar's method to review the reports is incomplete and hence flawed. Azar should do holistic review by listening to audio of both sides.

I've read some bad reviews about this app but I can't fault it really. Would be nice to have more free options. Other than that don't pay for it. Just make friends. Easy to get banned so be nice. 5* if it was free.
On creation of an account, when I try to verify my phone number it just says Verification Failed. Im entering the correct info but still the same error every time.
I can't open the app it says (100) please check your internet connection. But our internet is working properly. Please fix this

Downloaded the app and 5 minutes in it is telling me to buy gems, and secondly when I want the app to prioritize searching for females, guess what loan and behold I have to pay, it is absolutely ridiculous.

comments: this app is not user friendly. It timegates all female calls. American calls are audio only for 30 SECONDS inciting you to skip. if you're lucky to get one. the gender is not randomized, you practically only call men on free calls. and does not give you an option to select region. 70% of my calls lasted 1 second that were men from India. price is too steep to be considered efficient. Have to pay for literally everything. Just plain awful.

I keep on receiving messages from users on the app, and the number of messages has reached 11 but I can only see 1 user and 1 message in the messages tab. The subscription is expensive. I went through many international matches which seemed to be only prerecorded for sometime and which then end up abruptly after the "recorded" video seems to end.

I dont usually write reviews but was not happy. Most people are real but even though I paid the 1 month subscription, I still have to pay to call-back or answer calls and after a certain amount of messages are sent, they charge extra for those too! And if somebody messages you first, you cant reply unless your subscribed. This app should be more lenient and less of a money grab. Apart from that it was great. So they get 2 stars.

I m happy using this app, but the premium membership is very expensive. Have to work out on it so it can be affordable. To send a msg to premium member is also expensive, at least give free access to reply for the message .

It's pretty much disappointing app, as it says unlimited calls and all on premium membership however you still gotta spend coins for call which is completely opposite what they for providing premium membership plus if you write them they won't bother to get you back on the issue.

title: Elevate - Brain Training Games
description:
Elevate is a brain training program designed to improve attention, speaking skills, processing speed, memory, math skills, and more. Each person is provided with his or her own personalized training program that adjusts over time to maximize results.

The more you train with Elevate, the more you‚Äôll improve critical cognitive skills that are designed to boost productivity, earning power, and self-confidence. Users who train at least 3 times per week have reported dramatic gains and increased confidence.

Elevate offers a 14-day free trial as well as a free version. To access the free version, tap the X in the upper left-hand corner after you sign up for an account. 

FEATURES

* 35+ brain games for critical cognitive skills like focus, memory, processing, math, precision, and comprehension 
* Detailed performance tracking 
* Personalized daily workouts that include the skills you need most 
* Adaptive difficulty progression to ensure your experience is challenging 
* Workout calendar to help you track your streaks and stay motivated 
* And more!

IN THE NEWS

CNET
‚ÄúElevate comes out ahead‚Äù in the battle of the brain training apps.

Wall Street Journal
Compared with other brain games, ‚ÄúI prefer Elevate the most.‚Äù

Washington Post
Elevate is a ‚Äúcognitive pick-me-up‚Äù with games that are ‚Äúgood for mental breaks throughout the workday.‚Äù

RESEARCH BEHIND ELEVATE

Elevate's brain games are designed in collaboration with experts in education and are based on proven educational techniques. Elevate‚Äôs brain training algorithms draw from cognitive research in attention and memory studies to develop a personalized training program for each user.

recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ New content added to Agility, Association, Brevity, Commas, Eloquence, Expression, and Memory
‚Ä¢ Various bug fixes and improvements throughout the app
comments: Very streamlined, a lot more detail than other brain training games. The games/challenges are brilliant,, it also tells you where you are most advanced. The only thing I would change is the yearly cost and make it monthly, I'm not currently working so can't afford the yearly cost in one go, so I have given the 7 day free trial a go, even in the further info about the app, it says that elevate offers a 14 day trial and I only wish that I could continue with it.

So far so good, been playing for about a week. I'm enjoying the content, I like how its getting harder with improving scores and the graphics are really solid, it's a very attractive game and it appeals to my competitive spirit by mentioning how you scale with the community of players. It's a fun way to exercise brain muscles. I just purchased pro to help support the creators, and I honestly don't regret it .

Excellent app, developers! My brain is getting better by the day. My language skills aren't bad, 'cause I train them for college all the time, but my math skills are really diamonds on the rough, so I'm polishing them most especially. Thank you for making this! I recommend it to anyone who needs to polish their cognitive skills. üëèüëèüëè

great app. I would give it 5 star if there is a way to backup my progress. dont really understand the ranking system. my rankings in each game is much lower than my ranking in each skill (writing, speaking, reading and math). my skill rankings are too high and I suspect that could be because the app does not have enough users.

I mostly like this app. Some of the sections are extremely frustrating because they just don't work correctly. Specifically, working with commas. The app doesn't recognize when or where you tap on your phone screen accurately. Since it works fine on other sections of the app, I feel sure it's the programming and not my phone.

title: SWEAT: Kayla Itsines Fitness
description:

Work out with trainers Kayla Itsines, Kelsey Wells, Chontel Duncan, Stephanie Sanzo and Sjana Elise Earp. Join millions of women in SWEAT‚Äôs mission to help women live their best life through health and fitness.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
SWEAT is free to download. Ongoing use requires an active subscription, available on monthly or yearly basis. Customers who choose a monthly subscription are eligible for a free 7-day trial period. Payment will be charged to your credit card through your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. There is no increase in price when renewing.

Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in Google Play after purchase. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

comments: Paid for an annual subscription which I loved until it stopped working. The app stopped working and unfortunately I've not had a response to the request for support that I made 4 days ago. Highly disappointing............Update. Unfortunately the email I've received 5 days after sending hadn't taken in to account the comments of my email and therefore made no difference to the issues I continue to have.

Love this app! SWEAT tells you exactly what exercises to do at the gym, so all you have to do is rock up and follow the workout plan. There are different trainers to choose from, so you can pick a routine that suits your style of exercising (home/at the gym). Each week's exercises get a little harder so that you keep progressing and getting stronger. It also includes a meal plan (I don't follow it though so can't comment).

Besides the price, which is different in Denmark (higher), this app needs to be re-design. First, it is not intuitive. There is a lot of text all over, pop up windows asking you multiple times do you really want to quit this and that, really, really.. Second, it is annoying that during the workout you can't go out of that window back to dashboard while the timer is on. Third, my progress photos in the app can't be seen unless I'm paying for that month.

The PWR workouts are good (though I'm rather bored of mountain climbers and star jumps...) but the app is frustrating and not often intuitive. Most annoyingly, there is no way to track weights for different exercises to see if you are improving week-to-week. I'm not able to skip through sections easily (if, for example, a machine is in use at the gym). Can't return to a previous section of a workout once it's been completed or even view it to see what you've already done. Timer doesn't always work when screen is locked. Quitting a workout makes you jump through multiple hoops and give a reason (and my reason for quitting is usually not listed but there is no "other" option). Not able to quit the workout from the screens that appear between sections of the workout - instead have to start the next section, then pause, then hit quit, then several other buttons. A shortcut button to the home screen at the end of a workout would be great instead of having to tap through multiple times before being able to hit "return to dashboard". In addition to this, the meal plan is dangerously low in calories for someone of my build who is completing 4 workouts a week.

It's just as good as I hoped! Really helped me building a fitness routine. I love it and use it every day! I inly had a few problems with the connection to Spotify to listen to my own music. Sometimes Spotify is jumpy, stops playing and when you fiddle with it when you are in the middle of a workout, the workout timer pauses. Other that that, it's perfect.

developerAddress: Perform Media Services, Sussex House, Feltham TW13 7HE
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: App lacks support. Covid-19 mean there is no content going to be released for months. No clue why I can't get any support help for a refund since there is no content at all being released. I just feel like I will get bounced back and forth between the devs and google until I give up and they take my money... money for absolutely nothing.

Very basic app for what this service is and could be. Limited choices on how to watch on your phone holds this app back on it being as good as other live streaming apps, like Twitch (hint hint), Netflix etc. A pop-up window so you can watch while doing other stuff on your phone would be great and make this app/service way more useful. Also the choice to have it play audio only when you exit the app to do other stuff. The service is good, the app lacks usefulness and functionality.

Great Champions League coverage, I follow it for the boxing which is amazing and offers than the US shows. The football coverage and NFL, NBA and lots of other sports really make this value for money. I would like to be able to set reminders for specific sports (darts,boxing etc.) and maybe incorporate the eurosport schedule into what you can set reminders for would also be a great addition and being able to select the language commentary as my German wouldnt be at a level to follow.

Always crashes my phone. Must be an error coz I have to restart my phone completely as it becomes unresponsive but I cant power off. This has happened 4 or 5 times - pretty much the last couple times I used it. Great product but the app sucks. Guess I'll wait and watch it at home on my desktop.

DAZN on my LG G6 is great. It actually works better and runs much smoother than when I watch on the PS4. The issues that plague the PS4 app(lag, constant buffering, cutting out and freezing) are virtually non-existent on the mobile app. Great job! Now please fix the bugs that plague the PS4 app, so I can also give that app 5 stars. Besides that, Thank you DAZN for great sports entertainment at an affordable price.

title: BLK - Look. Match. Chat.
description:
BLK is the new app for Black single men and Black single women with a simple mission: To create an exclusive community where Black men and Black women can find meaningful connections with people who share similar likes and interests.
 
BLK is easy and fun to use: 
‚Ä¢	Simply scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 
‚Ä¢	If you're interested, slide the profile to right to give the person a ‚ÄòYeah‚Äô, or click the 'Heart' icon. 
‚Ä¢	If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away. 
‚Ä¢	Not interested? Slide the profile to the left to give the person a ‚ÄòNah‚Äô, or click the ‚ÄòX‚Äô icon. 
 
Right when you join, all members can: 
‚Ä¢	Become part of an exclusive community for single black men and black women
‚Ä¢	Like other members near you
‚Ä¢	Customize who and what they‚Äôre looking for
‚Ä¢	Receive a personalized group of profiles to look through every day
‚Ä¢	Chat with other members if they‚Äôve liked you back
 
Go Premium and you can also: 
‚Ä¢	Rewind on people to give them a second chance
‚Ä¢	Send over 100 Really Likes per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested 
‚Ä¢	Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 
‚Ä¢	Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Elite Membership: All Premium Benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You!

comments: It's so many spam accounts on the app. I almost believe BLK is making up profiles to keep people subscribed. I have had the absolute weirdest interactions or none I would say. I've connected or matched with so many people, yet no communication or very odd communication, then the profile suddenly disappears. Very strange, will not re-subscribing after my subscription for this month expires.

Worst account management ever! I got a new phone number and now can't get back in to my account. No options to retrieve or reset user's account login information. Extremely poor design. Use brain when designing apps. Password reset option are BASIC FEATURES on every app except this one.

The app is cool but use a few tweaks. For one when looking through profiles that have liked you, I'm unable to see ALL pics from that profile. Just the main pic which sucks bc sometimes the main pic is a meme, blurry, or cuts off face. If I'm paying I should be able to see all pics on profile under that category not just the random profile swipe part. Also distance/location should be added and stick to age ranges I have chosen. I have 32-42 but get lots of 20 year olds.

Good app for the most part, has potential. Could be much better if it had a distance filter. I made one match so far and 7 others like me, but like my match they are TOO far away. Also maybe a 1 week free trial could promote the quality of the memberships.

I really like the concept of this app. I honestly think it should be more booming than Tinder. My only complaint is that theres no distance meter - its tragic when I find someone I think I can vibe with, come to find out they're 200 miles away. Add one of those in and it's 5 stars.

title: Lookout Security & Antivirus
description:
We‚Äôre excited to introduce Safe Wi-Fi and System Advisor, two brand new security features to keep you and your personal data safe and secure.
 
Safe Wi-Fi
- Protects you and your data from dangerous Wi-Fi attacks. Get peace of mind as you connect to Wi-Fi networks on the go, knowing that Lookout is checking to make sure your connection is safe and secure.
 
System Advisor 
- Checks your device for root detections to make sure the operating system on your device is working properly.
 
Lookout is now the only all-in-one app that protects your device, your data and your identity with powerful mobile security and identity theft protection
 
Lookout Premium Plus*:
Lookout Premium Plus comes with all of the Premium functionality, plus identity theft protection.

‚ñ∫ Cyber Watch: Monitor your personal and financial information and get alerted whenever anything is found exposed online

‚ñ∫ Social Media Watch: Monitor your social media accounts to check if your personal information is at risk. Protect your online reputation by receiving alerts if you‚Äôve been tagged in posts with offensive content
 
‚ñ∫ IDENTITY RESTORATION & INSURANCE
‚ñ∫ 24/7 Restoration Assistance: In the event of identity theft, certified ID Restoration Experts are available 24/7 to assist with the time-consuming process of recovering and restoring your identity

Lookout Premium:
Lookout Premium includes all the functionality of Lookout Basic, plus additional security to protect your device, your data and your privacy.

comments: The VPN keeps turning itself on even after I've turned it off manually. I'm tired of all the support that's not working I plan on canceling my membership and deleting the app altogether. I'll try another virus protection service that allows me to view my apps without problem and not turning on without my permission.

Paid for premium $2.99/mo. for a year. It never worked. I didn't get premium service. When I got a new phone, I tried to add it..ATT had a service contract with Lookout. Followed instructions on adding the phone... nope... But I did get billed another 29.99 for the yearly subscription. Cancelled it completely. And at earliest convenience, ATT allows the service to be removed. That will be getting done. If customer service isn't a priority, then neither is my money. Somebody else will take it.

I used the free version of this app for a little while, and I'm not sure if it detects anything at all. So I feel the free version is not even worth using. Since you have to sign up for the premium version if you also want internet and Wi-Fi protection. Anyways overall it's a ok security and antivirus app, but I'd be more likely to start using this app again. If the free version also came with internet and Wi-Fi protection.

Lookout is the only trusted app for mobile end point security. It is thorough and intelligent and is actively working all the time. We have tested it thoroughly and found it to be effective and well worth the small premium free per month. The world of security is changing as the threats are changing and Lookout manages those expectations well. This is a well trusted solution for our end clients.

*Update* Worse than before, lookout responded to my review with deception. I have verified, and my observations are accurate. False advertising! 1)No free trial for premium. App def does demand for CC info and immediate payment if u try premium features. If you submit CC info u wil be charged! 2)There is no uninstall prevention and no device admin option from within the app settings as is declared in the gplay description and on the lookout site. 3)Locating device in real time DOES NOT WORK!

title: BetterMe: Home Workouts & Diet
description:
BetterMe: 30 Day Fitness Challenge To Lose Weight is designed to catch up with every woman personal training needs. Whether you're looking to lose some weight at home, get a personal diet plan, tack water intake or get personal trainer advice, we‚Äôve got you covered. Our 30 day weight loss challenges for all body parts will help you tone up your body and lose weight in specific areas if your body. With our easy at-home workouts and you can:
- get perkier butt
- get slimmer arms
- lose leg fat 
- get rid of hip dips
- get flat tummy
- lose weight and tone up your muscles 
Video and audio guided workouts, custom meal plans for weight loss, water tracker and personal trainer feature all in one app. 
BetterMe app offers a real personal trainer experience and takes your workouts up a notch. If getting leaner, fitter and stronger is on your menu then this is the app you were looking for to fulfill all your fitness needs.
By downloading our workout app for women you get exactly what you bargained for: weight loss full body workouts, belly fat loss exercises, 30 day weight loss challenges, 7 minutes quick at home workouts, if you don‚Äôt have much spare time and just need a quick workout before starting your day, not to mention our top-notch warm-up and stretching routines which will undeniably make you forget what pulling a muscle or spraining an ankle means. This app is perfect for burning belly fat, burning leg fat. It's also beginner friendly and considered as the best weight loss app on the market.
You can easily track your weight loss progress with our convenient app, you can also track your steps, as our app has built in step tracker, water tracker and calorie tracker, all these features or your fast and healthy weight loss journey.
So why should I consider downloading this app?
- It includes weight loss workout programs for all body parts (fat loss workout, arm workout, leg workout, butt workout, tummy fat burning exercise).
- You get custom weight loss meal plans.
- It‚Äôs designed for women and covers all modern woman needs.
- Good for beginners as well as advanced fitness enthusiasts. 
- You can track your progress, steps, water and calorie intake.
- Get support and motivation from personal trainer 24/7. 
- 15 minutes of sweat a day and you‚Äôll lose belly fat, with our short and effective fat burning workouts & HIIT workouts at home.
- No equipment, no gym, bodyweight workouts.
- Customize your own workout routine .
- Focus on your trouble zone with simple & effective fat burning workouts from BetterMe. 
Burn fat effortlessly with the BetterMe app. We recommend trying our 30 day weight loss tummy fat burning challenge that will ensure your fast & healthy weight loss journey.

comments: This is BS!! DON'T BELIEVE the 1 week FREE TRIAL! It's a LIE! It'll ask for your CC for "in case you don't cancel in time" but when you do cancel in PLENTY of time it will tell you 'NO REFUNDS' that is FALSE ADVERTISING and just plain BS in my book!! I'm FURIOUS! I was raised to believe there's nothing worse than a thief and a liar and they are BOTH!

Signed up for th 7 day free trial. Cancelled the same day (so as to not forget). Charged for a full year 7 days later. Not impressed af all that the 7 day trial with the option to cancel was not true. Feeling very misled by the app. ***I have responded to your email with the required information and still have yet to receive a refund***

I didn't mean to subscribe to this app. I only wanted to try the 7 day free trial and it charged me for the year. I also went to add something to food log and everytime I scanned the barcode it couldn't find it. It also doesnt have normal stuff, for example lunchables or mountain dew. Crazy!!!!

I wanted to do a trial week of this app. When I signed up it only gave me the option for a yearly subscription. So I thought well, it says there is a trial week I can cancel later right,.....wrong. The trial option only applies to the monthly subscription, which I didn't get the option to choose between yearly or monthly. So now I am stuck with an app for the next year that I may not even use. Be careful before you hit subscribe. Better Me did.make things right and I did get my refund.

Do NOT get this app!!! I was thought there was going to be a 7 day trial but then it charged my card for the full year. I tried to cancel realizing that it was a horrible app, but I couldn't. I emailed them and got an automated reply and it said they would get back with me within 48 hours and they did not.. This app is very misleading. I got my refund from this app. I still would not get this app

comments: The amount of content is not enough for the price asked. I love the concept of this app but it falls short. First, cable providers should not be involved at all. We stream in order to get away from cable companies. Also, there are not enough novelas. I feel that this app would be great if the whole catalogue of novelas(especially classics) was available to stream. I was hoping to find an app that would let me binge on all the novelas possible.

It was working fine then the last few weeks on Roku episodes started flickering in and out. I have also had the issue of watching NOVELA and they remove them and I'm halfway through. Do you guys not keep track on the audience? I pay for this and its frustrating that shows are removed. But older shows remain. **NOW on Roku it said if you had cable you need to download app. I don't have cable. I removed and then re-added channel and I'm locked out of shows on my list. ***Must fix!

It was working fine. But when I stopped paying it for 2 days..it cancelled then I went to pay for it and now it won't let me watch my shows because it's says "You have not payed" but I have and I don't want them getting my money from my card if I won't be able to watch my shows.

The app works as it's supposed to. My main issue is you pay for this service and still have to watch alot of ads.... you can't skip them... cannot fast forward or rewind without watching one or two... for $10 a month??
It's very great I can watch my favorite novelas but it's not working for me it says Everytime I click it it says it's not disponible in my region idk what that means

In a society that profits on our self-doubt, Badoo is the place where it pays to be the real, unapologetic you. We fight the ambiguity of modern dating with authentic, unfiltered conversation. We believe real connection is born from being honest in who you are and what you really want. 

Download Badoo and start your dating journey! Join the biggest online dating app in the world, with more than 460 million users who trust us.

Be honest
The key is to be yourself. Be clear in what you're looking for and who you'd like to find on Badoo. Badoo is a social network that allows you to match and find a partner, or chat with people and find friends close to you. We‚Äôre so much more than just online dating apps.

You're in good hands ü§û
Badoo is a platform that consistently ensures safety and respect within our community. We do not tolerate any kind of inappropriate behavior and have strict usage guidelines, as well as an extensive list of safety features to ensure that you have the best dating experience with us.

comments: Barely usable. You have to pay for everything. LITERALLY EVERYTHING. Notifications pop up for people nearby and tells you to write to them. When you try however, it tells you cutely that you have to pay 200 credits in order to start a conversation. Ridiculous. What is also ridiculous that if you don't pay for premium, after 10 swipes(doesn't matter if left or right, tested it), it pops up one unskippable, unmutable video advertisement which can be any length from 5 to 15 sec. Frickin annoying. And when you manage to match, most people don't even write back. I swear, if you don't pay, your matches are not always notified about your messages. Never happened on Tinder which is a much more better alternative.

Suddenly ads. Ads everywhere. Completetly ruins it all. Also most users are inactive. Constant nagging about paying. And (very) large amount of out of country persons... Yes. It is free to use. But three ads on the screen at the same time is kinda screwed up. Usability and experience went down the drain compared to the competitors. Solved it by deleting my account and uninstalling üòé

This app is pointless. I swiped right almost everyone and I couldn't find a girl who would write back or even just read my messages. The ads are irritating. The cards sometimes run out, even if you put the distance to maximum which is stupid. After a while you will match up with the same people over and over again. And sometimes people get deleted for no reason. I finally had enough after I gave it another chance.

This was an ok app at first and so I decided to check out the premium feature just to see what it's about. You pay around $8 dollars a week to have premium. What does premium get you? Almost nothing! With premium you get to see who added you as a favorite, see who liked you, get priority message, chat with new profiles, undo no votes, and go incognito mode. That's all you get for $7 a week and that's $28 a month. Even with premium, you still have to use credits and credits do not come with premium. I was thinking for $7/week, you should get a lot more or even credit every time you renew but nope. Do not get premium because it's not work the cost.

This is a great app, i love meeting new people from all over.. I think i had this app installed awhile back but wasnt interested in it. But now as i try it again it really is a great app.. I plan on doing the lifetime membership because it does seem worth it in the longrun with all the future friends you can meet on here.. Its not just dating app, it is a way to make friends from all over the world just like having a penpal. Worth 10 stars

title: Noggin Preschool Learning Games & Videos for Kids
description:
Noggin is the only subscription service where learning is led by the trusted Nick Jr. characters your kids know and love. When you subscribe to Noggin, you‚Äôll get access to an ever-expanding library of eBooks, learning games, interactive episodes, activities, and exclusive shorts developed by curriculum specialists. With 1,000+ ad-free full episodes of preschool favorites like PAW Patrol, Peppa Pig, and Blue's Clues & You! ‚Äî kids can go on fun learning adventures and explore math, science, literacy, music, manners, and more!

Here‚Äôs why Noggin is great for kids ages 2 & older:
‚Ä¢ Trusted characters teach kids everything from ABCs and 123s, to important life skills
‚Ä¢ Safe and easy for kids to navigate independently. No ads, ever!
‚Ä¢ Downloadable content allows kids to play offline or on the go!
‚Ä¢ One subscription gives you access to the Noggin app on multiple devices
‚Ä¢ New content added weekly!

eBooks
‚Ä¢ Downloadable stories help foster a love of reading
‚Ä¢ Read together or turn on narration and your child can explore at their own pace
‚Ä¢ Parent tips help guide conversations and reading comprehension
‚Ä¢ Features Bob Books ‚Äî a proven learn-to-read book series! - NEW!

Games & Play-Along Videos
‚Ä¢ Your child‚Äôs favorite shows made interactive!
‚Ä¢ Kids can swipe, tap, and even talk to their favorite characters as they learn
‚Ä¢ Downloadable episodes kids can watch and play offline
‚Ä¢ Math, literacy, and puzzle games will have kids using their noggin
‚Ä¢ Coloring books nurture kids' creativity

Start Your Subscription Today! 
‚Ä¢ First 7 days free and then $7.99/month until you cancel
‚Ä¢ Your Google Play account will be charged $7.99/month when your trial ends
‚Ä¢ Cancel your subscription in Google Play store > My Apps > Subscriptions 
‚Ä¢ Avoid auto-renew charges by canceling at least 24 hours before the end of your trial or current billing period

Noggin collects personal user data as well as non-personal user data (including aggregated data). User data collection is in accordance with applicable law, such as COPPA. User data may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content and advertising; and manage and improve Nickelodeon's services. For more information regarding Nickelodeon‚Äôs use of personal user data, please visit the Nickelodeon Group Privacy Policy below. Our Privacy Policy is in addition to any terms, conditions or policies agreed to between you and Google, Inc., and Nickelodeon and its affiliated entities are not responsible for Google's collection or use of your personal user data and information. Additionally, this App may use ‚Äúlocal notifications.‚Äù Local notifications are sent directly from the App to your device (you don‚Äôt need to be connected to the Internet) and may be used to notify you of new content or events within your App, among other reasons. Use of this App is subject to the Nickelodeon End User License Agreement.

Noggin offers in-app purchases and charges real money for additional in-app content. You may lock out the ability to purchase in-app content by adjusting your device‚Äôs settings.

End User License Agreement: http://www.nick.com/nick-eula/
Privacy Policy: http://www.nickjr.com/privacy-policy/
The End User License Agreement for this app includes arbitration for disputes ‚Äì see FAQs: http://www.nick.com/faqs/

comments: There is nothing FREE about this app for one. You can't do a damn thing until you sign up for one free week and $7.99 a month after that which to be honest I wouldn't mind, IF I COULD CAST TO MY TV! BUT YOU CAN'T!!!! If I could cast, I'd get the subscription. Until then this app gets 0 stars from me. Complete waste

What a scam. Payment method expired so after a couple months decided to cancel the subscription. Cancelled they a few days later updated payment methods for other apps. They then decided to reinstate my subscription for Noggin without permission. I'll never use this again.

Nothing works. Every time I try to verify my email address be it on my phone, tablet or computer, I get an error. Not to mention many of the games won't launch. I'm sure if things were to work properly it could be a good service. Uninstalled

The recent update has changed the entire layout. Its much more confusing now with games mixed in with the episodes. The names of episodes no longer show either. When you're done watching/playing be sure to close out of the app completely or the show moght start up/continue on its own several minutes later. This is especially creepy in the evening. I'm hoping for an update/fix soon otherwise we'll be cancelling our subscription.
I have this for my four year old. he played the games and watches shows. we have it on a tablet and two TVs. never a problem. $8 a month is cheaper than cable.

title: Clover Dating App

comments: Between the profile attributes, the 20 questions, and the group interests, it has the potential to be a good Tinder alternative. HOWEVER it is foremost way too expensive. $15 a week, $4.60/wk for 3 months ($50), or $2.30/wk for a year ($105). $15 a month? Eh, maybe but not worth it. $15 a week? Not a chance. Like Tinder (and others) the majority of your matches even if you are attractive will be scams. If you are not (like me) it will be all scams. Easy to spot, but annoying and demoralizing.

Better than tinder assuming you are not willing to pay 33 something dollars for tinder premium or whatever it is. This is great if you don't want to spend money. Like why make money off people looking for a relationship, its cruel, but this app isn't super restricting. You're able to talk to people who like you(that's important for me), you can filter your preferences, you can see who swiped right or is interested in you, etc. If you pay for clover premium it's half the price of premium tinder.

The app is a nice change from Tinder and Bumble, but I went for the free premium trial and was mortified to discover the app sending tons of messages on my behalf to people I am absolutely not interested in. There is no way to turn this feature off that I can find. This is embarrassing to say the least, and problematic at worst. I work at a college and could face repercussions if I'm seen to be making a pass at a student. Please do better.

So far, I have found Clover to be a very good App for putting people in touch with each other who may never have had the chance or known the other existed, bc its based on what 2 people nearby each other at the same time may find out when they decide to get together and meet. I just started so we shall see!

Only got this app because literally every add says FREE and it is not free. You can not market something as free and force someone to give you an account with money on it for the services that were previously advertised as free. I want to explicitly say this would have been a 5 star app if I could even start a conversation without giving my card information.

comments: Terrible. You open the app and doesn't let you play. It immediately wants you to buy the pro option. You can't play unless you buy it. This makes me think that there probably isn't just a free play option. Edit: found out that this company stole parts of a vidio on YouTube for their ads. The uploader did not give permission, and it's not even the same game. This is a terrible product, and the developers should be ashamed.

Stupid touch app, lets you drag slime over the screen and charges 81$ for access to more slime. My 4 yr old has bought VIP, currently trying to gain a refund. I understand my child should have been watched a little closer, but even that aside, if I had bought this app for that much, it would still prompt a refund since the cost simply is not justified by the product. Will hopefully be able to repost a nice story soon.

I mean I with alot of people on 1 star reviews! This app is horrible you can't play it because you get bored waiting for the X so then you can get of this add wanting you to buy products!Its getting annoying coming on a app that used to be great no adds or anything but now its just ruined! I hope nobody bought that add because its a waste! Whoever made this should be ashamed!

Never got around to playing as the fact it's subscription-based put me off. Three days of free trial followed no free option but an immediate ¬£49.49, whatever it was, is ridiculous considering the potential nothingness of this game. *edit - apparently there IS a free option, however the developers have designed this (very sneakily) so that it takes a long time for the X to close down the subscribe option (according to some reviews at least).

lmao its funny how you dont even get do try it. it doesnt even deserve a 1 star, there should be none. its really funny tbh. if it were to have like, 5 options, then it would have been way better, but unfortunately, there is nothing. i expected less anyways. it looked, like not sketchy but kinda. disappointed, but defs not surprised.

comments: Please don't use this app. A lot of people use it, but the app itself is terrible. If you select 5 mile radius, it will still show you things 100miles away. It never saves your default search settings, nor does it save your location unless you always keep location on. Other apps don't do that. It is a terrible app that they refuse to update. The only positive is that is a lot of people use it for some reason. Please start selling your stuff on other apps that actually care about the users.

Great app. The distance setting in the search filter was a little off. Like I tried putting in items up to 30 miles away but it had some stuff in there that was to me like 40-50 miles away. It seemed better when I narrowed it closer to my location though. That's the only issue I've experienced with it. The process to post what you want to sell is NOT overly complicated, it's simple to use, but it's kind odd looking for me though. But that's just my opinion there, everything else seems great.

I've had great success with this app, my only complaint is regarding the ads. I do understand to keep this app 100% you need to show ads but I find them to be repetative, rather intrusive and very large. If you don't know to keep scrolling once you see a large ad then you will miss out on a lot things for sale.

It's a great way to make extra money. It's fun to meet with all the interesting people however there are a few flaws to the game. For instance, it is a turn off when a person promises to purchase and they give a date and time then they never show up! Its It's frustrating, and a waste of time I wish that LETGO could implement some kind of consequence for the people that stand people doing things

This is a platform that works and is built well. However the app still has many bugs. They're mostly annoying, some are a little inconvenient. None of them inhibit use of the platform though. They've got a ways to go, and are founded on solid ground. Personalized recommended searches must be based on nothing, because I get recommendations for electronics but all I search for a bit are clothes. Notifications to my phone duplicate themselves, lag, and are sometimes broken.

title: Evernote - Notes Organizer & Daily Planner
description:
- Focus on what matters most and have access to your information when you need it.
- Input typed notes or scan handwritten notes, add to-do‚Äôs, photos, images, web pages, or audio... and it‚Äôs all instantly searchable.
- Create notebooks, organizers, planners and organize them any way you want and share with anyone.
- Sync your notes and notebooks across your devices so your information is always with you.

‚ÄúWhen it comes to taking all manner of notes and getting work done, Evernote is an indispensable tool.‚Äù ‚Äì PC Mag

‚Ä¢ Write, collect and capture ideas as searchable notes, notebooks, memos, checklists and to-do lists. It‚Äôs the only planner and organizer you need

‚Ä¢ Attach Microsoft Office docs, PDFs and photos
‚Ä¢ Create separate notepads to organize your memos, receipts, bills and invoices
‚Ä¢ Use Evernote as a digital notepad, planner and easy-to-format word processor for all your thoughts and memos as they come

*SYNC ANYWHERE*

‚Ä¢ Start your writing and task working on one device and continue on another without ever missing a beat

*SHARE YOUR IDEAS*

*EVERNOTE IN EVERYDAY LIFE*

‚Ä¢ Gather, capture and store every thought you need to stay productive

‚Ä¢ Create smart notebooks, write memos and journals on the go with the easy-to-use notepad

*EVERNOTE IN BUSINESS*
‚Ä¢ Create agendas and planners, write notes, memos, journals and craft presentations. Use it as your ultimate planner, organizer and notepad at work
‚Ä¢ Annotate documents with comments during team meetings, then share with colleagues

‚Ä¢ Keep up with lecture notes so you don‚Äôt miss a vital thought
‚Ä¢ Use it as a planner and organizer to keep track of lecture notes, exams and assignments

‚Ä¢ Keep track of your upcoming exams, assignments and deadlines in your planner

‚Ä¢ Discuss and annotate notes, memos and drafts

*HOME SCREEN WIDGET*
Access Evernote easier and faster using the Home screen widget


Also available from Evernote:

EVERNOTE PREMIUM - The ultimate workspace.
‚Ä¢ 10 GB of new uploads each month
‚Ä¢ Unlimited number of devices
‚Ä¢ Access your notes and notebooks offline
‚Ä¢ Save emails to Evernote
‚Ä¢ Search inside Office docs and attachments
‚Ä¢ Annotate PDFs
‚Ä¢ Scan and digitize business cards
‚Ä¢ Show notes as presentations, instantly

- Focus on what matters most and have access to your information when you need it.
- Input typed notes or scan handwritten notes, add to-do‚Äôs, photos, images, web pages, or audio... and it‚Äôs all instantly searchable.
- Create notebooks, organizers, planners and organize them any way you want and share with anyone.
- Sync your notes and notebooks across your devices so your information is always with you.

"Use Evernote as the place you put everything ‚Ä¶ Don‚Äôt ask yourself which device it‚Äôs on‚Äîit‚Äôs in Evernote" ‚Äì The New York Times

‚ÄúWhen it comes to taking all manner of notes and getting work done, Evernote is an indispensable tool.‚Äù ‚Äì PC Mag

*GET ORGANIZED*
‚Ä¢ Write, collect and capture ideas as searchable notes, notebooks, memos, checklists and to-do lists. It‚Äôs the only planner and organizer you need
‚Ä¢ Keep journals, documenting the news and writing the events and milestones of your daily life
‚Ä¢ Take notes and create notepads in a variety of formats, including: text, sketches, photos, audio, video, PDFs, web clippings and more

‚Ä¢ Clip and highlight articles from the web for academic research
