comments: Would be nice to have ability to save url like in Google Keep. E.g note title should have site page title and content of note is just url with pic. Edit. Thanks for that. What about separated tags that exist only for a certain notebook. It would help to separate work/personal etc notes and would simplify searching by tags when one has many.

Great. But, I'm new to evernote. But, addicted now üòç Very excited having it. But, it need some updates. It's better to show following them on the task bar: Font color, change page color, font size, font style, comment option, insert table & etc. I love it soo much. But, expecting this like google docs

Edit: seems to be fixed right now, except the formatting is still wrong. Lots of problems trying to sync when using it across different devices. I use the app on my phone and sometimes I'll try to log in on the website on my computer at work where I don't want to download the app. Whenever that happens all the formatting gets screwed up and it's so frustrating that I'm beginning to find it not worth using. There's better ways to store my information.

As of today, a few seconds after I opened the app it takes me to an upgrade screen and says I have to purchase premium. I have to work from home because of covid-19 and need my notes, and now Evernote is making me spend money? Great timing.

2020-03-15 v8.13 - insert line bug is fixed!!! Note Upload bug still there. OLD -Ver 8.12.1 installed today. Still the issue with the horizontal line inserting at the END of the note, not at the cursor position. This has been an issue since the update in June 2019. The earlier bugs with notes taking a minute to load has been fixed but some notes with graphics are still slow but more like 5-10 seconds slow. Premium user since 2013. Currently Android 7.1.1. 2020-01-17 new update; insert line bug still not fixed; also dealing with a "Note Upload" bug for several months. The app does a great job for me but these bugs are adding editing time to my day.

title: Asana Rebel: Get in Shape
description:
Asana Rebel is the YOGA AND FITNESS app for anyone who wants to GET FIT, LOSE WEIGHT, and start a HEALTHY LIFESTYLE. Yoga Inspired Fitness is changing the way 10 million users worldwide exercise. Join today!

THE RESULTS TO EXPECT
- Lose weight, burn calories
- Get fit and lean, strengthen your core
- Increase flexibility to boost your performance
- Balance the body while focusing the mind
- Leave the stress of the day behind

GET IN SHAPE - A different way to sweat
Tone your body while strengthening your spirit. Get ready to blast calories, rev up your heart rate and boost metabolism.

STRENGTH - Stronger than yesterday
Unleash your inner warrior with head-to-toe strengthening sequences, designed to keep your abs and other key muscle groups in tip-top shape.

FLEXIBILITY - Bend, don‚Äôt break
Anti-aging and vitality! Enjoy deep stretches that release tension and increase your range of motion.

BALANCE & FOCUS - Confidence - in a pose
Find inner serenity and peace by allowing your mind to focus on the task at hand.

BREATHE & RELAX - Just breathe
Calm your mind and body by focusing on deep inhales and exhales. Purposeful breathing and relaxation techniques keep your movements flowy.

ACCESS TO
- 100+ workouts designed by yoga and fitness experts
- Personalized workouts according to your health and fitness goals
- Curated workout collections to achieve specific fitness goals
- Filtered results: Browse by fitness goals, duration, intensity, or collection
- Workout previews: Full video previews with exercise tutorials
- New content, all the time!

THE PERKS OF BEING A REBEL
- Your health costs less than a cup of coffee per week
- No entry barrier, it‚Äôs fun and easy to follow
- Exercise anytime, anywhere - at your own pace
- Save time spent traveling to and from the gym
- Get motivated and build lifelong habits with proven, unique, modern methods
- Not alone: Share your success with over 10 million users community or chat with our Rebel Success Team

INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGY
We‚Äôre always updating Asana Rebel with new and improved features. Our interface is dynamic and user-friendly, making it easy for users to track their progress and share results.

Available in six languages: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and Spanish. More languages coming soon!

FOR MORE INFORMATION:
Terms of Use: https://asanarebel.com/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: https://asanarebel.com/privacy-policy/

comments: I was extremely excited to download this app after I read all the reviews. I got to the payment stage and it said it costs xx dollars per month. At the end it charged me for a full year. It says you can cancel subscription any time but what for when I have an year of payment. Also I needed to pay to actually see what they can offer. Again, cancelling my subscription will not change anything even if I don't like what they have to offer once I start using it. I'm repulsed to use it now

Update: I had to reset my password in order for the app to work. I'm facing a problem. I paid for 3months of Asana Rebel today and I'm stuck in the log in page, repeating date of birth, height, weight many times to reach to the log in page and nothing! Please advise or a refund would be great. Hope to hear soon from you

I get targeted by their ads all the time. Eventually, I did download the app. The free workouts are 4 minutes short and really boring. I'm not sure what the full workouts are like - if it's like the ad or not. There are so many great free workouts on YouTube or alomoves that you can do for free for a month.

I love this app. Not only does it have guided workouts, it also has great guides for sleeping better, getting your nutrition, mediation, and improving your focus. My only complaint is that sometimes the guided workouts will freeze. I either have to wait for the video to come back or restart the guided workout video and find where I left off.

Love the app ! Been using it daily for the last couple years and I am fully satisfied with it ! Just one point though, it doesn't seem possible to erase the data you've entered in your weight graph, and since I made a mistake a while back when entering the data, my graph is completely useless.. Asana dev, maybe the possibility to erase/rectify the data entered could be implemented ? :)
